original: Well that's... That's just great. The Vault kid from hell is now in cahoots with the devil himself.
translation: 这……这真是太好了。从地狱来的避难所孩子和魔鬼达成了协议。

original: She was seen not too long ago walking away from the Enclave's not-so-secret base way out to the northwest.
translation: 有人看见她不久前从英克雷那已不算是秘密的西北方堡垒里走出来。

original: He was seen not too long ago walking away from the Enclave's not-so-secret base way out to the northwest.
translation: 有人看见他不久前从英克雷那已不算是秘密的西北方堡垒里走出来。

original: Well no such luck.
translation: 真不走运。

original: We haven't heard squat about the little bitch from Vault 101 for two weeks, and hoped to God someone finally put a bullet in her brain.
translation: 我们已经有两个星期没有听到关于从101号避难所来的那小婊子的消息了，希望上帝保佑，最后能有人一枪打爆她的脑袋。

original: We haven't heard squat about the little prick from Vault 101 for two weeks, and hoped to God someone finally put a bullet in his brain.
translation: 我们已经有两个星期没有听到关于从101号避难所来的那小杂种的消息了，希望上帝保佑，最后能有人一枪打爆他的脑袋。

original: I'm coming to you live with a special report!
translation: 我为你们带来个特别报道！

original: Keep fighting the good fight, kid! We're with you all the way!
translation: 坚持为正义而战，孩子！我们永远与你同在！

original: Well buck up, pilgrims! Our friend is alive and well, and has managed to slip through the Enclave's clutches and escape their fortified base!
translation: 振作点，信徒们！我们的朋友仍然活得好好的，并已经设法摆脱了英克雷的魔爪，从他们那戒备森严的基地逃走了！

original: We haven't heard squat about our old pal from Vault 101 for two weeks now, and it's been looking pretty grim.
translation: 我们已经有两个星期没有听到关于从101号避难所来的老朋友的消息了，情况看起来不容乐观。

original: I'm coming to you live with a special report!
translation: 我为你们带来个特别报道！

original: Somethin' about Super Mutants takin' residents prisoner... All I know is the kid could have helped, and didn't. Nice going, asshole.
translation: 说是超级变种人绑了居民作俘虏……我只知道，那崽子明明能搭把手却装死。干得好啊，混球。

original: [Dashwood] Ha ha! Now, the door.
translation: [达什伍德] 哈哈！现在，撬门。

original: Somethin' about a rescue from Super Mutants, if you can believe that. Nice going, kid.
translation: 听说是从超级变种人手里搞了波营救，这没吹牛皮哦。可以啊，孩子。

original: Now, I've got new reports from the settlement known as Bigtown that Little Miss Vault Gal has helped them out with one hell of a mess.
translation: 新消息，我刚收到那个叫大镇的聚居地报告，那位避难所小姐帮他们解决了一个大麻烦。

original: Now, I've got new reports from the settlement known as Bigtown that Mister Vault Guy has helped them out with one hell of a mess.
translation: 新消息，我刚收到那个叫大镇的聚居地报告，那位避难所小伙帮他们解决了一个大麻烦。

original: So let's recount - our old friend shows up, weird shit happens, but in the end she saves the day. Yeah, that sounds about right.
translation: 让我们回顾一下：我们的老朋友一现身，怪事就频发，但最终她力挽狂澜。害，老套路吧。

original: [Argyle] Child's play, boss. <click> <sound of opening door> Okay lady, you're rescued. Now let's get out of... What? Boss, it's empty!
translation: [阿盖尔] 小儿科，老板。<咔哒> <开门声>好了，女士，你获救了。现在我们离开……什么？老板，没人！

original: So let's recount - our old friend shows up, weird shit happens, but in the end he saves the day. Yeah, that sounds about right.
translation: 让我们回顾一下：我们的老朋友一现身，怪事就频发，但最终他力挽狂澜。害，老套路吧。

original: In any event, the super silly situation's been dealt with, Canterbury Commons is safe, and 101 is the woman of the hour.
translation: 不管怎样，这场超级荒谬的闹剧已经收场，坎特伯雷社区太平了，而101来的姑娘正是那位风云人物。

original: In any event, the super silly situation's been dealt with, Canterbury Commons is safe, and 101 is the man of the hour.
translation: 不管怎样，这场超级荒谬的闹剧已经收场，坎特伯雷社区太平了，而101来的小伙正是那位风云人物。

original: From who, you ask? A couple of self-obsessed super psychos called... the AntAgonizer and the Mechanist! Hey, I couldn't make this shit up if I tried.
translation: 你问谁是罪魁？一对心理变态的自恋狂，好像叫……痛苦蚁后和机械侠！嘿，这鬼话我编都编不出来。

original: A big 'thank you' goes out to the mysterious traveler from Vault 101, for saving the little town of Canterbury Commons.
translation: 小镇坎特伯雷社区得救了，我们把一句真心的“谢谢你”送给来自101号避难所的神秘旅者。

original: Looks like I've got a spot o' good news for you, children.
translation: 看来我有了一丁点儿好消息要告诉你们，孩子们。

original: Following this thing's advice'll get you killed faster than you can say, "Hug a deathclaw!"
translation: 照这破书的建议行动，保准让你死得比说句“抱抱死亡爪”还快！

original: [Slaver] Hands up, chumps. Nobody escapes from Paradise Falls. Now let's move back to the pen, nice and slow, before...
translation: [奴隶贩子] 举起手来，呆瓜们！没有人能逃出堕落天堂。现在都回到栅栏里去，慢慢的，趁……

original: The kid from Vault 101 had a big hand in getting this thing written, and her research methods suck. There, I said it.
translation: 101号避难所那姑娘深度掺和了这本书的编写，她的调研手法简直烂到家。好了，我直说了。

original: The kid from Vault 101 had a big hand in getting this thing written, and his research methods suck. There, I said it.
translation: 101号避难所那小子深度掺和了这本书的编写，他的调研手法简直烂到家。好了，我直说了。

original: Public Service Warning, children! Watch out for a book claiming to be a "Wasteland Survival Guide!"
translation: 公共服务警告，孩子们！千万当心那本自称《废土生存指南》的破书！

original: Survive, Thrive, and Revive, that's the name of the game. The book is the Wasteland Survival Guide! Pick up your copy today!
translation: “生存”、“成长”和“复活”，那就是这游戏的名字。这本书就是废土生存指南！今天就来买本吧！

original: Now, let me tell ya. This thing's got all sorts of useful tips. Where to find food, how to deal with radiation, tons o' stuff.
translation: 现在，让我告诉你。这东西里面有各种各样有用的小秘诀。例如到哪去找吃的，怎么处理辐射，有用的东西非常多。

original: Oh, and, get this - researched and co-authored by none other than - yep, you guessed it - that tenacious teenager from Vault 101.
translation: 哦，还有，记着住这一点 — 这些研究的调查者和合著者不是别人 — 不错，你猜对了，就是那来自101号避难所的顽强少年。

original: Our first masterpiece is called "The Wasteland Survival Guide," written by Underworld's own Moira Brown.
translation: 我们的首部大作名为“废土生存指南”，由冥界的莫伊拉·布朗撰写。

original: Our first masterpiece is called "The Wasteland Survival Guide," written by Megaton's own Moira Brown.
translation: 我们的首部大作名为“废土生存指南”，由兆吨镇的莫伊拉·布朗撰写。

original: Know what I've decided, children? I'm gonna start a bookclub. Right... NOW! Wanna join? Good, cause you got no choice!
translation: 知道我做了什么决定吗，孩子们？我就要办一个读书俱乐部。没错……就是现在！想加入吗？没问题，只此一家别无分店！

original: Shame, shame, shame on you...
translation: 可耻，可耻，你真可耻……

original: [Chase] Drop the steel, you Slaver scumbag. <sound of a hit>
translation: [蔡斯] 放下武器，你这卑鄙的奴隶贩子。<击打声>

original: Oh, you heard me right! 101, a little defenseless boy begged you for help, and what did you do? You SOLD HIM AS A FUCKING SLAVE!
translation: 哦，你听说过对不对！101，一个毫无恶意的小男孩请求你的帮助，你都做了什么？你把他当做一个该死的奴隶给卖了！

original: I'll tell you where Bryan Wilks is. He's at fucking Paradise Falls, that's where!
translation: 我会告诉你布赖恩·威尔克斯在哪。他在该死的堕落天堂，就在那！

original: So if you see Bryan and his new parents, wish them all good luck. Oh, and 101? Nice work.
translation: 所以要是你看见布赖恩和他新的监护人，祝他们所有人好运。还有什么，101？干的真漂亮。

original: You see, not only did Miss Vault 101 stop the Ant problem, she also found little Bryan Wilks a new home.
translation: 你看，101号避难所小姐不仅解决了蚂蚁问题，她还给小布赖恩·威尔克斯找了一处新家。

original: You see, not only did Mister Vault 101 stop the Ant problem, he also found little Bryan Wilks a new home.
translation: 你看，101号避难所先生不仅解决了蚂蚁问题，他还给小布赖恩·威尔克斯找了一处新家。

original: Bryan, sadly, was the sole survivor. That's where the kid from Vault 101 comes in, and where our story, thankfully, gets better.
translation: 很遗憾，布赖恩是唯一的幸存者。然后那101号避难所的孩子就出场了，这也是我们故事发生的地方，万分感谢你，祝你过得更好。

original: So for the love of God, if someone is in the vicinity of Grayditch, could you please give the kid a Nuka-Cola, a Salisbury steak, something?
translation: 看在上帝的份上，要是有谁在灰渠的附近，求求你给那孩子一瓶核子可乐，一块索尔兹伯里肉饼什么的？

original: Good God, 101, have you no conscience? You left the kid to rot in that fallout shelter. I have witnesses!
translation: 天啊，101，你一点良心也没有吗？你把那孩子扔在充满辐射的掩体里自生自灭。我有证据！

original: I'll tell you where Bryan Wilks is. That little boy is stuck in a fucking box, that's where!
translation: 我告诉你布赖恩·威尔克斯在哪。那小男孩被卡在一个该死的亭子里，就在那！

original: But, what did she do with the boy, Three Dog? Where's Bryan Wilks now?
translation: 但是，她对那男孩做了什么，三狗？布赖恩·威尔克斯现在在哪？

original: But, what did he do with the boy, Three Dog? Where's Bryan Wilks now?
translation: 但是，他对那男孩做了什么，三狗？布赖恩·威尔克斯现在在哪？

original: You see, Miss Vault 101 may have stopped the Ant problem, but she couldn't be bothered to help poor little Bryan. Noooo.
translation: 你看，101号避难所小姐可能解决了蚂蚁问题，但现在却为帮助穷小孩布赖恩的事而头疼了。不 —

original: You see, Mister Vault 101 may have stopped the Ant problem, but he couldn't be bothered to help poor little Bryan. Noooo.
translation: 你看，101号避难所先生可能解决了蚂蚁问题，但现在却为帮助穷小孩布赖恩的事而头疼了。不 —

original: Bryan, sadly, was the sole survivor. That's where the kid from Vault 101 comes in, and where our story, unfortunately, gets even worse.
translation: 很遗憾，布赖恩是唯一的幸存者。然后那101号避难所的孩子就出场了，这也是我们故事发生的地方，很不幸，屋漏偏逢连夜雨。

original: You see, Bryan's from Grayditch, a small settlement that was recently overrun with overzealous Giant Ants.
translation: 你瞧，布赖恩来自灰渠，那个巨蚁泛滥的小型定居点。

original: This, faithful listeners, is the story of a little boy. A little boy... named Bryan Wilks.
translation: 我忠实的听众，这是一个小男孩的故事。一个小的男孩……他叫布赖恩·威尔克斯。

original: Hey, wouldn't you know it, the lone Wanderer is done collecting bottles of soda. Christ, talk about your slow news days...
translation: 嘿，你不知道吗，独行客已经完成了收集汽水瓶工作。天哪，说到你的慢新闻日了……

original: [Chase] You boys all right? I busted out of that box and was almost home free when I noticed your predicament.
translation: [蔡斯] 你们还好吗？我逃出那盒子，并在快要成功时才注意到你们的困境。

original: I've also heard it tastes like Radscorpion shit and turns your piss blue. Or does it taste like Radscorpion piss and turn your shit blue? Whatever.
translation: 我还听说那玩意尝起来像辐射蝎的大便，而且能让你尿出蓝色的东西。或者是那玩意尝起来像辐射蝎的尿而让你排出蓝色的大便？管他呢。

original: It's called Nuka-Cola Quantum, and I believe it was made in limited quantities before the war.
translation: 那叫量子可乐，而且我相信这东西在战前是限量生产的。

original: God knows why, but the kid from Vault 101 is scouring the Capital Wasteland for a unique brand of Nuka-Cola.
translation: 天知道为什么，但101避难所的那个孩子正在首都废土上寻找一种独特的核子可乐。

original: One small step backwards for man, one giant evolutionary rewind for mankind.
translation: 他后退一小步，人类倒退一大步。

original: [Argyle] Wait a minute! We do the rescuing around here, sister.
translation: [阿盖尔] 等等！我们才是大救星！妹妹。

original: You see, they worked together to completely wipe out a group of noble, slavery-hating abolitionists at a place called the Temple of the Union.
translation: 你看，他们在一个叫联邦圣殿的地方，合力彻底消灭了一群高尚的、憎恨奴隶制的废奴主义者。

original: Well you're in luck! Human bondage is here to stay, folks, thanks to that asshole from Vault 101 and his Slaver amigos.
translation: 你太幸运了！伟大的奴隶制保存了下来！人民们，这多亏了这来自101号避难所的混蛋和他的奴隶贩子朋友。

original: Are you sick enough to think slavery is the best thing to happen to the Capital Wasteland since broiled Mirelurk Cakes?
translation: 你真的傻到认为除了泥沼蟹饼，奴隶制就是首都废土上最好的事吗？

original: Are you a worthless piece of human trash who'd like nothing better than to own another human being?
translation: 你是一个只想占有别人的人渣吗？

original: Now if she could just remove all those ugly pipes from the Jefferson Memorial...
translation: 现在如果她能把杰斐逊纪念馆中所有难看的管道清除掉的话……

original: Now if he could just remove all those ugly pipes from the Jefferson Memorial...
translation: 现在如果他能把杰斐逊纪念馆中所有难看的管道清除掉的话……

original: Thanks to the kid from Vault 101, for assisting with this little bit of civic restoration.
translation: 多亏了这101号避难所的孩子，他帮助这些平民的生活重回正轨。

original: If you happen to make it down to the Mall, you just may notice that a previously decapitated statue has had an unexpected reunion... with it's head.
translation: 如果你偶然经过广场，你可能会发现一尊之前无头的雕像和它的头意外重逢了……

original: And special thanks to 101, for kicking the bad guys where it counts -- their wallets.
translation: 特别感谢101，踢到了那群人渣的痛处 — 他们的钱包。

original: Slavers of the Capital Wasteland, consider this the big "fuck you" you've had coming since starting this scurrilous skin trade.
translation: 自废土上奴隶贸易诞生以来，这是奴隶贩子所面临的最大威胁。

original: So if you're a slave on the run, the time for lying low is long gone. Head to the Temple of the Union and keep your head held high.
translation: 所以如果你是一个逃亡的奴隶，那么担惊受怕的日子就一去不复返了。挺胸抬头朝着联邦圣殿去吧。

original: Is the tide finally turning for those scumbag Slavers? Lordy knows it's been open season on defenseless settlers long enough.
translation: 最终卑鄙的奴隶贩子会成为主宰吗？连上帝都知道，废土上毫无防备的人们被肆意捕猎很久了。

original: Looks like our friend from Vault 101 has turned amateur abolitionist, lending a hand to the folks at the Temple of the Union.
translation: 看来我们101号避难所的朋友变成了一个业余的废奴主义者，还向那些联邦圣殿的家伙施以援手。

original: I'd ask the kid from 101, but I hear she's busy oogling some newly obtained piece of shiny Commonwealth technology. Quite a coinc of dink, that...
translation: 我应该问问这101来的孩子，可我听说她忙着研究一些新得到的联邦的高科技。真是……

original: [Dashwood] Now, now, Argyle! No need to be hasty. We owe this young lady our thanks. Miss...
translation: [达什伍德] 好了，好了，阿盖尔！没必要这么急。我们应该感谢这位年轻的小姐……

original: I'd ask the kid from 101, but I hear he's busy oogling some newly obtained piece of shiny Commonwealth technology. Quite a coinc of dink, that...
translation: 我应该问问这101来的孩子，可我听说他忙着研究一些新得到的联邦的高科技。真是……

original: A case of unrequited middle-aged romance, or some kind of spontaneously beneficial business arrangement?
translation: 一段典型的不求报答的中年罗曼史，或者一种于己有利的自发性商业安排？

original: Weird thing is, trusted Rivet City resident and head of security Harkness has abandoned his life here in the Capital Wasteland... and gone with him.
translation: 莫名其妙的是，值得信任的铆钉城居民兼警卫主管哈克尼斯放弃了他在首都废土的生活……随他人而去。

original: Looks like Rivet City's latest visitor, a certain Zimmer from the scientifically superior Commonwealth, has finally packed his bags and headed home.
translation: 看来刚从高手如云的科技之城联邦来到铆钉城，叫齐默的那家伙，最终卷铺盖走人了。

original: Signs point to yes...
translation: 迹象表明，正是……

original: Could this have something to do with Miss Vault 101 playing junior gumshoe lately, interrogating everyone about a fugitive from the Commonwealth?
translation: 这和近来101号避难所小姐装作刑警，就某个联邦的逃犯询问每个人有什么关系吗？

original: Could this have something to do with Mister Vault 101 playing junior gumshoe lately, interrogating everyone about a fugitive from the Commonwealth?
translation: 这和近来101号避难所先生装作刑警，就某个联邦的逃犯询问每个人有什么关系吗？

original: Trouble, oh we got trouble, right here in Rivet City! Looks like trusted resident and head of security Harkness has unexpectedly flown the coop.
translation: 麻烦了，哦，我们有麻烦了，就在铆钉城！那看似可信的居民兼警卫主管哈克尼斯居然逃之夭夭了。

original: In the end, I guess it doesn't really matter. Arefu is quiet once more, thanks to the efforts of the lone wanderer... from Vault 101.
translation: 最后，我想这并不重要。阿雷富再次恢复了平静，多亏了那独行客……来自101号避难所的那人。

original: [Chase] Penelope Chase, fortune hunter. You can buy me a beer later. Now let's cut this shindig short and get the bloody hell out of here! Come on!
translation: [蔡斯] 佩内洛普·蔡斯，财富猎人。你可以待会再请我喝酒。现在闲话少说，先离开这该死的地方！快点！

original: So what happened down there in the stinking, slinking subway tunnels? Friendly chit-chat, or a classic case of shotgun diplomacy?
translation: 那么在那臭烘烘的地铁隧道里发生了什么？是友好协商，还是一次经典的强盗外交？

original: The cherry on top? She emerged a short time later with a lad named Ian West, who, presumably, had been taken captive in the latest raid.
translation: 后来呢？她与一个名叫伊恩·维斯特的小伙子出现了，而那个伊恩就是之前被俘虏的那个人。

original: The cherry on top? He emerged a short time later with a lad named Ian West, who, presumably, had been taken captive in the latest raid.
translation: 后来呢？他与一个名叫伊恩·维斯特的小伙子出现了，而那个伊恩就是之前被俘虏的那个人。

original: Buuuuttt... it would seem that after 101 made a little solo sojourn into the murky depths of Meresti Station, the attacks... stopped.
translation: 但但但但是……看起来101独自一人在又黑又深米尔斯蒂地铁站作了小小的逗留之后，攻击……停止了。

original: Little Miss Vault 101 was spotted over in Arefu, where the settlement has been hit pretty hard lately by a marauding gang of riotous ruffians.
translation: 有人见到101号避难所的小妞在阿雷富，那的居民不久前被一群打家劫舍的流氓恶棍揍得够呛。

original: Mister Vault 101 was spotted over in Arefu, where the settlement has been hit pretty hard lately by a marauding gang of riotous ruffians.
translation: 有人见到101号避难所的小子在阿雷富，那的居民不久前被一群打家劫舍的流氓恶棍揍得够呛。

original: We've been getting reports of a raging, sustained fire somewhere up north.
translation: 我们得到报告说，北部某地发生了持续的大火。

original: [Dashwood] Argyle, old friend. I think I'm in love...
translation: [达什伍德] 阿盖尔，老朋友。我好像坠入爱河了……

original: Yeah, yeah. So what? Well here's what.
translation: 嗯，嗯。那又怎样？就这样。

original: Point 1: The kid from Vault 101 was seen in that area just before the fire.
translation: 要点1：在那地方着火之前，有人看到过这来自101号避难所的孩子。

original: Point 2: The smoke and smell from this thing don't match your typical chemical burn. Reports are, this smells like burning... wood.
translation: 要点2：这东西散发的烟雾和气味和你所知道的化学燃烧无法相提并论。报告上说，这味道闻起来像在烧……木头。

original: You heard it here first, children. A forest fire in the Capital Wasteland, where all the trees were ALREADY burnt to a crisp 200 years ago.
translation: 你是第一个听到这的，孩子们。首都废土发生了一场森林大火，但是那里的树木在200年前就烧成渣了。

original: Only you, 101. Only you.
translation: 只有你，101，只有你。

original: Hey, nice work 101. Next time you're in the neighborhood, pop into the studio. Ole Three Dog's toaster's been on the fritz...
translation: 嗨，干得漂亮，101。下回你要是经过附近，到我们的播音室来坐坐。呃……三狗的烤面包机出了故障……

original: <closing music>
translation: <结束曲>

original: The town's sheriff, one Lucas Simms, commissioned the one, the only lone wanderer from Vault 101 to disarm the nasty nuke, and the kid delivered.
translation: 那个镇的警长，一个叫卢卡斯·西姆斯的人，委任来自101号避难所的独行客拆除镇子上那颗龌龊的核弹，而那孩子已经把这事搞定了。

original: Got some great news out of the town of Megaton. Turns out that live atomic bomb in the town's center has finally been deep-sixed for good.
translation: 来自兆吨镇的大新闻，镇子中央的原子弹已经彻底拆除了。

original: But just who did the dirty deed? Ask yourself this -- why has the kid from Vault 101 been sighted hanging around Tenpenny Tower? Why indeed...
translation: 但究竟谁干了这龌龊事？不妨自问：为何有人频繁目击那来自101号避难所的小鬼在特佩尼大厦附近游荡？为什么呢……

original: I suspect foul play, folks.
translation: 我怀疑其中有诈，各位。

original: Word is that twisted old land grabber Allistair Penny, founder of the posh Tenpenny Tower, has been looking to secure that spot for years.
translation: 据说那心理扭曲的老地主奥利斯特·佩尼，也就是豪华特佩尼大厦的创始人，多年来一直觊觎这块地皮。

original: But it was all just a tragic accident, right? Don't you believe that for a second, folks.
translation: 但这真的不过是一场悲惨的事故吗？各位可千万别信这套。

original: Well go kaboom it has.
translation: 而它真的炸了！

original: It's been no secret that the pre-war nuke in the center of town had a live atomic core, and under the wrong conditions, could still go kaboom.
translation: 镇中心那枚战前核弹的核心部件从未失效，这早已不是秘密，一旦条件成熟随时可能咔嘭一声。

original: GNR sources have confirmed that the mushroom cloud seen in the vicinity of Megaton was in fact... Megaton.
translation: 银新台消息源证实，在兆吨镇附近地区出现的蘑菇云，其实就来自……兆吨镇。

original: Children, I'm afraid I've got some terrible, terrible news.
translation: 孩子们，我恐怕有一些很坏很坏的消息。

original: The butcher-at-large? Yep, you guessed it -- none other than the kid from Vault 101. Nice going, scumbag.
translation: 逍遥法外的屠夫？好了，你们猜对了 — 正是那来自101号避难所的小家伙。一路顺风，卑鄙的家伙。

original: Today's episode - Super Mutant Mayhem!
translation: 今天的节目 — 超级变种人大混乱！

original: You see, those hapless, homeless irradiated rejects have all been brutally slaughtered in their temporary digs in the tunnels of Warrington Station.
translation: 你看，那些无家可归，倒霉的辐射感染者已经在他们的沃灵顿站隧道中被残忍的屠杀。

original: Looks like that dream has died on the vine.
translation: 看来那梦想中途夭折了。

original: Hey, remember those down-on-their-luck Ghouls who wanted to share the luxury accommodations at the fancy shmancy Tenpenny Tower?
translation: 嗨，记得那些倒霉的尸鬼想要分享那梦幻般的特佩尼大厦的豪华住所吗？

original: Oh, and kiddo from Vault 101? You look like a complete freakshow in that mask. Hey, somebody had to say it...
translation: 哦，和来自101号避难所来的小家伙？你带着那面具活像一个畸形。嗨，总有人要说出来……

original: Three Dog's all for stickin' it to the Man, but good golly Ghoulies -- that's a liiittle much.
translation: 三狗虽然也是站在人类这边，但是对于那些尸鬼的做法 — 有点点过分了。

original: Looks like they finally got their upscale address! And all it took was the wholesale slaughter of every other Tenpenny resident!
translation: 看来他们最终占据了上流社会的位置！此外它造成的是对特佩尼居民大规模的屠杀!

original: Hey, remember those down-on-their-luck Ghouls who wanted to share the luxury accommodations at the fancy shmancy Tenpenny Tower?
translation: 嗨，记得那些倒霉的尸鬼想要分享那梦幻般的特佩尼大厦的豪华住所吗？

original: Maybe I'll just ask around Underworld, hmmm? Cause a little irradiated birdy told me you've been spending some serious time down in Ghoulville...
translation: 或许我会到冥界附近打听打听，嗯？因为一些被辐射过的烂人告诉我说，你在尸鬼村度过了一段严酷的时光……

original: If Three Dog were here, he'd say something witty. But he's not. Cause somebody killed him. So you get me playing music. Yay.
translation: 要是三狗在这，他准会说些逗趣的话。但他没有，因为他被杀了。所以只得由我来播放音乐了。哈。

original: What's the deal, 101? You killin' for kicks, or is this a paying gig?
translation: 出了什么事，101？你杀人是为了寻欢作乐，还是为了赚取赏钱？

original: Looks like that loony lass from Vault 101's been busy lately, this time systematically executing some of the Wasteland's most colorful characters.
translation: 看样子那101号避难所的小淫妇最近很忙，目前正忙于处决废土的一系列闪亮人物。

original: Looks like that loony lad from Vault 101's been busy lately, this time systematically executing some of the Wasteland's most colorful characters.
translation: 看样子那101号避难所的小流氓最近很忙，目前正忙于处决废土的一系列闪亮人物。

original: Huzzah! The time of British oppression is finally over! Now we can finally turn our attention to the Super Mutants, Raiders, and Radscorpions...
translation: 呜啊！英国佬的压迫终于到头了！现在我们终于可以把注意力转到超级变种人、掠夺者和辐射蝎身上了……

original: <sounds of gunfire>
translation: <开枪声>

original: The kid has recovered one of this country's most important historical artifacts -- the Declaration of Independence.
translation: 这小孩找回了这国家最重要的历史文物 — 《独立宣言》。

original: The mistress of adventure herself, that rough and tumble lass from Vault 101, has really outdone herself this time.
translation: 我们的冒险家小姐，那个来自101号避难所，生性浪荡的小淫妇，这回真的战胜了她自己。

original: The master of adventure himself, that rough and tumble lad from Vault 101, has really outdone himself this time.
translation: 我们的冒险家小子，那个来自101号避难所，喜欢不按常理出牌的小流氓，这回真的战胜了他自己。

original: She was seen coming OUT of the vault, AGAIN, and headed God knows where. Don't let that revolving door hit you on the ass on the way out...
translation: 有人又一次看到她从避难所里出来，天知道她去哪了。出去时候别让那旋转门撞到你的屁股……

original: [Argyle] Ha! That'll teach those Slaver slimebags to follow us. Looks like that's the last of them, boss.
translation: [阿盖尔] 哈！这下那些混蛋奴隶贩子该知道跟着我们的后果。看来这是最后一批人了，老板。

original: He was seen coming OUT of the vault, AGAIN, and headed God knows where. Don't let that revolving door hit you on the ass on the way out...
translation: 有人又一次看到他从避难所里出来，天知道他去哪了。出去时候别让那旋转门撞到你……

original: Who says you can't go home again, huh? The kid from Vault 101 did, but it looks like the prodigal daughter's return didn't last all that long.
translation: 谁说你不能再回家？这从101号避难所出来的孩子就做到过，看起来这放荡浪女的回归没持续多久。

original: Who says you can't go home again, huh? The kid from Vault 101 did, but it looks like the prodigal son's return didn't last all that long.
translation: 谁说你不能再回家？这从101号避难所出来的孩子就做到过，但看起来这放荡浪子的回归没持续多久。

original: Ohhh... Bad form, 101. Bad form, indeed...
translation: 啧啧……101号出来的，办事不地道啊，太不地道了……

original: <sound of walking over gravel>
translation: <走过沙砾的声音>

original: The kid THEN delivered the violin to some guy at Rivet City, NOT the old lady who had commissioned the retrieval job.
translation: 这崽子拿到琴后，居然没交给委托任务的阿婆，反而送给了铆钉城的某个家伙！

original: Should we suspect foul play? Damn straight. And you're Suspect Numero Uno, vault asshole.
translation: 要说这不是谋杀？鬼才信！你个避难所混蛋就是头号嫌疑犯。

original: The kid THEN delivered the violin to some old lady, who shortly thereafter was found stone cold dead AND violinless.
translation: 那崽子倒是把小提琴交给了某个老妇人，而没过多久她就被发现陈尸当场，琴也不翼而飞。

original: Now here's where the story gets sketchy, in true Capital Wasteland style.
translation: 但接下来故事就诡异了，以典型的首都废土粗线条风格。

original: Agatha, we love ya. Keep playin', sister. And Vault kid? You've helped make the Capital Wasteland a better place. Hats off, my friend.
translation: 阿加莎，我们爱你。继续演奏吧，我的姐！至于避难所的孩子？你让首都废土多了一丝人性光辉。向你致敬，我的朋友。

original: Here's the best part. The violin was for an old woman named Agatha, who has taken to the airwaves herself to share some truly beautiful music.
translation: 最精彩的部分来了。这把琴的主人，是位名叫阿加莎的老妇人，她本人也通过电波分享过许多真正美妙的音乐。

original: Oh, but not just any ole violin, children... We're talking Stradivarius here. That's one top o' the line fiddle, you dig?
translation: 哦，可不是普通的小提琴，孩子们……我们说的是斯特拉迪瓦里。顶级古董琴，明白了？

original: My contacts report that he recently went on a highly dangerous excursion to recover -drum roll please - a violin.
translation: 我的线人报告，他最近进行了一次极其危险的远足，就为取回——来点鼓声——一把小提琴。

original: Now, the Lone Wanderer, aka "that kid from Vault 101," has done some pretty interesting things, but this one takes the cake.
translation: 现在，“独行客”，又名“来自101号避难所的那孩子”，干了不少相当有意思的事，但这次堪称一绝。

original: Oh, and Vault kid? I know you were seen in the vicinity. I hope to God you had nothing to do with this carnage.
translation: 对了，避难所那小孩？我知道你在附近出现过，但愿你与这场屠杀无关。

original: [Dashwood] So, Ms. Chase... How did you come to be, ahh... "held up" in Paradise Falls?
translation: [达什伍德] 那么，蔡斯小姐……你是怎么被……“扣留”在堕落天堂的？

original: Reports are sketchy... but it appears there have been some human casualties. Sorry for your losses, Reilly... assuming you ain't one of 'em.
translation: 报告很简略……但似乎有一些人员伤亡。对你买的损失表示遗憾，莱莉……希望你不是其中之一。

original: Do I suspect some Vault Dweller intervention on this one? I certainly do. Good work, 101.
translation: 我是否怀疑某避难所居民介入了这事？我当然怀疑了。干得好，101。

original: It would seem that a brave soldier named Theo was lost in the line of duty... but some of the others have been rescued.
translation: 看来，一名叫西奥的勇敢士兵在执行任务时牺牲了……但其他一些人已经获救。

original: I've gotten word that a band of mercs called Reilly's Rangers were trapped on a DC rooftop, pinned down by Super Mutants.
translation: 我获得消息，一队名叫“莱莉的游骑兵”的雇佣兵被困在了特区的一处楼顶上，被超级变种人缠住了。

original: For now, listen close, as I share yet another of our friend's adventures.
translation: 现在，仔细听喽，我要和你分享我的另一位朋友的冒险经历。

original: [Chase] My friends call me Penelope, and let's just say those Slavers don't take too kindly to people disrupting their caravans.
translation: [蔡斯] 我的朋友们叫我佩内洛普，这么说吧，奴隶贩子可不喜欢别人打扰他们的商队。

original: We'll get through this, children. You just gotta believe.
translation: 我们会熬过去的，孩子们。你们要坚信。

original: So believe me when I tell you that I was wrong. Dead wrong. That kid from Vault 101 is the Last, Best Hope of Humanity.
translation: 当我说我错了的时候，务必相信我。错到家了。那个从101号避难所来的孩子，是人类最后、最好的希望了。

original: I've always given it to you straight, have I not? For good or ill, Galaxy News Radio has been the voice of truth on these airwaves.
translation: 我总是对你们有话直说，对吧？无论是好是坏，银河新闻电台一直用这些电波传达真相。

original: The good ole U.S. of A... ahhh, she's a mess. I had pretty much written us all off. But that was before a certain kid from Vault 101...
translation: 美利坚合众…国…哈，她真是一团糟啊。几乎所有的人被我写进了死亡名单。但那是在某个小孩从101号避难所里出来之前…

original: All right, children. It's time for Three Dog to be honest with ya. Here it is, plain as day - I used to think we were all well and truly fucked.
translation: 好吧，孩子们。现在是三狗对你说实话的时间了。它就是，青天白日的 — 我过去认为我们肯定是彻彻底底的完蛋了。

original: And now for you other faithful listeners, here's an update on our friend.
translation: 为了你们这些忠实的听众，现在带来了有关于我们的朋友的新消息。

original: [Chase] And by "disrupt" I mean "blow up."
translation: [蔡斯] 我说的“打扰”，其实就是“炸毁”。

original: Kid from the vault, if you're listening, I want you to know that you are, truly, a Paradigm of Humanity. Keep on fighting, girl!
translation: 从避难所来的孩子，如果你在听，我想让你知道你简直就是“人性楷模”。继续战斗吧，小姑娘！

original: Kid from the vault, if you're listening, I want you to know that you are, truly, a Paradigm of Humanity. Keep on fighting, man!
translation: 从避难所来的孩子，如果你在听，我想让你知道你简直就是“人性楷模”。继续战斗吧，小伙子！

original: I'm talkin' about the kid from Vault 101. Just 19, and this babe has been in some serious shit.  And there ain't no sign o' stoppin'!
translation: 我正在说的是关于101号避难所来的孩子。只有19岁，这宝贝已经陷入了可怕的麻烦中。但她并没有放弃和停止前进。

original: I'm talkin' about the kid from Vault 101. Just 19, and this cat has been in some serious shit.  And there ain't no sign o' stoppin'!
translation: 我正在说的是关于101号避难所来的孩子。只有19岁，这小伙已经陷入了可怕的麻烦中。但他并没有放弃和停止前进。

original: Alive? Yes. Still wandering? Uh huh. One of the most powerful individuals in the Capital Wasteland? You bet your bobby socks, Susie.
translation: 还活着？是。仍然在流浪？哈哈。首都废土中最强大的人中的一个？用你的短袜打赌，苏茜。

original: Alive? Yes. Still wandering? Uh huh. One of the most powerful individuals in the Capital Wasteland? You bet your bobby socks, Susie.
translation: 还活着？是。仍然在流浪？哈哈。首都废土中最强大的人中的一个？用你的短袜打赌，苏茜。

original: Here's the latest news on Vault 101's evil progeny...
translation: 以下是有关101避难所邪恶后代的最新消息……

original: [Dashwood] Ha! Now that's what this Wasteland needs - more women with spunk and explosives! So tell me, Penelope, what's the next stop on...
translation: [达什伍德] 哈！现在这就是废土需要的 — 更具有勇气与爆发力的女性！所以告诉我，佩内洛普，下一站去……

original: Why? Because that kid from Vault 101 is the worst thing to happen to our neighborhood since radiation sickness.
translation: 为什么？因为那101号避难所来的孩子是自辐射病以来，我们这地区遇上的最糟糕的事情。

original: If they rewrite the Bible, they really need to add that part.
translation: 如果他们重写圣经，他们真的需要把这部分加进去。

original: And lo, the girl did step forth from her shadowy hole, and proclaim herself Scourge of Humanity.
translation: 之后，那女孩果真走出了她那阴暗的洞穴，并宣布她自己是“人类公敌”。

original: And lo, the boy did step forth from his shadowy hole, and proclaim himself Scourge of Humanity.
translation: 之后，那男孩果真走出了他那阴暗的洞穴，并宣布他自己是“人类公敌”。

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on the Last, Best Hope of Humanity herself, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人类最后、最好的希望”本人的最新消息，她就是来自101号避难所的那孩子。

original: [Super Mutant] Stupid human! Shut up now! <sound of guns cocking> You come with us now!
translation: [超级变种人] 愚蠢的人类！现在给我闭嘴！<上膛声>你们现在跟我们走！

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on the Last, Best Hope of Humanity himself, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人类最后、最好的希望”本人的最新消息，他就是来自101号避难所的那孩子。

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on that Paradigm of Humanity, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人性楷模”的最新消息，就是那个来自101号避难所的孩子。

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on that Scourge of Humanity, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人类公敌”的最新消息，她就是来自101号避难所的那孩子。

original: Question. Is there a God, and if so, does he give a shit about the rest of us? I was skeptical, but that was before a certain Saint from Vault 101...
translation: 提问：有上帝吗？如果有，他会关心我们吗？我曾怀疑过，但那是在某位来自101避难所的圣徒之前……

original: I don't know how she's even still alive, but I've got an update on the kid from Vault 101. I swear, she must be Super-Human or somethin'...
translation: 我不知道她是怎么还活着的，但我得到了101号避难那孩子的新消息。我发誓，她肯定是“超人类”之类的…

original: I don't know how he's even still alive, but I've got an update on the kid from Vault 101. I swear, he must be Super-Human or somethin'...
translation: 我不知道他是怎么还活着的，但我得到了101号避难那孩子的新消息。我发誓，他肯定是“超人类”之类的…

original: I have a new theory. Vault 101 is actually Hell. Hear me out. I mean, that kid we all know and hate is Evil Incarnate, right? Here's the latest.
translation: 我有个新理论：101号避难所其实就是地狱。听我说完。我是说，那个我们都知道并讨厌的孩子，是邪恶的化身，对吗？以下是最新消息。

original: Hey, out on that ridge! It's Buddha! It's Jesus! No, it's the... Wasteland Savior! Here's an update on Vault 101's homegrown messiah.
translation: 嘿，在山脊上！是佛祖！是耶稣！不，是……“废土拯救者”！以下是101号避难所本土救世主的最新消息。

original: She came from Vault 101... Friend? Foe? Or simple Wasteland Watcher? Here's an update on that kid from the hole...
translation: 她来自101号避难所…是朋友？是敌人？或仅仅是废土观察家？下面是关于那从洞里出来的孩子的新消息…

original: He came from Vault 101... Friend? Foe? Or simple Wasteland Watcher? Here's an update on that kid from the hole...
translation: 他来自101号避难所…是朋友？是敌人？或仅仅是废土观察家？下面是关于那从洞里出来的孩子的新消息…

original: So. Just when you thought it was crazy enough out there... Here's an update on the kid from Vault 101 who fancies herself the Wasteland Destroyer.
translation: 那么，当你觉得外面已经疯透的时候……下面是101号避难所那个自称“废土毁灭者”的孩子的最新消息。

original: So. Just when you thought it was crazy enough out there... Here's an update on the kid from Vault 101 who fancies himself the Wasteland Destroyer.
translation: 那么，当你觉得外面已经疯透的时候……下面是101号避难所那个自称“废土毁灭者”的孩子的最新消息。

original: Lordy! I just love that vault girl! Hole-dweller one day, Paragon of all that is good and right in the world the next. And, she's been busy...
translation: 老天爷！我爱上那避难所女孩了！头一天还是穴居人，第二天就成了全世界善良与正义的“完人”。并且，她一直忙于…

original: Lordy! I just love that vault boy! Hole-dweller one day, Paragon of all that is good and right in the world the next. And, he's been busy...
translation: 老天爷！我爱上那避难所男孩了！头一天还是穴居人，第二天就成了全世界善良与正义的“完人”。并且，他一直忙于…

original: Ah, the kid from Vault 101. She hurts, she helps, she does whatever she damn well pleases. Sometimes just a watcher... a Beholder, if you will.
translation: 啊，101号避难所的那孩子。她捣乱，她帮助，她为所欲为。可以说，有时只是一个观察者……一个“看客”。

original: And now, for another exciting adventure of, "The Hero... of the Wasssssttteesss!"
translation: 现在，“废土的……英~雄~”又一次激动人心的冒险开始了。

original: You've seen her out there, haven't you, wandering the D.C. ruins, looking for adventure? The latest on Vault 101's very own Strider of the Wastes.
translation: 你见过她吧，在特区废墟上游荡，寻找冒险？下面是101避难所自己的“废土行者”的最新消息。

original: You've seen him out there, haven't you, wandering the D.C. ruins, looking for adventure? The latest on Vault 101's very own Strider of the Wastes.
translation: 你见过他吧，在特区废墟上游荡，寻找冒险？下面是101避难所自己的“废土行者”的最新消息。

original: You think all that shit between the Super Mutants and Brotherhood is bad? Here's the latest on the Harbinger of War himself, that kid from Vault 101.
translation: 你认为超级变种人与钢铁兄弟会之间的烂事很糟糕？咱们听听“战争先驱”的最新消息吧，他就是来自101号避难所的那孩子。

original: You think all that shit between the Super Mutants and Brotherhood is bad? Here's the latest on the Harbinger of War herself, that kid from Vault 101.
translation: 你认为超级变种人与钢铁兄弟会之间的烂事很糟糕？咱们听听“战争先驱”的最新消息吧，她就是来自101号避难所的那孩子。

original: Yeah, you guessed it - time for another update on the Villain of the Wastes herself, that evil little bitch from Vault 101.
translation: 是啊，你猜到了——现在播送另一则新消息，关于“废土反派”，那来自101号避难所的邪恶小婊子。

original: Yeah, you guessed it - time for another update on the Villain of the Wastes himself, that evil little bastard from Vault 101.
translation: 是啊，你猜到了——现在播送另一则新消息，关于“废土反派”，那来自101号避难所的邪恶小杂种。

original: Hallelujah! The Urban Legend is real, children! She's real, and she's out there, everyday, helping poor shlubs like you. The latest and greatest.
translation: 哈利路亚！孩子们，“都市传奇”是真实存在的！她不玩虚的，每天都在外边，帮助你们这样的小人物。最新最劲爆的消息给您整上。

original: Hallelujah! The Urban Legend is real, children! He's real, and he's out there, everyday, helping poor shlubs like you. The latest and greatest.
translation: 哈利路亚！孩子们，“都市传奇”是真实存在的！他不玩虚的，每天都在外边，帮助你们这样的小人物。最新最劲爆的消息给您整上。

original: Special report! Da da dum dum, da da da dum dum! This just in -- The kid from Vault 101 is not just an Urban Myth ! Oh, she's real all right.
translation: 特别报道！哒哒铛铛，哒哒哒铛铛铛！刚得到的消息——来自101号避难所的那孩子不只是都市神话！哦，她是真实存在的。

original: Special report! Da da dum dum, da da da dum dum! This just in -- The kid from Vault 101 is not just an Urban Myth ! Oh, he's real all right.
translation: 特别报道！哒哒铛铛，哒哒哒铛铛铛！刚得到的消息——来自101号避难所的那孩子不只是都市神话！哦，他是真实存在的。

original: You don't want to believe it, I know. That kid from Vault 101, he can't be real. He's just some creepy Urban Superstition, right? Wrong.
translation: 我知道，你们不想去相信。来自101号避难所的孩子，他不可能真的存在。他只是一些令人毛骨悚然的都市迷信，对吗？错。

original: You don't want to believe it, I know. That kid from Vault 101, she can't be real. She's just some creepy Urban Superstition, right? Wrong.
translation: 我知道，你们不想去相信。来自101号避难所的孩子，她不可能真的存在。她只是一些令人毛骨悚然的都市迷信，对吗？错。

original: Hate. Prejudice. Violence. Leave 'em all behind. The kid from Vault 101 did, so why can't you? The latest on our own Ambassador of Peace.
translation: 仇恨，偏见，暴力，全都抛在脑后。来自101号避难所的孩子做到了，你为什么不能？这是来自我们“和平使者”的最新消息。

original: Never quit. Never stop believing. That's the story of the cat from Vault 101. Here's the latest on the very Pinnacle of Survival.
translation: 永不放弃。永不放弃信念。这就是来自101号避难所小伙的故事。以下是关于“顶级生存者”的最新消息。

original: Want peace and quiet? Good luck with that, kids. The name of the game is chaos, thanks to Vault 101's own Harbinger of War. Listen and learn.
translation: 想要宁静？祝你们好运，孩子们。游戏的名字叫“混乱”，这要归功于101避难所自己的“战争先驱”。听一听，学一学。

original: And now an update on everyone's favorite hero from a hole, a gal I feel really comfortable calling - drum roll please - the Vault Legend!
translation: 现在是大家最喜欢的洞穴英雄的最新消息，我很乐意称她为——来点鼓声——避难所传奇！

original: And now an update on everyone's favorite hero from a hole, a guy I feel really comfortable calling - drum roll please - the Vault Legend!
translation: 现在是大家最喜欢的洞穴英雄的最新消息，我很乐意称他为——来点鼓声——避难所传奇！

original: And now, a little story. A story about a boy who climbed out of a hole. I'm talkin' about that Vault Descendent, of course. Here's the latest.
translation: 现在，有一个小故事。关于一个从洞里爬出来的小女孩。当然，我谈的正是那避难所后人。这是最新的消息。

original: And now, a little story. A story about a girl who climbed out of a hole. I'm talkin' about that Vault Descendent, of course. Here's the latest.
translation: 我的孩子们，又到了毛骨悚然、惊恐万状的时间了。你可知道那令人起鸡皮疙瘩的避难所恶巫有什么目的吗？好好听着。

original: Time again, my children, for chills and thrills, fears and scares. Do you know what that creepy Vault Boogeyman has been up to? Listen to this.
translation: 孩子们，又到了惊险刺激、恐惧害怕的时候了。你们知道那个令人毛骨悚然的“避难所怪物”在干什么吗？听听这个。

original: A Paladin walks among us, children. And no, this ain't one of our buddies from the Brotherhood. I'm talking about that knight in shining vault suit.
translation: 圣骑士就在我们中间，孩子们。不，他不是我们兄弟会的小伙子。我说的是那个穿着闪亮避难所制服的骑士。

original: Now, an update on a certain crazy dude from Vault 101. Let's call him the Keeper. The Keeper of promises, of secrets, of his own destiny.
translation: 现在，101号避难所的疯家伙有了新消息。让我们称他为“管理人”吧。承诺，秘密，和他自己的命运的管理人。

original: Now, an update on a certain crazy chick from Vault 101. Let's call her the Keeper. The Keeper of promises, of secrets, of her own destiny.
translation: 现在，101号避难所的疯小妞有了新消息。让我们称她为“管理人”吧。承诺，秘密，和她自己的命运的管理人。

original: I know, I know, you want the skinny on Miss Vault 101. Well here's a news flash - that merciless fucking Defiler is still out there, all right?
translation: 我知道，我知道，你们想听101号避难所小姐的内部消息。嗯，以下是快讯——那个操蛋无情的亵渎者仍然活着，可以了吧？

original: I know, I know, you want the skinny on Mister Vault 101. Well here's a news flash - that merciless fucking Defiler is still out there, all right?
translation: 我知道，我知道，你们想听101号避难所先生的内部消息。嗯，以下是快讯——那个操蛋无情的亵渎者仍然活着，可以了吧？

original: It's that time again, kids! The adventures of... the Capital Crusader! Yeah! Hurray! Oh, seriously, how can you not dig this gal? Am I right?
translation: 孩子们，又到了那个的时间了！首都十字军大冒险！好耶！万岁！哦，说真的，你们怎么能不喜欢这个女孩呢？我说的对吧？

original: It's that time again, kids! The adventures of... the Capital Crusader! Yeah! Hurray! Seriously, how can you not dig this guy? Am I right?
translation: 孩子们，又到了那个的时间了！首都十字军大冒险！好耶！万岁！哦，说真的，你们怎么能不稀罕这小子呢？我说的对吧？

original: Neutrality, baby. That's today's lesson, taught by our own Capital Councilor. Maybe that vault door leads to Switzerland? Anyway, she's at it again.
translation: 中立，宝贝儿。这就是今天的课程，由我们的“首都评议员”讲授。也许那扇避难所门通往瑞士？总之，她又来了。

original: Neutrality, baby. That's today's lesson, taught by our own Capital Councilor. Maybe that vault door leads to Switzerland? Anyway, he's at it again.
translation: 中立，宝贝儿。这就是今天的课程，由我们的“首都评议员”讲授。也许那扇避难所门通往瑞士？总之，他又来了。

original: Now more on the kid from Vault 101, living a life of unrepentant vice and violence. Jesus, he's like some kind of, of... Capital Crimelord.
translation: 好了，更多关注101号避难所的那孩子，过着不思悔改的罪恶和暴力生活。天啊，他就像某种……“首都罪领主”。

original: Now more on the kid from Vault 101, living a life of unrepentant vice and violence. Jesus, she's like some kind of, of... Capital Crimelord.
translation: 好了，更多关注101号避难所的那孩子，过着不思悔改的罪恶和暴力生活。天啊，她就像某种……“首都罪领主”。

original: Hey, our friend from Vault 101 is at it again. A true Exemplar, showing us all the true meaning of love, compassion, and all that other crap.
translation: 嘿，我们101号避难所的朋友又来了。一位真正的“模范标兵”，向我们展示了爱与同情的真谛，以及所有其他废话。

original: Now more on the kid from Vault 101, keeping that moral compass firmly grounded in gray. Angel? Devil? More like neutral Observer at this point.
translation: 好了，更多关注101号避难所的那孩子，道德指针牢牢定格在灰色。天使？魔鬼？此时更像是中立的“观察者”。

original: Okay, let's see. Anything new with that rancorous little Ne'er-do-well from Vault 101? Well, there's this...
translation: 好吧，让我们来看看。那101号避难所的小“一无是处”有什么新消息吗？嗯，有……

original: And now an update on our very own Urban Defender. Did she leave that vault just to help us? Who cares, man. We owe her either way. Check this out.
translation: 现在是我们每人的“都市守卫者”的最新消息。她离开避难所就是为了帮我们吗？管他呢。不管怎样都是我们欠她的。看看这个。

original: And now an update on our very own Urban Defender. Did he leave that vault just to help us? Who cares, man. We owe him either way. Check this out.
translation: 现在是我们每人的“都市守卫者”的最新消息。他离开避难所就是为了帮我们吗？管他呢。不管怎样都是我们欠他的。看看这个。

original: Grow up in a hole, confined and bored? Hit the Wasteland! You, too, can be an Urban Ranger! And now, the latest on the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 在洞穴中长大，封闭又无聊？去废土吧！你也可以成为“都市游骑兵”！现在，为您播报来自101号避难所那孩子的最新消息。

original: Man, am I getting sick of this little punk. From innocent vault kid to sicko Urban Invader. Here's the latest...
translation: 天啊，我真是越来越讨厌这个小阿飞了。从天真无邪的避难所小孩到变态的“都市侵略者”。以下是最新的……

original: Now the latest on everyone's favorite runt from Vault 101. She's out there serving as our Protector, so show the kid some respect. Listen to this.
translation: 现在是大家喜欢的101号避难所小不点的最新消息。她在外面充当着我们的保护者，所以，对那孩子尊重一些。听听这个。

original: Now the latest on everyone's favorite runt from Vault 101. He's out there serving as our Protector, so show the kid some respect. Listen to this.
translation: 现在是大家喜欢的101号避难所小不点的最新消息。他在外面充当着我们的保护者，所以，对那孩子尊重一些。听听这个。

original: Hey! So whatever happened to that kid from Vault 101? Huh? Ooh! Ooh! I know! Man, that girl has turned into one hard-edged Wasteland Mercenary.
translation: 嘿！101号避难所的那孩子怎么样了？呃？哦！哦！我知道了！哥们，那女孩已成了锋芒毕露的废土雇佣兵。

original: Hey! So whatever happened to that kid from Vault 101? Huh? Ooh! Ooh! I know! Man, that cat has turned into one hard-edged Wasteland Mercenary.
translation: 嘿！101号避难所的那孩子怎么样了？呃？哦！哦！我知道了！哥们，那小伙已成了锋芒毕露的废土雇佣兵。

original: Question time, kids. You know what a Reaver is? It's a killer, a liar, a monster. In other words, it's that bastard from Vault 101. Check it out.
translation: 提问时间，孩子们。你们知道劫掠者是什么吗？它是一个杀手、一个骗子、一个怪物。换句话说，就是那从101号避难所出来的混球。快看看吧。

original: Question time, kids. You know what a Reaver is? It's a killer, a liar, a monster. In other words, it's that bitch from Vault 101. Check it out.
translation: 提问时间，孩子们。你们知道劫掠者是什么吗？它是一个杀手、一个骗子、一个怪物。换句话说，就是那从101号避难所出来的婊子。快看看吧。

original: Good news, kids! Our old friend from Vault 101 is - get this - still alive! Guess there is a God. Here's your update on the Ranger of the Wastes.
translation: 好消息，孩子们！我们101号避难所的老朋友——听好了——还活着！看来上帝还是存在的。下面是关于“废土游侠”的最新消息。

original: Got some news for you kiddies. Looks like that chick from Vault 101 is still kicking, awooooo. And now, a friendly update on the Vagabond of the Wastes.
translation: 有些消息要告诉你们这些小家伙。看来那来自101号避难所的小妞还在蹦蹦跳跳，噢噢噢。现在，是关于“废土浪人”的最新消息。

original: Got some news for you kiddies. Looks like that dude from Vault 101 is still kicking. Hawoo. And now, a friendly update on the Vagabond of the Wastes.
translation: 有些消息要告诉你们这些小家伙。看来那来自101号避难所的小子还在蹦蹦跳跳，哇哦。现在，是关于“废土浪人”的最新消息。

original: News flash! Listen up, children. Lock your damn doors. The Pirate of the Wastes is out there, wreaking havoc, wrecking lives. Here's the latest.
translation: 新闻快讯！听好了，孩子们。锁好你们该死的门。“废土流寇”就在外面，肆意破坏，摧残生命。以下最新消息。

original: It's time for an update on that Vault 101 Peacekeeper, a man who proves that not everyone out there... is a complete asshole.
translation: 是时候更新一下那个101号避难所“维和者”的消息了，这老兄证明了并不是每个人……都是彻头彻尾的混蛋。

original: It's time for an update on that Vault 101 Peacekeeper, a gal who proves that not everyone out there... is a complete asshole.
translation: 是时候更新一下那个101号避难所“维和者”的消息了，这姑娘证明了并不是每个人……都是彻头彻尾的混蛋。

original: It seems the lost little boy from Vault 101 has become quite the Adventurer these days...
translation: 看来，那个101号避难所的迷路小男孩如今已成了一名相当了得的探险家……

original: It seems the lost little girl from Vault 101 has become quite the Adventurer these days...
translation: 看来，那个101号避难所的迷路小女孩如今已成了一名相当了得的探险家……

original: You know her, you hate her. (How could you not?) She's the malignant Marauder who oozed out of Vault 101. You'll never guess what she's up to now.
translation: 你认识她，你憎恨她。（你怎能不恨？）她是闯出101号避难所的邪恶的“抢劫犯”。你永远猜不到她现在在干什么。

original: You know him, you hate him. (How could you not?) He's the malignant Marauder who oozed out of Vault 101. You'll never guess what he's up to now.
translation: 你认识他，你憎恨他。（你怎能不恨？）他是闯出101号避难所的邪恶的“抢劫犯”。你永远猜不到他现在在干什么。

original: Okay, children. I've got the skinny on the Capital Wasteland's newest, noblest Dignitary, that charming cat from Vault 101. Check this out.
translation: 好了，孩子们。我收到了首都废土最新兴的、最高贵的“显贵”的机密情报，那来自101号避难所的万人迷。来听听这。

original: Okay, children. I've got the skinny on the Capital Wasteland's newest Citizen. Curious? Of course you are. Check this out.
translation: 好了，孩子们。我收到了首都废土最新“平民”的机密情报。好奇吗？好奇就听我详说。

original: All right, faithful listeners, I know what you really want to know. What's that nasty Fatcat up to? Sharpening his claws, I bet...
translation: 好吧，忠实的听众们，我知道你们都想知道什么。那只龌龊的肥猫现在在做什么？我敢打赌，肯定在磨利她的爪子……

original: All right, faithful listeners, I know what you really want to know. What's that nasty Fatcat up to? Sharpening her claws, I bet...
translation: 现在，快看看大伙最亲爱的守卫者的最新消息吧，就是那一招将狂野废土上的邪恶击败的人。

original: Now, let's check out the latest on everyone's darling Defender, giving evil the one-two punch out there in the wooly Wasteland.
translation: 现在，让我们来看看大家喜爱的“守卫者”的最新消息，它将给荒原上的邪恶一记重拳。

original: Now, let's check out the latest on the Vault 101 Wanderer, as she, well, wanders.
translation: 现在，让我们来看看“101避难所漫游者”的最新消息，因为她，嗯，在闲逛。

original: Now, let's check out the latest on the Vault 101 Wanderer, as he, well, wanders.
translation: 现在，让我们来看看“101避难所漫游者”的最新消息，因为他，嗯，在闲逛。

original: Want to know the latest on that heartless little Plunderer from Vault 101? Here's the deal.
translation: 想知道那来自101号避难所的无情小“抢掠者”的最新消息吗？现在开始啰。

original: So what's everyone's favorite Sentinel been up to? Here's the latest on that sweet kid from Vault 101.
translation: 那么，大家喜欢的“防卫兵”最近在忙什么呢？下面是来自101号避难所的可爱孩子的最新消息。

original: So what's that brave little Seeker been up to? Here's the latest on the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 勇敢的小“寻求者”最近在忙什么呢？下面是来自101号避难所那孩子的最新消息。

original: So what's that creepy Opportunist been up to, huh? Here's the latest on the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 那么，那令人毛骨悚然的“投机者”在干什么呢？下面是来自101号避难所那孩子的最新消息。

original: And now the latest on that enigmatic Vault Martyr, who only recently stepped out of Vault 101 and into our hearts.
translation: 现在是那神秘的避难所义士的最新消息，就是那最近才走出101号避难所，走进我们的心中的人。

original: And now the latest on that enigmatic Vault Renegade, who only recently stepped out of Vault 101 and into our lives.
translation: 现在是关于神秘的避难所反叛者的最新消息，就是那最近才走出101号避难所，来到我们的生活中的人。

original: And now the latest on that enigmatic Vault Outlaw, who only recently stepped out of Vault 101 and into our nightmares.
translation: 现在是那神秘的避难所恶棍的最新消息，就是那最近才走出101号避难所，走进我们的噩梦的人。

original: Those Feral Ghouls that prefer the dark, dank underground? They ARE basically mindless zombies. So kill as many as you damn well please.
translation: 那些狂尸鬼比较偏爱阴暗潮湿的地下？他们基本上是没脑子的丧尸，所以你能杀多少就他妈的杀多少。

original: [Argyle] Super Mutants!
translation: [阿盖尔] 超级变种人！

original: Ah yes, one important caveat, kiddies.
translation: 啊，是的，一个郑重的警告，小孩。

original: So please, if you meet one of the Capital Wasteland's many Ghouls, leave your prejudice at the door an your pistol in its holster.
translation: 所以求求你，你要是在首都废土遇到一个尸鬼，抛开你的成见，收起你的武器。

original: Sure, they may look like hideous zombies from an old monster flick, but their hearts, their souls, their tears are all very much human.
translation: 当然，他们看起来像丑陋的丧尸，但他们的内心，他们的灵魂，他们的眼泪却是十足的人类。

original: This is the Overseer.
translation: 我是监督者。

original: [Chase] Out of the frying pan...
translation: [蔡斯] 刚出虎穴……

original: All residents of Vault 101 are hereby confined to their quarters.
translation: 101号避难所的全体居民，现通知你们留在自己的住处内。

original: The Radroach infestation is under control. Do NOT interfere with vault security personnel.
translation: 蟑螂的侵扰已得到控制。不要干扰避难所的警卫人员。

original: Any resident found outside his or her quarters will be dealt with. Severely.
translation: 任何发现不在自己房间的居民都将受到严惩。

original: That is all.
translation: 完毕。

original: I have information of great value to anyone willing to help me free my people.
translation: 谁愿意帮助我的人民，我就把这个有重大价值的信息告诉他。

original: [Dashwood] Now see here, you hulking horrors! This young lady has been through quite enough for one day! Holster your weapons or...
translation: [达什伍德] 你看看你们这些恐怖的家伙！这位年轻的女士已经受够了！收起你的武器，否则……

original: Please... help us.
translation: 请……帮助我们。

original: [Chase] Why is your Ghoul friend picking their pockets? This is no time for sticky fingers, Daring!
translation: [蔡斯] 为什么你那尸鬼朋友在扒他们的口袋？没时间小偷小摸了，“大胆”！

original: This is a high priority message, back-up is needed at our location.
translation: 这是紧急信息，我们这里需要支援。

original: [Dashwood] It's not what he's taking out my dear, but rather what he's putting in. Duck and Covveerrr!
translation: [达什伍德] 亲爱的，关键不是他取出了什么，而是他放进去了什么。卧倒与掩护呼呼呼！

original: Any personnel listening on this frequency, please report at once.
translation: 有谁听到这个频率的，请马上报到。

original: <loud explosions>
translation: <猛烈的爆炸声>

original: <Morse Code Clicking>
translation: <敲击摩斯密码>

original: [Argyle] Heh heh. The old "Shady Sands Shuffle." It sure brings me back. You two smoothskins okay?
translation: [阿盖尔] 嗨 嗨。这首老“沙漠绿洲舞曲”肯定能让我回忆起往日的时光。你们两个光皮肤还好吧？

original: My family and I have taken refuge in a drainage chamber not to far from a radio relay tower outside of DC.
translation: 我和家人在特区无线电转播台旁的一个排水通道里避难。

original: [Chase] My my, Argyle. You are rather resourceful for a Ghoul, aren't you?
translation: [蔡斯] 我我的，阿盖尔。作为一个尸鬼，你非常足智多谋，不是吗？

original: My boy is very sick and needs medical assistance, please help us if you can!  We are listening for your response on 3,950 kHz.
translation: 我的孩子病得很重，须要医疗的援助，如果你能帮忙请伸出援手！我们在3950赫兹等候回应。

original: [Dashwood] Are you kidding, my dear? Argyle has saved my skin more times than I care to remember. I hardly know how I got by before I met him.
translation: [达什伍德] 你在开玩笑吗，亲爱的？阿盖尔救我的次数多到我都记不清了。在遇到他之前，我几乎不知道自己是怎么熬过来的。

original: [Argyle] With all due respect, boss - you didn't. If you remember, it was me who got you out of that little "situation" in...
translation: [阿盖尔] 恕我直言，老板 — 你没有。如果你还记得，是我帮你摆脱了小“困境”在……

original: [Dashwood] Ahh, now, Argyle old chum. Let's not, um, bore the beautiful Miss Chase with those ancient exploits.
translation: [达什伍德] 啊，现在，阿盖尔，老伙计。别用那些老掉牙的英雄事迹来，呃，烦美丽的蔡斯小姐了.

original: [Chase] Oh, I don't know, Daring. For example, that name of yours. I happen to like  "Herbert." Why the...
translation: [蔡斯] 哦，我不知道，“大胆”。比如，你的名字。我碰巧喜欢“赫伯特”。为什么……

original: <sound of a child screaming>
translation: <一个孩子的尖叫声>

original: [Argyle] Boss, that sounds like a kid screaming! And it's coming from those ruins!
translation: [阿盖尔] 老板，那听起来像是一个孩子在尖叫！是从那些废墟里传来的！

original: [Dashwood] Quite right, old Chum. Save those questions, Miss Chase. If we survive what happens next, I may even answer them!
translation: [达什伍德] 很正确，老伙计。先别急着提问题，蔡斯小姐。如果我们能摆脱即将到来的险境，到时我或许会回答的！

original: Today's episode -- In the Black Widow's Web!
translation: 今天的节目 — 黑寡妇之网！

original: We're trapped on the roof of the Statesman Hotel by a large contingent of Super Mutants. We are low on ammo and running out of time.
translation: 一群超级变种人把我们围困在政要酒店的楼顶。我们的弹药快耗尽，坚持不了多久了。

original: Our time is running out and we are dangerously low on ammunition. Our broadcast point is the roof of the Statesman Hotel.
translation: 我们坚持不了多久了，弹药已经严重不足。我们是在政要酒店的楼顶发送求救信号。

original: Ammunition supply is running out and we've lost a man. We're pinned down on the roof of the Statesman Hotel by Super Mutants.
translation: 我们失去了一个人，弹药补给也快耗尽了。我们正在政要酒店楼顶被超级变种人压制。

original: Our supplies are running out and we've already sustained a casualty. We're trapped on the roof level of the Statesman Hotel.
translation: 我们的补给正在逐渐耗尽，人员也遭受了伤亡。我们现在被困在了政要酒店的楼顶。

original: If assistance is not possible, please attempt to contact Reilly, who's made for Underworld inside the Museum of History.
translation: 如果援助无法到达，请试着联系莱莉，她在历史博物馆内的冥界。

original: It's me again, Margaret the technician, talking into the microphone and hoping somebody gives a shit. Enjoy the music.
translation: 又是我，技师玛格丽特，对着麦克风唠叨，希望能引起谁的注意。让我们欣赏音乐。

original: I've invited our guest from Vault 101 to my office. Please do not impede her progress in any way.
translation: 我已经邀请来自101号避难所的客人来我的办公室，请大家不要阻拦。

original: [Dashwood] Well, those Super Mutants are persistent if nothing else! A word of advice - keep running!
translation: [达什伍德] 好吧，那些超级变种人真是锲而不舍！一句忠告--继续跑！

original: I've invited our guest from Vault 101 to my office. Please do not impede his progress in any way.
translation: 我已经邀请来自101号避难所的客人来我的办公室，请大家不要阻拦。

original: In fact, if you should see her, feel free to offer her directions or an escort.
translation: 要是你见到她的话，给他指明道路或是护送她吧。

original: In fact, if you should see him, feel free to offer him directions or an escort.
translation: 要是你见到他的话，给他指明道路或是护送他吧。

original: Thank you, and know that your hard work will pay off soon.
translation: 谢谢。你不会白白受那些苦的。

original: Any vault resident seen associating with the so-called "Rebels" will be detained, questioned, and disciplined appropriately.
translation: 任何避难所的居民被看到与所谓的反叛者有牵连的话，都会被拘留、询问并受到适度的惩罚。

original: [Chase] In those hills up there! Isn't that where the hidden village of Rockopolis is located? If only we knew where it was...
translation: [蔡斯] 就在那边那些山里！不就是“岩石城”隐秘村庄的所在地吗？要是我们知道它在哪……

original: Order WILL be restored. Discipline WILL be restored. Vault security personnel have been authorized to use deadly force if necessary.
translation: 秩序将会恢复，纪律将会重建。避难所的警卫人员已授权在必要情况下可以使用致命的武力。

original: Don't let it come to that. This vault will be one big, happy family again. One way or another.
translation: 不要走到那一步。避难所应该是一个快乐的大家庭，无论如何实现。

original: Any vault resident seen associating with the so-called "Rebels" will be detained, questioned, and disciplined appropriately.
translation: 任何避难所的居民被看到与所谓的反叛者有牵连的话，都会被拘留、询问并受到适度的惩罚。

original: Order WILL be restored. Discipline WILL be restored. Vault security personnel have been authorized to use deadly force if necessary.
translation: 秩序将会恢复，纪律将会重建。避难所的警卫人员已授权在必要情况下可以使用致命的武力。

original: Don't let it come to that. Haven't you always been happy? Haven't we always been a... a family?
translation: 别让事情变成那样，你们不是一直都快乐吗？我们不是一直都是……一家人吗？

original: Amata... Stop this madness. You're disrupting everyone's life, everyone's happiness. Come home. Just... come home.
translation: 阿玛塔……别疯了。你破坏了每个人的生活，每个人的幸福。回家吧，快……回家吧。

original: And everything can be the way it was.
translation: 一切将回复原貌。

original: It feels like you left home a long time ago, but I know you're still out there. I just hope you're still alive to hear this.
translation: 感觉你已经离家很久了，但我知道你还在外面。我只是希望你能活着听到这些。

original: [Dashwood] Turns out you're in good company, Miss Chase. Argyle and I are old friends of Rockopolis. Know the secret knock and everything!
translation: [达什伍德] 原来不止你一个，蔡斯小姐。阿盖尔和我是岩石城的老朋友。知道敲击暗号和所有事！

original: Things got worse after you left. My father's gone mad with power. If you can hear this, please stop looking for your dad and help stop mine.
translation: 你走后情况更糟了。我父亲因权力而昏了头脑。如果你能听到，请暂停寻找你的爸爸，帮助阻止我爸。

original: [Argyle] Boss! That's privileged information! You can't just...
translation: [阿盖尔] 老板！那是机密信息！你不能就……

original: Things got worse after you left. The new Overseer is insane. If you can hear this, please stop looking for your dad and help save us.
translation: 你走后情况更糟了。新的监督者疯了。如果你能听到，请暂停寻找你的爸爸，帮助拯救我们。

original: I changed the door password to my name. If you're hearing this, and you still care enough to help me, you should remember it.
translation: 我把大门的密码改成了我的名字。如果你能听见，如果你还在意来帮我，你就应该记住。

original: [Dashwood] Now now, old chum! Miss Chase is hardly going to violate the secrets of Rockopolis. Isn't that right, Miss Chase? Besides, necessity calls!
translation: [达什伍德] 好了 好了，老伙计！蔡斯小姐绝不会泄露岩石城的秘密。对吗，蔡斯小姐？再说，也是迫不得已！

original: Why do you continue to send your boys to die for your capitalist masters?
translation: 你们为何要为了资本家主人而将孩子们推向死亡？

original: [Chase] So you do know where it is! Well come on then, those Super Mutants can't be far behind!
translation: [蔡斯] 所以你知道它在哪了！那就快点吧，那些超级变种人就在后面不远了！

original: Your boys are dying on the Alaska front, and all for nothing. Bring them home, before it is too late.
translation: 你们的孩子正在阿拉斯加无谓地丧生。趁为时未晚，快让他们回家吧。

original: The gang of Wall Street fat cats, and their Washington war-monger puppets, have plunged the world into war to line their own...
translation: 华尔街那群财主，以及他们那帮在华盛顿发动战争的走狗，让世界陷入战争，以满足他们自己的……

original: [Dashwood] Just over here! This large boulder! And now... the secret knock. <knocking> And... voila!
translation: [达什伍德] 就在这！这块大石头！现在……敲击出暗号。<敲击声>然后……瞧！

original: Do you think your leaders will keep you safe if the bombs fall? You will die while the Wall Street gang and their hangers-on live like kings in...
translation: 当核弹爆炸时，你以为领导人会管你的死活吗？你们会死，而华尔街黑帮和他们的随从却会像国王一样生活在……

original: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
translation: 自由，当它扎根于沃土，便会蓬勃生长。

original: [Chase] Now that's what I call a getaway, Daring! So tell me, do you take all your girlfriends here?
translation: [蔡斯] 这就是我所说的度假地，“大胆”！那么告诉我，你会带你所有的女朋友来这？

original: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.
translation: 纪律乃军队之灵魂。它使寡者不可小觑、弱者所向披靡，令天下人对你俯首称臣。

original: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
translation: 亲贤士，以固声名；远竖子，宁为独行。

original: Arbitrary power is most easily established on the ruins of liberty abused to licentiousness.
translation: 无节制地滥用自由是专制最好的温床。

original: Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?
translation: 我把敌人变成了朋友，还不算消灭敌人吗？

original: Avoid popularity if you would have peace.
translation: 人无盛名，自得安宁。

original: Everybody likes a compliment.
translation: 每个人都喜欢赞扬！

original: America will never be destroyed from the outside. If we falter and lose our freedoms, it will be because we destroyed ourselves.
translation: 美国绝不会从外部被摧毁。我们只有先摧毁自己，才会畏缩着失去自由。

original: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
translation: 欢乐潜藏在成功的愉悦与致力于创造的兴奋之中。

original: We can afford all that we need; but we can not afford all that we want.
translation: 我们能负担自身的需求；但我们不能负担自身的奢求。

original: This generation of Americans has a rendezvous with destiny.
translation: 这一代美国人，是天命的一代。

original: A good leader can't get too far ahead of his followers.
translation: 一个好的领导者不会离他的追随者太远。

original: The people under our system, like the king in a monarchy, never dies.
translation: 在我们体制中的人民，宛如帝国的皇帝，万寿无疆。

original: It is easier to do a job right than to explain why you didn't.
translation: 与其辩解为什么做不好，还不如把事情做好。

original: No evil can result from its inhibition more pernicious than its toleration.
translation: 对于奴隶制，没有比容忍它更加有害的罪恶了。

original: The government should not be guided by Temporary Excitement, but by Sober Second Thought.
translation: 政府不应受眼前利益蛊惑，而应深思熟虑。

original: May our country be always successful, but whether successful or otherwise, always right.
translation: 愿我们的国家一直成功，但无论是否成功，都永远正确。

original: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
translation: 勇气与信念都有魔法护佑，在它们面前，艰难险阻都会烟消云散。

original: ...The manners of women are the surest criterion by which to determine whether a republican government is practicable in a nation or not.
translation: ……女子的举止是一个共和政府在一个国家中是否可行当之无愧的试金石。

original: Old minds are like old horses; you must exercise them if you wish to keep them in working order.
translation: 旧的头脑就像老马，你必须训练才能让它们保持工作状态。

original: The price of freedom is eternal vigilance.
translation: 自由的代价是永远警惕。

original: Commerce with all nations, alliance with none, should be our motto.
translation: 广开外贸，不结同盟，是我们的座右铭。

original: A coward is much more exposed to quarrels than a man of spirit.
translation: 懦夫比有气概的人更容易争吵。

original: Do not bite at the bait of pleasure, till you know there is no hook beneath it.
translation: 贪小便宜吃大亏。

original: I have never advocated war except as a means of peace.
translation: 除非为了和平，我从不鼓吹战争。

original: Nations, like individuals, are punished for their transgressions.
translation: 民族，和个人一样，终将因他们的罪行而受到惩罚。

original: Labor disgraces no man, but occasionally men disgrace labor.
translation: 劳动不嫌弃任何人，但人们有时却会嫌弃劳动。

original: There never was a time when, in my opinion, some way could not be found to prevent the drawing of the sword.
translation: 在我看来，从未有过时代能够阻止战争。

original: And now, one of my inspirational quotes. From the mouth of your President, John Henry Eden, straight to your heart.
translation: 现在，请听我的一句励志名言。出自你们总统，约翰·亨利·伊登之口，直达你们的内心。

original: [Dashwood] Oh, no, Miss Chase! I can assure you, this will be our special place.
translation: [达什伍德] 哦，不，蔡斯小姐！我能保证，这将是我们专属的地方。

original: Comfort, recreation, healthy competition - all will live again! This country WILL live again!
translation: 舒适、愉快、健康的竞争 — 都将获得重生！这国家定将重生！

original: [Argyle] Listen to yourself, boss! This is Rockopolis! One of the safest places in the Wasteland, and you just showed a stranger where it is!
translation: [阿盖尔] 听听你说了什么，老板！这是岩石城！废土上最安全的地方之一，而你刚刚给一个陌生人指出了它在哪！

original: Put your faith in John Henry Eden, great America, and baseball will live again!
translation: 相信约翰·亨利·伊登吧，伟大的美利坚，棒球也将重获新生！

original: What if they could compete with baseball teams, from Pennsylvania, or Maryland?
translation: 如果从宾夕法尼亚到马里兰都有棒球比赛，那会怎么样？

original: Now ask yourself this. What if the Capital Congressmen could live again?
translation: 现在扪心自问吧。假如首都议员球队能够重生，又会如何？

original: If only for an afternoon.
translation: 就算只有一个下午。

original: Their name? The Capital Congressmen. Their purpose? To make you, dear America, revel in the joy of sport and sunshine.
translation: 他们的名字？首都议员球队。他们的目的？让你们，亲爱的美利坚，沉醉于阳光与运动的愉悦之中。

original: And on the horizon, they appear, like knights of yore, armed with bats of ash and hickory.
translation: 他们出现了，从地平线上走来，如同往昔的骑士，握着灰桃木球棒。

original: Imagine, a perfect, cloudless day. The sun is warm, welcoming.
translation: 想像一下，晴空万里，阳光温暖。

original: That's right, America. Before we were devastated by atomic war, each state had its OWN professional baseball team.
translation: 对啊，美利坚。在我们被核弹摧毁之前，每个州都拥有自己的职业棒球队。

original: I am referring, of course, to our great national pastime - baseball. Or so it had been.
translation: 当然，我是指我们伟大的国家的往事 — 棒球。当时就是这样。

original: I've been thinking quite a bit lately about something we can all relate to, something that is unquestionably, inescapably... American.
translation: 我一直在想有什么我们都能感同身受的，一件毋庸置疑、无法回避的……美国化的东西。

original: A place to truly call... home.
translation: 一个真正叫做……家的地方。

original: [Dashwood] Ignore my manservant's mutterings, Penelope. He has a penchant for the dramatic you see. Why one time...
translation: [达什伍德] 佩内洛普，不要理会我男仆的咕囔。他喜欢戏剧性的东西，你懂的。为什么有一次……

original: As President of the United States, you have my solemn pledge that I will never rest, NEVER rest, until we all have what we deserve.
translation: 作为合众国总统，我向你们庄重承诺，我将永不停歇，永不停歇，直至我们都获得我们应得的东西。

original: Don't you, my darling America, deserve that? Don't you deserve a future free of war, and fear, and terrible uncertainty? Of course, you do.
translation: 我亲爱的美利坚，难道你不该享有吗？难道你不应有一个没有战争、恐惧和不确定的未来？你当然值得。

original: Rest assured, I will not make the mistakes of my predecessors. When John Henry Eden builds a country, he builds it to last. The American way.
translation: 敬请放心，我不会重蹈我前任的覆辙。当约翰·亨利·伊登建立一个国家，他将从始至终，奉行美利坚的道路。

original: Our intrepid leaders had everything they wanted. Power. Wealth. Prestige. And it made them lazy, America. Oh yes. And laziness breeds stupidity.
translation: 我们无畏的领导者拥有他们想要的一切。力量、财富、威望。这使得他们懒惰了，美利坚。哦，是的，懒惰孳生愚蠢。

original: The answer is really quite simple. Incompetence. Incompetence at the highest echelons of power. We put our trust, our faith, in halfwits.
translation: 答案无比简单。无能。权力最高层的无能。我们把信任与信仰寄托在一群半吊子身上。

original: The Capital Wasteland... How did it come to this, America? How did your leaders allow the most powerful nation on Earth... to die?
translation: 首都废土……怎么变成这样的，美利坚？你的领袖怎能允许地球上最为强大的国家……走向灭亡？

original: Indeed, the very seat of the federal government, Washington D.C., has been reduced to what is now known as the "Capital Wasteland."
translation: 其实，联邦政府的核心，华盛顿特区，如今已经作为首都废土被广为人知。

original: We live in an age of poverty, greed, violence... destruction.
translation: 我们生活在一个贫困、贪婪、血腥……毁灭的时代。

original: Democracy, dear America. Democracy, now... and forever.
translation: 民主，亲爱的美利坚。民主，现在……直至永远。

original: [Chase] Oh, I don't know, Daring darling. I find the ghoul's instincts to be... frighteningly accurate.
translation: [蔡斯] 哦，我不知道，亲爱的“大胆”。我发现尸鬼的直觉……准得吓人。

original: And that person will have our full faith and confidence, and carry our collective values forward, into the future.
translation: 而那个人将拥有我们全部的信仰与信心，并承载我们的共同价值，努力前行，开拓未来。

original: Of course, when the time comes, when my term is up, America will be free to elect a new President.
translation: 当然，等时机成熟，等我任期届满，美利坚将能够自由地选出一位新总统。

original: But rest assured, I am your President because the appropriate people of this great nation decided I should be! I AM your duly elected representative.
translation: 但毋庸置疑的是，我是你们的总统，因为这伟大国度的核心人物认为我应当如此！我正是你们合法选择的代表。

original: Unfortunately, in the interest of national security, I'm not at liberty to discuss the details of the election. You understand.
translation: 遗憾的是，出于国家安全考虑，我无法谈及有关选举的详细资料。你们明白的。

original: To that I must answer of course! Of course I was elected, sweet America! Isn't the right to vote the very foundation of a democracy?
translation: 对那而言，我必须回答“当然”！我当然是获选的，可爱的美利坚！投票权难道不是民主的基石吗？

original: Or, whether or not I had been elected at all!
translation: 或者说，我是否是获选的！

original: The question has been raised, I know, as to just how I came to be elected to this most illustrious office.
translation: 有人提出这个问题，我知道，正如我如何被选入这间最为著名的办公室。

original: It's time we discussed something rather important. The issue at hand is, well, my presidency.
translation: 是时候让我们讨论一些重要的问题了。当下的焦点是，唔，我的总统宝座。

original: The Enclave will restore peace, order, and prosperity to this great nation. And those who oppose us will be... removed. Forever.
translation: 英克雷将为这伟大的国度重建和平、秩序与繁荣。而反对我们的那些人将被……清除。永远的。

original: [Dashwood] Here I thought we were friends. And now you have a gun in my face. Bad form, Miss Chase. Bad form.
translation: [达什伍德] 我以为我们是朋友了。现在你却拿枪指着我的脸。太没礼貌了，蔡斯小姐。太差劲了。

original: Lawlessness, terror, murder. They're all around us, I know. I know. But not for long, sweet America. Not for long. Oh no.
translation: 无法无天，恐怖行径，烧杀掠夺。它们无处不在，我知道。但这不会长久了，可爱的美利坚。不会长久了。不会了。

original: And last but not least, the hideously mutated Super Mutants that have completely overrun the entire downtown D.C. area.
translation: 最后但同样重要的，可怕的超级变种人已经完全侵占了特区市区。

original: What about the Slavers of Paradise falls? The frighteningly irradiated ghouls of Underworld?
translation: 那堕落天堂的奴隶贩子呢？冥界那些可怕的辐射尸鬼呢？

original: And don't be fooled, America. Those who have left the Brotherhood of Steel, branded Outcasts, are just as dangerous. Even more so, being in exile.
translation: 别受骗，美利坚。那些离开钢铁兄弟会，号称“放逐者”的家伙同样危险。甚至更危险。

original: Criminals who have had the audacity to claim this country's most important military installation, the Pentagon, as their own personal clubhouse!
translation: 那些胆大妄为的罪犯，竟然把这个国家最重要的军事设施，五角大楼，变成了他们的私人俱乐部！

original: These power-armored boy scouts are nothing more than common criminals with access to some antiquated technology.
translation: 那些穿着动力装甲的童子军只是些拥有古董科技的普通罪犯。

original: The so-called "Brotherhood of Steel." Don't be fooled by their pseudo-knightly nonsense or supposed connections to the United States Army.
translation: 那所谓的“钢铁兄弟会”。别被他们冒牌骑士的谎言，或者与合众国军队有关的假象给骗了。

original: There are, of course, the Raiders. Those anarchistic ruffians who roam the wastes, preying on any an all, stealing, murdering.
translation: 当然啦，有掠夺者。这些无视政府的暴徒在废土上游荡，肆意掠夺，偷摸盗窃，杀戮成性。一群禽兽。

original: Let's take a tally of these agitators, shall we?
translation: 让我们来统计一下这些煽动者，如何？

original: These radical malcontents don't care about you. They don't care about America. All they care about is fulfilling their own selfish desires.
translation: 这些激进的不满者才不在乎你们。他们不在乎美利坚。他们只在乎满足自己的私欲。

original: Did you know, there are those amongst us who would shatter our hopes for peace, order, and security?
translation: 你们知道吗，我们中有人希望毁掉对于和平、秩序和安全的希望吗？

original: The values of our past... shall be the foundation of our future.
translation: 我们的过往的价值……应该是我们未来的根基。

original: [Chase] Jabber all you want. In about 30 seconds, my associates from Paradise Falls will join us.
translation: [蔡斯] 想说什么就说吧么。再过30秒，我的帮手就要从天堂瀑过来加入我们了。

original: We will rebuild the American family, as it was, as it was meant to be!
translation: 我们将重建美国大家园，和从前一样，和注定的一样！

original: We will match up the destitute, orphaned children of the Capital Wasteland with qualified, eligible adults.
translation: 我们将把首都废土上的贫民、孤儿分配给合格、适龄的成年人。

original: The Enclave will restore every American school, reinstate every youth program, and offer counseling and financial assistance to any family in need.
translation: 英克雷将重建每一座美国的学校，恢复对青少年的教育，还要对每一户有需求的家庭提供精神与资金的帮助。

original: That changes! Right here! Right now! From this moment onward, the children of this great nation are its highest priority!
translation: 要改变！就从现在！就从这里！从此以后，这个伟大国家的儿童拥有最优先的权利！

original: Well, we both know the answer, don't we? None. America's children live a terrifying, meaningless existence. There is no hope. No happiness.
translation: 我们都知道答案，对吧？没有。美利坚的孩子们生活在恐怖、毫无意义的氛围中。没有希望，更没有欢乐。

original: So let me ask you, America. How many of your children can say the same?  How many of this nation's youth are truly happy, truly carefree?
translation: 那让我问问你，美利坚。你们有多少孩子可以这么说？这个国家有多少青少年真正开心，真正无忧无虑？

original: It was, for a little boy, the perfect existence.
translation: 对于一个小孩来说，那是完美的生活方式。

original: Oh ho ho, the adventures we had! From Knob Creek to Hodgenville we roamed, carefree and courageous, irresponsible and completely inseparable.
translation: 哦嗬嗬，我们的冒险经历！从诺布溪到霍金维尔，我们信步畅游，无忧无虑，无所畏惧，轻松畅快，完全分不开。

original: When I was a child, growing up in rural Kentucky, I had the best friend a boy could hope for -- my dear old dog, Honey.
translation: 当我还是个在肯塔基农村里成长的小孩时，我拥有一个男孩子所希望得到的最好的朋友--我忠实的老狗‘宝贝’。

original: One Enclave. One America. Now... and forever.
translation: 一个英克雷。一个美利坚。从今天……直至永恒。

original: [Argyle] I knew it! I knew this dame was no good! But it's worse than I thought. She's the Black Widow! The leader of the Slavers!
translation: [阿盖尔] 我就知道！我就知道这女人不是什么好东西！但情况比我想的更糟。她是黑寡妇！奴隶贩子的头！

original: But only together, TOGETHER, can we hope to reach our full potential. The way we were before the war. Whole. Beautiful. Powerful.
translation: 但是只有同心协力，团结起来，我们才有可能发挥我们所有的潜能。回归战前的我们。完整、美好、强大。

original: So, as your President, I am the voice, I am the heart and soul, of the Enclave. That is to say, I am the voice, heart, and soul... of America.
translation: 因此，作为你们的总统，我是英克雷的喉舌、心脏与灵魂。亦即是说，我是美利坚的喉舌、心脏与灵魂。

original: And, well, yes... the Enclave is me, as well.  Ha ha ha. As your President, it's my responsibility to preside over our great democracy.
translation: 而且，是啊……英克雷也就是我。哈哈哈。作为你们的总统，我有责任统帅我们伟大的民主。

original: Just who is the Enclave? Why, that's simple. The Enclave is you, America. The Enclave is your sister, your aunt, your friend, your neighbor.
translation: 到底谁是英克雷？很简单。英克雷即是你，美利坚。英克雷是你的姊妹，你的姑妈，你的朋友，你的邻居。

original: Let's talk about government, shall we? Or, more specifically, YOUR government, dear America - the Enclave.
translation: 我们来谈谈政府吧。哦，准确地讲，是你的政府，亲爱的美利坚 — 也就是英克雷。

original: Music placeholder.
translation: 音乐占位符。

original: [Chase] Quite right. We've been trying to capture these Rockopolis rodents for years. Never could have done it without you, Daring.
translation: [蔡斯] 非常正确。多年来我们一直想抓住这些岩石城的啮齿动物。“大胆”，没有你，我们永远也做不到。

original: So celebrate! Sing out! America is back! America IS beautiful!
translation: 欢呼吧！歌唱吧！美利坚重归了！美利坚如此美好！

original: Just a little bit more time. That's all we need until the purifier is ready for continual operation. And then, your thirst will truly be quenched!
translation: 再多一点时间。我们便可令净水工程持续运转。届时，你们将不再干渴！

original: Imagine, America - millions, MILLIONS of gallons of water, made fresh, clean, and completely pure. In a matter of minutes! And it's all for you!
translation: 想想吧，美利坚 — 上百万，上百万加仑的水，新鲜、清澈、纯净。过不了多久了！而且都是你们的！

original: For years, Enclave scientists have been hard at work on the most ambitious scientific endeavor the world has ever seen! Project Purity!
translation: 经年累月，英克雷的科学家们不辍地工作，努力攻克整个世界最具挑战的科学高峰！净水工程!

original: Well I'm going to tell you, right here, right now, those days are at an end! The Enclave is back, America, and we've brought clean water with us!
translation: 让我现在来告诉你们，那种日子到头了！英克雷回来了，美利坚，我们还带来了纯净的水！

original: But that's not really living, is it? You're simply existing, America. Postponing death for a day or two.
translation: 但那不是真正的生活，对吧？你不过仍在苟延残喘而已，美利坚。只是将死亡延迟几日罢了。

original: Maybe you've got a makeshift purifier that cleans one glass of dirty water a day. Or you sip from an ancient faucet in an abandoned subway restroom.
translation: 或许你有一个临时的净水装置，每天可以过滤一杯脏水。或许，你是在一个废弃的地铁休息室里，在一个陈旧的水龙头上嘬两口。

original: Water is the foundation of life. But here in the Capital Wasteland, indeed in the entire country, water is polluted. Irradiated. Deadly.
translation: 水是生命之源。但是，在首都废土，实际上，在整片国土上，水被污染了。具有放射性，致命。

original: You're thirsty, aren't you America? Not for knowledge or power, no. I'm not speaking metaphorically. You're thirsty for clean, fresh water. Hmm?
translation: 你很渴，不是吗，美利坚？不是渴求知识或力量，不。我并未做什么比喻。你渴求净水，对吗？

original: Together, we'll restore the glory of this great nation. One problem at a time.
translation: 团结起来，我们要恢复这个宏伟国家的荣耀。逐个解决问题。

original: [Dashwood] Looks like I've gotten us into one heck of a pickle, Argyle old chum. One heck of a pickle indeed...
translation: [达什伍德] 好像我让我们陷入大麻烦了，阿盖尔老伙计。真正的大麻烦……

original: Very good, Colonel. Very good! So there you have it, my darling America. Enclave troops are now in your neighborhoods, in your lives, in your hearts.
translation: 非常好，上校，非常好！就是这样，我挚爱的美利坚。英克雷的兵士就在你的社区，在你的生活中，在你的心中。

original: [Colonel Autumn] Just stay out of the way and let us do our job. Interfere with the Enclave's mission, and you will be dealt with. Harshly.
translation: [奥特姆上校] 别挡着我们干正事的路。干扰英克雷的任务，我们就会收拾你。严惩不贷。

original: [Colonel Autumn] When you see the Enclave, you see the United States government. We are authorized to restore order and civility, by any means necessary.
translation: [奥特姆上校] 当你看到英克雷，就等于看到了合众国政府。我们受命使用任何必要的手段，恢复秩序与文明。

original: [Colonel Autumn] People of the Capital Wasteland. I am Colonel Autumn. By now, you have encountered Enclave troops in your towns, in your settlements.
translation: [奥特姆上校] 首都废土上的人们，我是奥特姆上校。从现在起，你们会在城镇和聚居地见到英克雷的部队。

original: [Colonel Autumn] Thank you, Mr. President.
translation: [奥特姆上校] 谢谢您，总统先生。

original: But let's hear from the man himself, shall we, America? I give you - Colonel Augustus Autumn!
translation: 但让我们听听他本人怎么说吧，好吗？美利坚，有请——奥古斯塔斯·奥特姆上校！

original: These fine men and women, under the command of the stalwart Colonel Augustus Autumn, have one mission: the restoration of American peace and order.
translation: 这些优秀的男女，在忠诚的奥古斯塔斯·奥特姆上校的指挥下，只有一个使命：重建美利坚的和平与秩序。

original: The Enclave is back, America! And no, not just on your radio. Right now Enclave troops are patrolling the Capital Wasteland!
translation: 英克雷回来了，美利坚！不，不只是在你的收音机里。现在，英克雷的部队正在首都废土巡逻。

original: God bless the Enclave! God bless America!
translation: 主佑英克雷！主佑美利坚！

original: Today's episode - Between Rockopolis and a Hard Place!
translation: 今天的节目 — 岩石城和抉择！

original: I am President John Henry Eden, and this is my pledge -- no one, NO ONE will take this great nation away from me!
translation: 我是约翰·亨利·伊登总统，这是我的誓言——没有人，没人能将这伟大的国家从我手中夺去！

original: The Brotherhood of Steel will fail! All those who oppose the Enclave will fail!
translation: 钢铁兄弟会必亡！一切反对英克雷的人都必亡！

original: Let them come! Wave upon traitorous wave will crash against the Enclave's walls!
translation: 让他们来吧！叛变者的浪潮终将在英克雷的铜墙铁壁上撞得粉碎！

original: It is only a matter of time before the traitors march on the purifier, and attempt to take it by force.
translation: 反叛者早晚会进攻净水器，企图强行夺取。

original: The Brotherhood of Steel, in their arrogance, has claimed Project Purity as their own! They would steal the Enclave's work, steal America's water!
translation: 钢铁兄弟会傲慢地宣称净水工程是他们的！他们想窃取英克雷的成果，窃取美利坚的水源！

original: Even as I speak these words, fearless Enclave soldiers are fortifying their positions at the great water purifier, bracing for an inevitable assault.
translation: 就在我讲话的时候，无畏的英克雷士兵正在伟大的净水器那加固阵地，准备迎接不可避免的袭击。

original: In short, my dearest America - we are at war.
translation: 简而言之，我挚爱的美利坚——我们正身处战争中。

original: Our great nation once more threatens to crumble, to topple into the sea of lawlessness and despair that have ruled us all for over 200 years.
translation: 我们伟大的国家再次面临崩溃的威胁，即将陷入统治我们两百多年的无法无天和绝望的海洋。

original: Reflect upon all I have said, my America. Reflect and wait. For soon this great nation will be reborn, and the Enclave will be its salvation.
translation: 考虑一下我所有的话吧，我的美利坚。思考并且等待。因为很快，这伟大的国家就将重生，而英克雷将是它的拯救者。

original: Margaret here, bringing you... music. Why just music? Because I'm just a technician, and some asshole murdered our DJ. Hooray.
translation: 这是玛格丽特，带给你……音乐。为什么只有音乐？因为我只是个技师，我们的DJ被一个混蛋给杀了。

original: And now, dearest America, we must say farewell. For there is much work to be done, and the Enclave never rests. Never.
translation: 现在，最亲爱的美利坚，我们要道别了。因为有众多的工作需要完成，而英克雷永不止歇。永不。

original: But for now, my America, we must part. Restoring the greatest country in the world to its former glory, well, haha, well, that takes time, even for the Enclave.
translation: 但眼下，我的美利坚，我们必须分开了。让世界上最伟大的国家恢复昔日的荣光，好吧，哈哈，好吧，这需要时间，即使对英克雷来说也是如此。

original: So remember, America. The Enclave is working around the clock to return this country to greatness. All you need is a little patience, a little faith.
translation: 因此牢记吧，美利坚。英克雷正在昼夜不停地为恢复这国家的宏伟而奔忙。你们所需要的，就是一点点耐心，一点点信心。

original: We've got to part now, you and I, but don't be sad, America. The Enclave is working tirelessly to rebuild this great nation, so you don't have to.
translation: 我们必须分开了，你和我。但是别难过，美利坚。英克雷正在不倦地重建这个伟大的国度，所以你无须哀怨。

original: Hello, my beautiful America. This is President Eden, and it's time we had a talk.
translation: 你好啊，我美丽的美利坚。我是伊登总统，又到我们的对话时间了。

original: [Chase] Just ease away, zombie. No funny business...
translation: [蔡斯] 慢慢来，丧尸。别耍花招……

original: Hello again, America the magnificent. This is President Eden, and I was hoping we could talk.
translation: 再次向华贵的美利坚问好。我是伊登总统，我期待着我们能聊聊。

original: Sweet America. Hello again. This is President Eden, and I'd like to have a chat.
translation: 可爱的美利坚，你们好。我是伊登总统，很高兴能与你们谈谈。

original: Greetings, dearest America. This is your President, John Henry Eden. Let's chat, shall we?
translation: 好啊，我挚爱的美利坚。我是你们的总统，约翰·亨利·伊登。我们来聊聊，如何？

original: Greetings again, sweet America. This is President John Henry Eden, and I'd like to chat, if you've got a moment.
translation: 再次向你们问好，可爱的美利坚。我是约翰·亨利·伊登总统，如果你们有空的话，我想跟你们聊聊天。

original: Hello again, America. This is John Henry Eden, your President. There are some things we should talk about, if that's all right.
translation: 你们好啊，美利坚。我是约翰·亨利·伊登，你们的总统。如果没关系的话，有些事情我们需要谈一谈。

original: This is President Eden, and you're listening to Enclave Radio -- the Voice of America.
translation: 我是伊登总统，你正在收听的是英克雷电台——美利坚之音。

original: [Argyle] Funny business? Miss Chase, you hurt my feelings. I mean, there ain't nothin' funny about... the Eagle Clawwww!!!
translation: [阿盖尔] 别耍花招？蔡斯小姐，你伤害了我的感情。我是说，那可不有趣关于……鹰爪抓抓！！！

original: I'm President John Henry Eden and you're listening to Enclave Radio -- the voice of warmth and reason in this cold, unreasonable world.
translation: 我是约翰·亨利·伊登总统，你正在收听的是英克雷电台——在这冰冷、不智的世界中的温暖与理智的声音。
