original: You're listening to Enclave Radio. I'm John Henry Eden, President of the Enclave, President of America, President... of your heart.
translation: 你正在收听的是英克雷电台，我是约翰·亨利·伊登，英克雷总统，美利坚的总统，你心中的……总统。

original: This is Enclave Radio, with your host -- me! President John Henry Eden.
translation: 这是英克雷电台，主持人是——我！约翰·亨利·伊登总统！

original: Here's the latest news. Unemployment is down, stocks are up, and the U.N. has just declared global peace forever! Now the real news. *Sigh*
translation: 最新消息。失业率下降，股市上涨，联合国刚刚宣布全球永久和平！现在才是真正的新闻。*叹气*

original: Everyone ready for the Capital Wasteland's latest news? Me neither, but it's that time again.
translation: 大家准备好听首都废土的最新新闻了吗？我还没有，但又到了这个时候。

original: What rhymes with "shoes" and often gives you the blues? That's right, it's time for the cashews! Okay, that doesn't really rhyme. How 'bout... news?
translation: 什么与“鞋子(shoes)”押韵，经常让你感到忧郁？没错，就是腰果(cashews)！好吧，这并不押韵。那……新闻(news)怎么样？

original: Let me ask you something, children. You hungry for some 200-year old Salisbury steak, or you hungry for some news? I'm guessing news. Haha. Here ya go.
translation: 孩子们，我问你们。你是想吃200年的索尔兹伯里肉饼，还是想听新闻？我猜是新闻。开始啰。

original: So get your glasses ready, children. This round's on me.
translation: 所以把你的杯子准备好了，孩子们。这次我请客。

original: [Chase] Aggghhhh!
As I speak, the Brotherhood is working with Rivet City security to get that fresh water to the Wasteland. The caravans are coming!
translation: 就在我说话的时候，兄弟会正在与铆钉城保安把那些干净的水送往废土。小篷车就来了!

original: God, ain't that beautiful? But even better, it's finally happened! The water is clean, and hell yes, it's free! Just a little patience, children.
translation: 天啊，是不是很漂亮？但更重要的，最后成真了！水是干净无害的,它是免费的！只要有点耐心，孩子们。

original: See, she was a scientist too, worked on that project. You know what she wanted? "The waters of life. Free and clean, for any and all."
translation: 看，她也是科学家，参与那项目。你知道她想要什么吗？“生命之水。干净的、免费的，给所有的人。”

original: Now you all remember James, right? Father of 101? Well, Three Dog has learned that back in the day, James' wife had a dream.
translation: 现在你们记住了詹姆斯，对吗？101小子的父亲？嗯，三狗在以前已经认识了，詹姆斯妻子的梦想。

original: Two weeks. It's been two weeks since our boys in Power Armor kicked those Enclave bastards out of Project Purity, and started that baby chugging.
translation: 两个星期。两周前，我们的小伙穿着穿动力装甲把英克雷混蛋踢出净水工程，并启动那婴儿咕噜咕噜地咕噜。

original: Three Dog's advice? If you've got one of those Mister Dandy butler bots, have him make you some purified water, and count yourself lucky.
translation: 三狗的建议？如果你有一个丹迪先生管家机器人，让他给你做一些纯化水，算你走运。

original: [Dashwood] Good God, Argyle! You... You ripped out her heart!
translation: [达什伍德] 天哪，阿盖尔！你……你把她的心挖出来了！

original: The water going 'round may be free, but it sure as hell ain't clean. So when you see that caravan comin', tell 'em to keep on going.
translation: 水可能是免费的，但肯定不干净的。所以，当你看到大篷车来的时候，告诉他们继续走。

original: Coincidence? Three Dog thinks not. For all their good intentions, it looks like those eggheads at the Jefferson Memorial screwed up royally.
translation: 巧合吗？三狗认为不是。杰斐逊纪念馆的那些书呆子虽然用心良苦，但似乎还是把事情搞砸了。

original: It also happens that this new illness ONLY started showin' up AFTER the Brotherhood started distributing so-called "clean" water from that purifier.
translation: 而且，这种新的疾病也是在兄弟会开始从净化器中分发所谓的“干净的”水之后，才开始出现的。

original: Experience would tell ya this is your garden variety radiation sickness, but nuh uh. This is something else, children. Something worse. Much worse.
translation: 经验告诉你，这只是普通的辐射病，但不是。这不是一般的病，孩子们。更糟的东西。严重得多。

original: People are gettin' sick. Sicker than usual, I mean. Weakness, nausea, you name it. Even a couple of deaths reported.
translation: 人们生病了。我是说比平时更难受，虚弱、恶心，应有尽有。甚至有了几例死亡报告。

original: All righty, children, time to let you know about yet another problem plaguing our tranquil little post-apocalyptic neighborhood.
translation: 好了，孩子们，是时候让你们知道，又有一个问题困扰着我们这个宁静的小后启示录社区了。

original: The Enclave's been responsible for enough death and destruction. We need to get back to normal. You know, like fighting Raiders and Super Mutants.
translation: 英克雷造成了太多的死亡和破坏。我们需要回到正常的生活。你知道，如同抵抗掠夺者和超级变种人。

original: [Argyle] Ah, I always knew this broad was heartless. Get it, boss? Heartless?
translation: [阿盖尔] 啊，我就知道这娘们没良心。懂吗，老板？没良心？

original: You know, some laser beams here, a few exploded corpses there. Let's just hope this mop up operation ends ASAP.
translation: 你知道，一些激光光束闪过，一些尸体被分解。我们希望尽快完成操作。

original: But the fight, dear children, did not end there. The Brotherhood has been pursuing "President" Eden's little minions throughout the Wasteland.
translation: 但是这场战斗，亲爱的孩子们，并没有到此为止。兄弟会还在废土追缴伊甸“总统”的一些走狗。

original: It's been some time since those plucky paladins in Power Armor first stormed the Jefferson Memorial and gave the Enclave their walking papers.
translation: 自从那些穿着动力装甲的勇敢圣骑士第一次冲进杰斐逊纪念馆，并给了英克雷他们的解聘书，已经有一段时间了。

original: Look Lyons, I love you guys, you know I do, but your tin soldiers better get these Enclave assholes in check, once and for all, or we're all screwed.
translation: 瞧里昂，我爱你们,但你的铁管士兵最好彻底地把这些英克雷混蛋消灭，或者我们一起完蛋。

original: [Dashwood] Your kung fu skills may be unparalleled, old chum, but your comic delivery leaves something to be desired...
translation: [达什伍德] 你的功夫或许举世无双，老伙计，但是你的幽默感还有待提高……

original: Brothers of Steel, what's the deal? If Prime can go down, what about the rest of us? Are we sitting ducks for some kind of new Enclave terror?
translation: 钢铁兄弟会，怎么回事?我们其他人呢?难道我们是某种英克雷恐怖打击的靶子？

original: The Enclave are supposedly beaten, bruised, and on the run, but they have the firepower capable of destroying a 100-foot tall robot?
translation: 英克雷被打败了,伤残了，在逃跑，除此之外他们有火力可以摧毁100英尺高的机器人吗?

original: No, I'm not really sure how, cause yeah, it would take a hell of weapon to take out that gigantic G.I. And that's what worries me.
translation: 不,我不太清楚原因,那需要巨大的地狱般的武器,那就是我担心的地方。

original: That's right, children, I have received word that Liberty Prime, the Brotherhood of Steel's super duper super robot, has been killed. By the Enclave.
translation: 没错，孩子，我收到消息我们钢铁兄弟会的超级机器人已经被英克雷摧毁。

original: This grunt stands 100 feet tall, is made of some kind of metal alloy, and slings nukes like a quarterback chucks footballs.
translation: 这100英尺高的机器，是由某种合金和核动力系统组成的。

original: Now imagine the tragic and untimely demise of the most amazing American hero the Capital Wasteland has ever seen.
translation: 现在想象首都废土竟然能见到最令人惊讶的美国英雄。

original: It's always a sad day when a soldier falls in the line of battle. And the greater the soldier, the deeper the grief.
translation: 当一名士兵阵亡，总是让人难过。特别是一个伟大的士兵，更让人悲伤。

original: If there's one thing I wish I could find out there in the rubble, it's a working bugle, cause Three Dog wants to play some Taps.
translation: 如果可能我真希望我能在战场的瓦砾堆中找到，它是一个工作的号角,就是三狗所说的那样。

original: Don't you worry children. Three Dog's got his ear to the ground and his mic on standby, awooooo. As soon as I know more, you'll know more.
translation: 别担心，孩子们。三狗的耳朵贴着地面，他的麦克风整装待命，呜呜呜。当我了解更多，你们就会知道更多。

original: [Crag] What is the meaning of this?!
translation: [峭壁] 这是什么意思？！

original: And does this have something to do with the shinies from the Brotherhood of Steel, who seem poised to pounce once again?
translation: 这是否与钢铁兄弟会的亮闪闪们有关，他们似乎准备再次出击？

original: Just what is she up to? Is the kid looking for something to use for the Enclave, or against them?
translation: 她在做什么？这小子在为英克雷做某些事，还是反对他们?

original: Just what is he up to? Is the kid looking for something to use for the Enclave, or against them?
translation: 他到底想干什么？这孩子是在为英克雷寻找可用之物，还是在与他们作对？

original: My flies on the wall tell me that 101 was seen dodging Deathclaws and gathering up as much used tech as she could carry.
translation: 我的狗仔告诉我，看到101在躲避死亡爪，并尽可能多地收集她能携带的旧科技。

original: My flies on the wall tell me that 101 was seen dodging Deathclaws and gathering up as much used tech as he could carry.
translation: 我的狗仔告诉我，看到101在躲避死亡爪，并尽可能多地收集他能携带的旧科技。

original: But wouldn't you know it, that kid from Vault 101 has once again proven the exception to the rule.
translation: 但你们不知道的是，来自101号避难所的那个孩子再次证明了凡事有例外。

original: Lucky he made it out alive. Most people don't. At least not in one piece.
translation: 幸好他活着出来了。大多数人都没有。至少不会完好无损。

original: I met a guy once, name was Johnny 12 Fingers, had one arm. Turns out the other one was ripped off while he was scavving in Deathclaw central.
translation: 我曾遇到过一个人，他叫12指约翰尼，只有一只胳膊。结果发现另一只手是他在死亡爪中心拾荒时被扯下来的。

original: Ah, but you locals, you know the place. Am I right? It's become a veritable Wasteland legend. Why? Cause it's filled with goddamned Deathclaws!
translation: 啊，但你们当地人，你们知道这个地方。我没说错吧？这里已经成为名副其实的废土传奇了。为啥？因为那里到处都是该死的死亡爪！

original: There's one place you find on a tourist map of D.C. and it's lovely suburbs, and that's the cozy little villa known as Old Olney.
translation: 在特区及其可爱郊区的旅游地图上，你会发现一个地方，那就是被称为老奥尔尼的舒适小庄园。

original: And if you see that kid from Vault 101, pass along your thanks, cause the Brotherhood did NOT act alone. Thank you 101!
translation: 如果你看到101号避难所的那个孩子，请转达你的谢意，因为兄弟会并不是单独行动的。谢谢你101！

original: [Dashwood] Oh magnificent King Crag, fearless leader of Rockopolis! It's me, Daring! Daring Dashwood?
translation: [达什伍德] 哦，了不起的峭壁王，岩石城无畏的领袖！是我，“大胆”！“大胆”·达什伍德？

original: So if you see some Enclave rejects wandering around, have pity! They're homeless, after all.
translation: 所以，如果你看到一些四处游荡的英克雷弃儿，请同情他们！毕竟他们无家可归了。

original: Children, I am pleased to announce that the beautiful Brotherhood has mangled the last base those Enclave bastards had left!
translation: 孩子们，我很高兴地宣布，美丽的兄弟会已经捣毁了那些英克雷杂种留下的最后一个基地！

original: Now, the Brotherhood of Steel may have taken care of those losers back at that new-fangled faucet called Project Purity. But they weren't done!
translation: 现在，钢铁兄弟会可能已经在名为“净水工程”的新奇水龙头上照顾了那些失败者。但他们还没成功！

original: Man, I thought that blow-hard Eden was just a pre-recorded pain-in-my-ass. That was before devil-headed stormtroopers moved into the neighborhood.
translation: 天啊，我本以为那个“吹牛大王”伊登只是个预先录制好的讨厌鬼。那是在恶魔头暴风兵搬进这个街区之前。

original: We've had our share o' problems here in beautiful Washington D.C., but did any of us really see those Enclave idiots coming?
translation: 在美丽的华盛顿特区，我们也遇到了不少问题，但我们真的预见到了那些英克雷白痴的到来吗？

original: Why, 101? Why has it come to this? Children, pray for the soul of that lone wanderer, and pray for the rest of us too, while you're at it.
translation: 为什么，101？为什么会变成这样呢？孩子们，为那个独行客的灵魂祈祷，同时也为我们其余人祈祷。

original: It's a dark day for us all, when someone sees fit to destroy the only guys standing between us and complete obliteration.
translation: 对我们所有人来说，这都是黑暗的一天，因为有人认为应该摧毁隔挡在我们与彻底毁灭之间的唯一力量。

original: And, my sources tell me, this is the same hail of hellfire that destroyed Liberty Prime himself. Looks like an Enclave super weapon at work.
translation: 我的线人告诉我。这就是摧毁自由先锋的那片地狱之火。看来是英克雷的超级武器在起作用。

original: As reported by loads of people around the Capital Wasteland, missiles rained down from the sky and left the Citadel a big smoking crater.
translation: 据首都废土上的许多人报告，导弹从天而降，把大本营炸成了一个冒烟的大坑。

original: Wrong, my children. So very wrong. I really can't believe I'm saying this, but the concrete casa of those shiny guys with big guns has gone kablooey.
translation: 出问题了，我的孩子们。出大问题了。我真不敢相信我说的话，但是那些拿着大枪的闪亮家伙们的水泥城堡已经坍塌了。

original: But that would be impossible, right? Nobody would have the power, the opportunity, or the giant gorilla-sized balls to destroy the Citadel. Right?
translation: 但那是不可能的，是吧？没有人有能力、有机会，或有大猩猩那般大的胆量去摧毁大本营。是吧？

original: Not too long ago, I saw a big boom from my bedroom, in the direction of that bastion of neo-knightly badassness.
translation: 不久前，我在卧室里看到巨大的爆炸，方向正是那个新骑士式坏蛋的堡垒。

original: [Crag] Herbert Dashwood? Ugh... I should have known. But who is this... this dead woman? And... is that her... heart?
translation: [峭壁] 赫伯特·达什伍德？呃……我早该知道。但是这是谁……这死去的女人？这……这是她的……心脏？

original: Don't lose hope, children. Don't ever lose hope! The kid from Vault 101, the Wasteland's one true Messiah, still walks among us! Just listen to this.
translation: 不要失去希望，孩子们。永远不要失去希望！101号避难所的孩子，废土唯一真正的救世主，还活在我们中间！听好了。

original: Ah, that kid from Vault 101. Only a true Mortal could get involved in so many adventures, make so many damn caps! Behold, the latest tribulation.
translation: 啊，那来自101号避难所的孩子。只有“凡夫俗子”才能参与如此多的冒险，拥有如此多的该死的瓶盖！看呐，最新磨难。

original: The Devil walks among us, children. Oh, she may look like us, but she calls Hell home. She is legion, and her deeds are legend. Like this one.
translation: 魔王就在我们中间，孩子们。哦，她也许长得像我们，但她把地狱当家。她是一个军团，她的事迹是传奇。就像这个。

original: The Devil walks among us, children. Oh, he may look like us, but he calls Hell home. He is legion, and his deeds are legend. Like this one.
translation: 魔王就在我们中间，孩子们。哦，他也许长得像我们，但他把地狱当家。他是一个军团，他的事迹是传奇。就像这个。

original: We may never get to Heaven, children, but at least we've got our own Earthly Angel walking among us. And I've got her latest exploits.
translation: 孩子们，我们可能永远也到不了天堂，但至少我们有自己的尘世天使在我们中间行走。我带来了她的最新战绩。

original: We may never get to Heaven, children, but at least we've got our own Earthly Angel walking among us. And I've got his latest exploits.
translation: 孩子们，我们可能永远也到不了天堂，但至少我们有自己的尘世天使在我们中间行走。我带来了他的最新战绩。

original: Neither light, nor dark, not good nor bad, there's one who truly walks down the middle of life's road.  Here's an update on that Gray Stranger.
translation: 非明非暗，非好非坏，一个人真实走在人生道路的中。下面是“灰色陌客”的最新消息。

original: It's gotten to the point where that piece of shit from Vault 101 can't even be considered human. Am I right? Here's the latest on that Demon's Spawn.
translation: 已经到了101号避难所里的那坨屎，都不能算是人的地步了。我说的对吗？这是恶魔再生人的最新消息。

original: Only one person can bring a hint of sunshine to this dim and dreary Wasteland. Children, I bring you an update on... the Lightbringer.
translation: 只有一个人能给这昏暗沉闷的废土带来一丝阳光。孩子们，我为你们带来了……“光明使者”的最新消息。

original: By now everyone knows that the kid from Vault 101 is a no-good, selfish Moneygrubber, but who knew she was keeping so busy? Listen to this.
translation: 现在大家都知道101号避难所的那个小伙是个自私的财迷，但谁知道她一直这么忙呢？听听这个。

original: By now everyone knows that the kid from Vault 101 is a no-good, selfish Moneygrubber, but who knew he was keeping so busy? Listen to this.
translation: 现在大家都知道101号避难所的那个小伙是个自私的财迷，但谁知道他一直这么忙呢？听听这个。

original: Think you'll rest when you're dead, children? Awooo. Not if that refugee from Vault 101 has anything to say about it. Here's the latest on the Soultaker.
translation: 孩子们，你们以为死了就会安息吗？啊呜~不会，如果那个来自101号避难所的流民有话要说，就不会了。这是关于“夺魂者”的最新消息。

original: Call her the Herald of Tranquility, that kid from Vault 101, usually righting any wrongs that cross her path. Here's a new update.
translation: 称她“宁静先驱”，101号避难所的那个孩子通常会纠正她所犯下的错误。这是最新消息。

original: Call him the Herald of Tranquility, that kid from Vault 101, usually righting any wrongs that cross his path. Here's a new update.
translation: 称他“宁静先驱”，101号避难所的那个孩子通常会纠正他所犯下的错误。这是最新消息。

original: Looks like ol' 101 has become quite the Person of Refinement, mostly by taking people's hard-earned caps in exchange for... anything. Take a listen.
translation: 看来老101已经成为一个精致之人了，主要通过拿别人的血汗钱来换取...任何东西。听听看。

original: If you've been wondering if that Instrument of Ruin from Vault 101 has been wreaking any new havoc, let me give you the latest scoop.
translation: 如果你一直在想，101号避难所的“毁灭工具”是否又造成了新的破坏，那就让我来告诉你最新消息。

original: Our Wasteland might be a frigging' mess (hence the name), but there's one person we've come to know as a Symbol of Order, and she's been busy.
translation: 我们的废土可能是一团糟（因此得名），但有一个人是我们熟知的秩序象征，她一直很忙。

original: Our Wasteland might be a frigging' mess (hence the name), but there's one person we've come to know as a Symbol of Order, and he's been busy.
translation: 我们的废土可能是一团糟（因此得名），但有一个人是我们熟知的秩序象征，他一直很忙。

original: If you're tired of nobody giving a crap, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong place. Remember ol' 101? The very Model of Apathy? She's at it again.
translation: 如果你厌倦了无人问津，恐怕你来错地方了。还记得老101吗？冷漠典范？她又来了。

original: If you're tired of nobody giving a crap, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong place. Remember ol' 101? The very Model of Apathy? He's at it again.
translation: 如果你厌倦了无人问津，恐怕你来错地方了。还记得老101吗？冷漠典范？他又来了。

original: We all know the Capital Wasteland is an anarchist's wet dream, and a certain Agent of Chaos doesn't help matters much. Here's an update.
translation: 我们都知道，首都废土是无政府主义者的梦想之地，而某位“混乱特工”的出现并没有起到多大作用。以下是最新消息。

original: We may not have superheroes - those two wackos near Canterbury Commons don't count - but we do have our very own Champion of Justice. Listen up.
translation: 我们可能没有超级英雄--坎特伯雷社区附近的那两个疯子不算--但我们有自己的正义卫士。听好了。

original: It shouldn't surprise anyone that the Capital Wasteland's most notorious Hero for Hire is in the headlines once again.
translation: 首都废土上最臭名昭著的“雇佣英雄”再次成为头条，大家应该不会感到意外。

original: If you have trouble sleeping, maybe it's because that kid from Vault 101 has become the Stuff of Nightmares, and is out there, walking among us.
translation: 如果你失眠，也许是因为那个来自101号避难所的小伙变成了“噩梦之物”，就在那儿，游荡在我们中。

original: In today's vicious Yao Guai eat Yao Guai world, the exploits of a certain Friend of the People are usually cause for rejoicing.
translation: 在当今这个妖怪吃妖怪的险恶世界里，某位人民之友的功绩通常会引起人们的欢欣鼓舞。

original: Now you'd think that Loner from Vault 101 would stay out of the spotlight, but I guess some people just can't help themselves.
translation: 你可能觉得101号避难所的“小孤独”不会出现在聚光灯下，但我想有些人就是忍不住。

original: Now I know you're sick to death of hearing my horror stories, but what's a Three Dog to do when that Consort of Discord keeps causing so much mayhem?
translation: 我知道你们听了我的恐怖故事都快烦死了，但当那个“纷争配偶”不断制造混乱时，“三狗”该怎么办呢？

original: Fear not, my poor lost flock! Hahaha. For the Shepherd of Vault 101 has come to guide you to the promised land! Maybe. Listen to this.
translation: 不要害怕，我可怜的迷途羔羊！哈哈哈。因为101号避难所的“牧羊人”来指引你们去应许之地了！也许吧。听听这个。

original: I've got new reports in on that wayward soul from Vault 101, the Capital Wasteland's infamous Egocentric. Check this out.
translation: 我收到了关于101号避难所那个落魄灵魂的新报告，就是那首都废土臭名昭著的“利己者”。看看这个。

original: If you've run into her, you know you just can't trust that despicable little Deceiver from Vault 101. And now, she's at it again. Take a listen.
translation: 如果你碰到过她，你就知道你不能相信101号避难所的那个卑鄙的欺骗者。现在，她又来了。听一下。

original: If you've run into him, you know you just can't trust that despicable little Deceiver from Vault 101. And now, he's at it again. Take a listen.
translation: 如果你碰到过他，你就知道你不能相信101号避难所的那个卑鄙的欺骗者。现在，他又来了。听一下。

original: Sometimes, in this cold, crazy world, you just want to make a buck. Like that penny-pinching Profiteer from Vault 101. Here's the latest.
translation: 有时候，在这个冰冷疯狂的世界，你只是想赚点钱。就像101号避难所里那个吝啬的奸商。下面是最新消息。

original: You think you're sad now, children? Just wait till you hear the latest on the Capital Wasteland's very own Bringer of Sorrow.  Cue the crying.
translation: 孩子们，你们觉得自己现在很悲伤吗？那就等着听听首都废土的“悲伤使者”的最新消息吧。哭吧。

original: What's the matter, kids? Feeling down? Low on vim, vigor, and the simple will to live? What you need is the latest news on the Restorer of Faith!
translation: 怎么了，孩子们？情绪低落？缺乏活力、朝气和简单的生活意愿？你们需要的是关于“信仰恢复者”的最新消息！

original: So here's the question. How's that smooth-operating Soldier of Fortune from Vault 101 getting along these days? Business, it would seem, is booming…
translation: 那么问题来了。101号避难所的那个“财富战士”最近怎么样了？似乎生意兴隆......

original: So what's new with that master of disaster, that duke of destruction, that bad to the bone... Architect of Doom? Here's what.
translation: 那么，这位灾难大师、毁灭公爵、坏到骨子里的……“末日缔造者”有什么新消息呢？接下来就是。

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on the Last, Best Hope of Humanity herself, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人类最后、最好的希望”本人的最新消息，她就是来自101号避难所的那孩子。

original: You see, children, Ghouls are simply humans who've been exposed to an ungodly amount of radiation and haven't had the good fortune to die.
translation: 孩子们，你们看，尸鬼完全是遭受了大量不人道的辐射，而没在厄运中死去的人类。

original: Just a friendly reminder to all you would-be bigots out there -- Ghouls are people too.
translation: 仅仅是对所有偏执狂的一个友善的提示 — 尸鬼也是人。

original: So run, hide or fight if you've got the balls and the guns. But for God's sake, don't go wavin' the white flag. They'll just strangle you with it.
translation: 所以，如果你们有种，又有枪，那就跑、躲起来或者奋起反抗。但看在上帝的份上，千万别举白旗，他们只会用它来勒死你。

original: Raiders can't be bargained or reasoned with, and there ain't no use surrenderin', cause they'll just shoot you anyway.
translation: 掠夺者既不吃谈判那套，也没法跟他们讲道理，投降也没用，因为不管怎样他们都会开枪。

original: When these psychos come to play, they have one thing on their minds -- making your life as fucking miserable as humanly possible.
translation: 这些疯子来闹事的时候，心里就一个念头：尽其所能，把你们的生活搅得一团糟。

original: Remember, children, when the Raiders come, there ain't no shame in locking your doors, barricading the windows, and cowering under the nearest bed.
translation: 孩子们，记住了，当掠夺者来袭，锁好门、堵住窗户，躲在最近的床底下，这不丢人。

original: Consider yourself officially warned.
translation: 对你郑重的警告。

original: According to most of our reports on the Super Mutants, they actually prefer capturing their victims and hauling them off to God-knows-where.
translation: 根据我们所获得的关于超级变种人大多数消息指出，他们事实上更喜欢抓住受害人，然后把他们带到不知什么鬼地方。

original: You see, children, the Frankensteins might violently and horrifically rip you to shreds -- but only if you're lucky.
translation: 你们看，孩子们，这些极端恐怖地科学怪人们可能会把你们撕成碎片 — 其实，这已经算是客气的了。

original: For all you guys and gals tempted by the thought of scavving in the downtown D.C. ruins, here's a tip...
translation: 考虑到特区市区遗址的垃圾可能会诱惑到你们这些男孩和女孩，给你们一个提示……

original: So be smart. Salvage those parts and make repairs whenever you can.
translation: 机灵点，尽你所能去拾取零件，以后有机会再进行修理。

original: If your weapon is falling apart, the only Wasteland asshole it's gonna kill is you.
translation: 要是你的武器散架了，你很可能会因此丧命。

original: Listen kiddos, never forget the importance of periodic weapon maintenance. Rifle, pistol, police baton -- I don't care which.
translation: 听着，小鬼们，永远不要忘记定期保养武器的重要性。步枪、手枪、警棍 — 无论是哪种武器。

original: Don't feed the Yao Guai! That is all.
translation: 别让自己喂了妖怪！就这样。

original: If you do need to head into the heat, be smart -- give yourself a nice boost of RadX first. Remember, only you can prevent human flesh fires.
translation: 如果你实在想去高辐射区域，那就机灵点——先给自己来点抗辐宁。记住了，只有你自己能制止人体自燃。

original: Keep your eyes on those geiger counters, kids. Tick, tick, tickety means run your ass outta there, and then pop some RadAway for good measure.
translation: 孩子们，留意盖格计数器上的那些数字。滴答、滴答、滴答声意味着你要赶紧拍屁股从所在的地方闪人，然后来点消辐宁以防万一。

original: We all know the dangers of radiation, but with the right precautions, you CAN prevent accidental death or even -- eewww -- ghoulification.
translation: 我们都知道辐射的危险，但有了正确的预防措施，你就能避免意外死亡乃至 — 嗯嗯 — 尸鬼化。

original: Time once again for an important GNR Public Service Announcement.
translation: 又到了银河新闻电台重要的公共服务播报时间。

original: [Argyle] She's the least of your worries, Craggy. In a few seconds, the Slavers are gonna be breaking down your rocky front door!
translation: [阿盖尔] 她是你最不需要担心的，峭壁君。再过几秒，奴隶主就会砸开你的石门了！

original: Now listen close for this important Public Service Announcement.
translation: 现在仔细听这一重要的公共服务播报。

original: Up next we've got a Public Service Announcement. Listen up, children. This stuff's important.
translation: 接下来是我们的公共服务播报。听着，孩子们，这一内容非常重要。

original: And now, a super important Public Service Announcement.
translation: 现在，有一项超级重要的公共服务要播报。

original: Until next time, this is President Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: [Crag] Slavers? You led the Slavers here? To Rockopolis? You idiots! Do you realize what you've done!
translation: [峭壁] 奴隶主？你把奴隶贩子带到这？带到岩石城？你这白痴！你知道你干了什么吗！

original: Until we meet again, this is President Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until next time, this is John Henry Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until we meet again, this is John Henry Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until next time, this is your President, John Henry Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until we meet again, this is your President, John Henry Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Message repeats.
translation: 重复讯息。

original: Roof access to the Statesman Hotel is only through the adjoining hospital. Please hurry! Butcher out.
translation: 只有经由旁边的医院才能通往政要酒店楼顶。请快一点！完毕。

original: We will continually broadcast as often as we can, but I'm afraid we don't have much time left. Butcher out.
translation: 我们会尽可能频繁地反复广播，但我担心我们抵抗不了多久了。完毕。

original: Keep your eyes open... we've left booby traps and mines to help slow the Mutants down.
translation: 眼睛放亮点……我们装置了用来拖延那些变种人的陷阱和地雷。

original: Oh, shit... here they come again...
translation: 哦，狗屎……他们又来了……

original: This message repeats.
translation: 重复这条信息。

original: Attention all Raven Rock personnel. This is your President, John Henry Eden.
translation: 注意，所有渡鸦岩的人们。我是你们的总统，约翰·亨利·伊登。

original: If anyone can hear this, this is Bob Andersteen.
translation: 有人能听到这条消息吗，我是鲍勃·安德斯丁。

original: ...This is Defender Morrill... Any Outcasts listening on this frequency, report to Sector 7-B, Bailey's Crossroads.
translation: ……这是莫里尔捍卫者……听到这个频率的放逐者，请到贝利十字路口的7-B区报到。

original: Mayday. Mayday. Mayday.
translation: 求救。求救。求救。

original: Greetings to the oppressed masses from the peace-loving peoples of China!
translation: 热爱和平的中国人民向被压迫的劳苦大众致以最诚挚的问候！

original: All peace-loving peoples must join together to stop the war of aggression being waged by the Wall Street gang!
translation: 所有热爱和平的人民应当紧密团结起来，遏制由华尔街罪恶组织发动的侵略战争！

original: This next piece is dedicated to my old friend Crazy Wolfgang. No one can scour the Wasteland and find such oddities as you.
translation: 接下来的歌曲献给我的老朋友疯子沃尔夫冈。踏遍废土也没人能找出像你这样的怪人。

original: I'd like to play this next piece of music for the man out there who keeps an old lady alive and well. Doc Hoff, once again I thank you.
translation: 我想为那位让老妇活得很好的人演奏下一首乐曲。霍夫医生，我再次感谢你。

original: To the traveling merchant who only goes by the name Crow, I thank you for all the times you spent keeping me company. Enjoy the music, my love.
translation: 致被称为乌鸦的旅行商人，感谢你长久以来伴我左右。欣赏这段音乐吧，我的爱人。

original: Music has always been an important part of my life. I hope you enjoy listening to these pieces as much as I enjoy playing them.
translation: 音乐，向来是我生命中的重要部分。这些音乐，我希望你们能够倾听它们，并且如同我播放它们时一样，收获同样的欣喜。

original: This is just a quick thank you to my new friend. Thank you for bringing me what I'd been searching for all these years.
translation: 这是一条对我新朋友的简洁谢言。感谢你给了我长久来一直找寻的真情。

original: Here is another lovely song for a lonely traveler wandering the Wasteland. You know who you are.
translation: 这首情歌献给一位在废土流浪的孤独旅者。你知道我说的是谁。

original: If my notes sound sweeter it's all thanks to a special someone who helped out a poor old lady living alone in the Wasteland. Thank you, my friend.
translation: 如果我的语调听起来都欢快了，那全拜一位帮助独居老妇的人所赐。谢谢，我的朋友。

original: Remember, Agatha is with you on those cold nights. Just keep listening to this broadcast and I'll keep you company. It's the least I can do.
translation: 记着，漫漫寒夜，阿加莎伴你身侧。继续收听这电台，我会伴你度过。这是我能尽的绵薄之力。

original: They say recent events have made the world seem like a better place. I hope all of you out there can smile and feel better knowing that it's true.
translation: 有人说一些近期的事件让这世界变得更美好了。在知道这是事实后，我希望所有的人都能笑一笑，感觉好些。

original: This next selection was one of my mother's favorites. I hope you'll enjoy hearing it as much as I enjoy playing it.
translation: 接下来的选曲是我母亲的至爱。我希望你们能够倾听它们，并且如同我播放它们时一样，收获同样的欣喜。

original: That song reminded me how wonderful these composers were. How delightful to have such an amazing imagination.
translation: 那首歌让我怀念起这些作曲家的横溢才华。拥有如此惊人的想象力是件多么愉悦的事。

original: This is for all those people out there who take the time to help out those in need. Enjoy the music... you've earned it.
translation: 这首歌献给所有雪中送炭的好心人。欣赏音乐……这是你们应得的。

original: This next piece reminds me of something my husband said. "Friendship is like a violin. Even if the music stops, you'll still have the strings."
translation: 接下来的音乐让我想起我丈夫的一席话：“友谊就像一把小提琴。就算音乐停止，你仍能听到弦外之音。”

original: Just a word to my Wasteland friends out there. Stay safe, stay healthy and above all, stay happy.
translation: 对我的废土同胞们说句话。愿你平安，健康，最重要的是，要快乐。

original: I'm dedicating this next piece of music to my loving husband. May his soul find peace.
translation: 我将接下来这首歌献给我挚爱的丈夫。希望他的灵魂得到安息。

original: We stand now at the precipice.
translation: 我们现在站在悬崖边上。

original: This is the Overseer.
translation: 我是监督者。

original: Remember - A clean vault is a healthy vault. Please place all trash into the appropriate incineration receptacle on your scheduled burning day.
translation: 记住——干净的避难所就是一个健康的避难所。请在你预定的焚烧日将所有垃圾放入相应的焚烧容器。

original: Remember - Your Pip-Boy is not a toy. Proper cleaning and maintenance will ensure the device's operation for this, and future, generations.
translation: 记住——你的哔哔小子不是玩具。适当的清洁和维护将确保该设备能供本代和后代使用。

original: Remember - Vault 101 IS America.
translation: 记住——101号避难所就是美国。

original: Remember - Vault Depressive Syndrome, or V.D.S., is a treatable condition. See your vault physician today for an antidepressant that's right for you.
translation: 记住——避难所抑郁症，简称V.D.S，是可以治疗的。现在就向你的避难所医生求助，寻找适合你的抗抑郁药剂。

original: Remember - Only you can prevent fatal work-related injuries. Proper use and storage of all high-velocity tools is essential to survival.
translation: 记住——只有你自己才能避免致命的工伤。正确使用和存放所有高速工具是生存的关键。

original: The Overseer's authority is absolute.
translation: 监督者的权威不容质疑。

original: This is Vault 101, and you're enjoying a brighter future... underground.
translation: 这里是101号避难所，你们在地下……享受着更光明的未来。

original: Current radiation level -- 0 rads. As always.
translation: 当前放射线等级 — 辐射值为0，一如往常。

original: Walk. Don't run.
translation: 慢行。不要奔跑。

original: Did you know - the average life expectancy of a resident in a properly maintained vault is 92.3 years?
translation: 你知道么？在一座维护得当的避难所里，居民的平均寿命高达92.3岁。

original: Did you know - due to the threats of radiation and mutant domination, the United States will not be habitable again for at least three centuries?
translation: 你知道吗？由于辐射的威胁和变种人的统治，合众国至少三个世纪内都不适合人类居住。

original: Did you know - the odds of a Vault-Tec shelter failing are 1,763, 497... to 1?
translation: 你知道吗？一座避难所科技的庇护所崩塌的可能性仅有1,763,497……分之1。

original: Did you know - Vault-Tec water and life support systems can sustain a vault for over 900 years, without failure?
translation: 你知道吗？避难所科技的水体与生命保障系统可维持避难所900多年而不出故障。

original: Did you know -- the Vault-Tec/RobCo partnership is considered the most successful joint venture in the history of American industry?
translation: 你知道吗——避难所科技/RobCo的合作被公认为是美利坚工业史上最成功的合资。

original: This is an automated distress message from Vault-Tec Vault 101. Message begins:
translation: 这是一条由101号避难所发出的自动求救信号。消息内容如下：

original: Repeating message. This is Butcher of Reilly's Rangers sending out an S.O.S. on all known friendly frequencies.
translation: 重复一次，我是“莱莉的游骑兵”的布彻，从所有已知的友好波段里发出的求救信息。

original: This is Butcher of Reilly's Rangers. If anyone can hear this signal we're in danger and we need your help.
translation: 我是“莱莉的游骑兵”的布彻。如果有人听到这条信号：我们遇险了，急需你的救援。

original: To anyone receiving this message. This is Butcher of the merc company Reilly's Rangers. We're in danger and need help.
translation: 致接收到此信息的任何人：我是“莱莉的游骑兵”的布彻。我们有危险，急需救援。

original: To anyone that can receive this. We are in danger and need your help. This is Butcher of Reilly's Rangers.
translation: 致接收到此信息的任何人：我们有危险，急需救援。我是“莱莉的游骑兵”的布彻。

original: To anyone who can hear me: my name is Wernher. I come from a settlement to the north.
translation: 致所有能见我的人: 我叫沃纳。我来自北边的一个聚居地。

original: From nothing, I have brought you this settlement. From chaos, The Pitt thrives. We all work to make it thrive further.
translation: 我带着一无所有的你们来到这片移民区，匹兹堡从混乱中茁壮成长。我们一起工作，带领它走向进一步的繁荣。

original: A reminder: work is rewarded. Sloth is punished. Such is the way we thrive in this hellish place.
translation: 一条忠告：工作得报酬，偷懒吃鞭子。这就是我们从这片地狱之所兴盛起来的办法。

original: To work for the good of one's fellow man is a blessing. Through labor, we shall all thrive.
translation: 为所有人的福利工作，是上帝的恩赐。我们通过劳动必将全面崛起。

original: "What is genuine is proved in the fire, what is false we shall not miss in our ranks." Remember it well, my friends.
translation: 在我们的社会中，真金不怕火来炼，谎言不必挂心间。牢记这一点，我的朋友们。

original: Let the ruling classes of the Wasteland tremble at our new industrial revolution!
translation: 让废土的那些好吃懒做者在我们的新兴工业革命面前颤抖吧！

original: Let no man call you slaves, nor any man call themselves your owners. We are all workers, whether it be in the mills, the alleys, or the war zones.
translation: 不要让任何人称你们奴隶，不要让任何人称他是你们的主人。我们都是工人，无论是在轧钢厂、大街小巷，还是战区。

original: Great deeds require great work. We are rebuilding a glorious city, and restoring the world. We must all work for this greatness.
translation: 伟大的功绩有赖于伟大的工作。我们正在重建一座无上光荣的城市，重建整个世界。我们每个人必须为了这种伟大而工作。

original: You are not collared beasts of burden. You are proud workers, building a home in the world. Work shall set us all free.
translation: 你们不是被套上了项圈的驮畜。你们是骄傲的工人，要在这世上建造一个家。工作必将解放我们所有人的自由。

original: We all work. Some in the mill, making weapons. Some in the alleys, defending the city. Some in the wasteland, raiding for our food. But we all work.
translation: 我们都在工作。有的在轧钢厂制造武器，有的在大街小巷保护城市，有的在人在废土上为我们掠夺食物。但我们都在工作。

original: Work is what separates man from beast. It is how we change our world. It raises us above the Trogs. Work is what makes us human.
translation: 工作是人与禽兽的区别，工作让我们改变世界，工作让我们把兽化人踩在脚下，工作使我们成为人。

original: The world turned against Man because we were lazy and wasteful. Now we must earn our home once again, through work.
translation: 因为我们的疯狂和穷奢极欲，这个世界让人类自相残杀。现在，我们必须通过工作，再次赢回我们的家园。

original: You build the weapons to arm the soldiers. Soldiers use weapons to keep you safe and bring back food. We depend on each other.
translation: 你们制造武器武装士兵，士兵使用武器保卫你们的安全，带回来食物。我们彼此依赖。

original: Nothing is impossible, through the sweat of our brow.
translation: 通过我们辛勤的汗水，没有什么是不可能的。

original: Outside of the Pitt, the world lies in ruins and survivors scratch in the dirt without dreams. But in the Pitt, we can live and rebuild with purpose.
translation: 匹兹堡外边，世界一片废墟，幸存者们在尘土中苟延残喘，没有梦想。但在匹兹堡，我们可以活着，有目的地重建家园。

original: You're listening to the adventures of me, Herbert "Daring" Dashwood, and my stalwart Ghoul manservant Argyle!
translation: 你正在收听的是我，赫伯特·“大胆”·达什伍德，以及我坚定的尸鬼男仆阿盖尔，的冒险故事！

original: [Dashwood] Inspired you to tighten your defenses?
translation: [达什伍德] 给了你加固防御的灵感？

original: [Crag] Dashwwwooooddd!
translation: [峭壁] 达什伍~~~~德！

original: [Argyle] Warm welcome's over boss! Time to scram!
translation: [阿盖尔] 热烈欢迎结束了，老板！该撤了！

original: [Crag] Citizens of Rockopolis! Destroy these interlopers!
translation: [峭壁] 岩石城的居民！消灭这些闯入者！

original: [Dashwood] This way, Argyle! Into the caves! It's our only chance! (sound of running)
translation: [达什伍德] 阿盖尔，这边！进山洞！这是我们唯一的机会！（跑步声）

original: [Argyle] They're gaining on us boss! That cliff up ahead - you think you can jump it? You ain't as spry as you used to be...
translation: [阿盖尔] 他们追上来了，老板！前面就是悬崖 — 你认为你能跳过去吗？你不像以前那么灵活了……

original: [Dashwood] Child's play, you withering worry wort! Watch... tthhiiss. Woooaaaahhh!!
translation: [达什伍德] 小儿科，你这杞人忧天的家伙！看……这~哇哦哦哦！！

original: [Argyle] Boss! Don't worry, I'm coming!
translation: [阿盖尔] 老板！别怕，我来了！

original: [Dashwood] Best hurry, old chum... I can't hang on... much longer... I think this could be the end... of...
translation: [达什伍德] 最好快点，老伙计……我坚持不了……太久……我想这可能是……的……结局……

original: You're listening to the adventures of me, Herbert "Daring" Dashwood, and my stalwart Ghoul manservant Argyle!
translation: 你正在收听的是我，赫伯特·“大胆”·达什伍德，以及我坚定的尸鬼男仆阿盖尔，的冒险故事！

original: This is Margaret again, with another funtabulous round of ancient music. Three Dog's dead, and that's all I got.
translation: 这还是玛格丽特，带给你又一轮美妙的复古音乐。三狗死了，我的箱底只有这些。

original: That was the Ink Spots, with "I Don't Want to Set the World on Fire."
translation: 播送一首墨迹乐团的“我不想世界卷入战火”。

original: Hey everybody, this is Three Dog, your friendly neighborhood disc jockey. What's a "disc"? Hell if I know. But I'm gonna keep talkin' anyway.
translation: 嘿，各位，这里是三狗，你们友爱的邻家打碟男孩。什么是“碟”？鬼才知道呢。但我还是会继续唠下去。

original: That was the Ink Spots, with "Maybe."
translation: 播送一首墨迹乐团的“或许”。

original: That was Bob Crosby with "Happy Times."
translation: 播送一首鲍勃·克罗斯比的“欢乐时光”。

original: That was Bob Crosby with "Way Back Home."
translation: 播送一首鲍勃·克罗斯比的“漫漫回家路”。

original: That was Roy Brown with "Butcher Pete."
translation: 播送一首罗伊·布朗的“屠夫皮特”。

original: That was Roy Brown with "Mighty Mighty Man."
translation: 播送一首罗伊·布朗的“大男人”。

original: That was Billie Holiday with "Crazy He Calls Me."
translation: 播送一首比莉·霍利戴的“他说我疯了”。

original: That was Billie Holiday with "Easy Living."
translation: 播送一首比莉·霍利戴的“逍遥自在”。

original: That was Danny Kaye and the Andrew Sisters with "Civilization."
translation: 播送一首丹妮·凯依和安德鲁·凯依姐妹合唱的“文明”。

original: That was Ella Fitzgerald with "Into Each Life Some Rain Must Fall."
translation: 播送一首艾拉·费兹洁拉德的”生活总会有风雨”。

original: That was Tex Beneke with "A Wonderful Guy."
translation: 刚才是泰克斯·本尼克和“棒小伙”。

original: That was Cole Porter with "Anything Goes."
translation: 播送一首科尔·波特的“万事成空”。

original: Now... some music.
translation: 现在……来点音乐。

original: People of the Capital Wasteland! It is I, Three Dog, your ruler! Hear me, and obey! Oh, sorry, that's that OTHER radio station.
translation: 首都废土的居民们！是我，三狗，你们的主宰！听我号令，服从于我！哦，抱歉，那是隔壁电台的台词。

original: And now... some music.
translation: 那么现在……来点音乐。

original: <unintelligible>
translation: <莫明其妙的>

original: It's Cole Porter and "Anything Goes."
translation: 这是科尔·波特演唱的“万事成空”。

original: Men and ladies, boys and girls, prepare to be astounded, bedazzled, and otherwise stupefied! I am Three Dog, your master of ceremonies!
translation: 先生们女士们，男孩、女孩们，准备好迎接震撼、目眩神迷和惊叹吧！我是三狗，你们的司仪大师！

original: Here's Tex Beneke with... "A Wonderful Guy."
translation: 这是泰克斯·本尼克和一个……“棒小伙”。

original: It's the "First Lady of Song" herself, Miss Ella Fitzgerald, telling us that, "Into Each Life Some Rain Must Fall." Ain't that the truth, sister.
translation: 现在是“爵士第一夫人”本人，艾拉·费兹洁拉德，告诉我们“生活总会有风雨”。难道不是这样吗，我的姐妹！

original: Here's Danny Kaye and Andrew Sisters, crooning about - what else? - "Civilization."
translation: 现在由丹妮·凯依和安德鲁·凯依姐妹，低唱一曲 — 还有别的吗？ — “文明”。

original: How about some "Easy Living," from everyone' favorite songstress, Billie Holiday?
translation: 来点“轻松生活”怎么样？是人人都爱的女歌手比莉·霍利戴。

original: It's Billie Holiday with... "Crazy He Calls Me."
translation: 这是比莉·霍利戴…“他说我疯了”。

original: Up next is Roy Brown, tellin' us all about that, "Mighty Mighty Man."
translation: 下一首是罗伊·布朗，给我们说说“大男人”。

original: It's Roy Brown, singin' about the one, the only, "Butcher Pete"!
translation: 罗伊·布朗演唱的独一无二的“屠夫皮特”！

original: This is Bob Crosby, takin' us, "Way Back Home."
translation: 这是鲍勃·克罗斯比，正引领我们踏上“漫漫回家路”。

original: Here's Bob Crosby, singin' to us all about, "Happy Times."
translation: 这是鲍勃·克罗斯比，将告诉我们什么是“欢乐时光”！

original: It's the Ink Spots, and "Maybe."
translation: 掌声欢迎墨迹组合，以及“或许”。

original: This is the Ink Spots, with their timeless classic, "I Don't Want to Set the World on Fire."
translation: 这里是墨点乐队，以及他们的永恒经典《我不愿让世界燃烧》。

original: Seems we've got, dalalala, a bit of news. Just listen to this.
translation: 看来我们，哒啦啦啦，有点新闻要报道。且听这个。

original: Hey nifty America. It's me, your president, John Hen... Ahhhh... Gotcha! Three Dog here! How's everyone doin'?
translation: 你们好，亲爱的美国民众。是我，你们的总统，约翰……啊……骗到你了！这是三狗！大家过的怎样？

original: News time, children.
translation: 新闻时间，孩子们。

original: We interrupt our regularly scheduled program for some news.
translation: 我们暂停正常的节目，插播新闻。

original: Ah yes, time for the news.
translation: 对了，新闻时间。

original: And here's... me! Hahaha. With the news.
translation: 是……我！哈哈哈。还有新闻！

original: Got lots of stuff goin' down in Post Apocalyptia these days. Here some of the latest news.
translation: 后启示录世界最近可是发生了不少事。以下是最新消息。

original: <Sigh> I think we've lost this one, folks. Good kid goes bad, it's the story of the Wasteland, right? It's a sad, sad day for us all.
translation: <叹气> 我想我们失去了这位，伙计们。好孩子变坏了，这就是废土的故事，对吗？悲哀，对我们所有人而言，这是个伤心的日子。

original: Thrrreeee Dooooggg! That's me, kids. Comin' to you taped from my fortified bunker in the middle of the D.C. hellhole. Ain't life grand?
translation: 三~~~狗~~~！就是我，孩子们。从我在地狱般的特区那坚固堡垒里给你带来的电台。生活得美好吗？

original: Kid, if you're listening? Fool me once, shame on me. Fool me twice - fuck you, you worthless piece of shit. Hahahahaha.
translation: 孩子，不知你有没有在听？你骗我一次，是我的耻辱。骗我两次 — 他妈的，你是一堆狗屎。哈哈哈哈哈。

original: The kid from Vault 101 had ole Three Dog fooled. I had her pegged as one of the good guys and then, BAM -- she goes and acts all... evil.
translation: 来自101号避难所的孩子蒙蔽了老三狗。我认定她是个好人，但那是欺骗 — 她的所作所为都是……邪恶的。

original: The kid from Vault 101 had ole Three Dog fooled. I had him pegged as one of the good guys and then, BAM -- he goes and acts all... evil.
translation: 来自101号避难所的孩子蒙蔽了老三狗。我认定他是个好人，但那是欺骗 — 他的所作所为都是……邪恶的。

original: Is there not one human being with a shred of decency left in this entire back-asswards Wasteland?
translation: 难道在整个狗屎般的废土上，就没有一个人类有丝毫正义感？

original: Why? Why why why? Aggh! Faithful listeners, I'm disappointed. And you should be too.
translation: 为什么？为啥为啥为啥？啊！忠实的听众啊，我很失望。而你们也应该一样。

original: Again with the evil kid doing good things. I ask you, folks - has a soul been saved?  Keep fighting the Good Fight, kid. We're rootin' for ya.
translation: 邪恶的孩子又一次做了好事。我问你们，伙计们 — 有灵魂得到拯救了吗？继续正义之战吧，孩子。我们做你的后援。

original: Kid, if you're listening - you did a good thing. Please, for all our sakes, keep it up. There are enough evil assholes out there already.
translation: 孩子，如果你正在听 — 你做了一件好事。求求你，为了我们大家，继续下去。外面的邪恶杂种已经够多的了。

original: But now, for some miraculous reason, She's had a change of heart! She's actually done something that can be considered - dare I say it? - "good"!
translation: 但现在，由于一些神奇的原因，她变了！她竟然做了件 — 我该这么说吗？ — “好事”！

original: But now, for some miraculous reason, he's had a change of heart! He's actually done something that can be considered - dare I say it? - "good"!
translation: 但现在，由于一些神奇的原因，他变了！他竟然做了件 — 我该这么说吗？ — “好事”！

original: My, my. What a curious turn of events. So here we have the kid from Vault 101, who by all accounts has a soul as black as charred Brahmin meat.
translation: 不是我不明白，这世界变化快。这个来自101号避难所的孩子，无论如何，有着一个和熏双头牛肉一样黑的灵魂。

original: Thanks for listening, children. This is Three Dog, awooooo, and you're listening to Galaxy News Radio. We're Radio Free Wasteland, and we're here... for you.
translation: 感谢收听，孩子们。这里是三狗，嗷哦~~~，你正在收听的是银河新闻电台。我们是自由废土电台，我们在此……为你们而存在。

original: Until next time, this is Three Dog, awoooo, and you're listening to Galaxy News Radio, Bringing you the truth, no matter how bad it hurts.
translation: 下次再会，我是三狗，嗷哦~~，你正在收听银河新闻广播，为你呈现真相，哪怕真相会让人痛心。

original: Whoever lives in there sure as hell doesn't want what you're selling, and no, you can't knock down the door. It weighs like 13 tons.
translation: 里头的人绝对不稀罕你那点小算盘，再说了，那扇13吨重的门可不是说砸就能砸开的。

original: Because one dog ain't enough, and two is too low, it's me, Three Dog! How you kids handlin' Post-Apocalyptia today?
translation: 因为一狗不够，两也太少，所以只有我三狗了！孩子们，劫后余生的今天过得怎么样？

original: Hey, and in case a light bulb just started glowin' over your head, you can flick the switch and forget about it. You're not getting into that vault.
translation: 对了，要是你突然灵光一闪想搞事情，赶紧把念头掐了。那个避难所你是进不去的。

original: So if you see James out there, you say hello. Be kind to our new brother, and show him that here on the outside, we always fight the good fight.
translation: 所以各位要是在外头碰见詹姆斯，记得跟他打招呼。对咱们的新兄弟好点，让他知道在外面的世界，我们永远在为正义而战。

original: So I, the great and powerful Three Dog, set my brother straight. I told him what was what. Who are the winners, the losers, the movers and shakers.
translation: 于是，我，英明神武的三狗，给我的兄弟讲得明明白白。把现在谁混得风生水起，谁栽了跟头，谁是搅动风云的人物都掰扯明白了。

original: Now, this cat, James is his name, had been in a hole for years! He needed to know what was what out here in the beautiful Capital Wasteland!
translation: 这位仁兄，名叫詹姆斯，在那地儿待了好些年！他迫切想知道美丽的首都废土现在是个什么状况！

original: Well wouldn't you know it, someone's come out of it again! And, I kid you not, he came to visit yours truly right here in the studio!
translation: 你猜怎么着，最近又有个家伙钻出来了！而且说真的，这哥们竟然直接来演播室找我了！

original: Now, believe it or not, this one's still got people livin' in it! And every few years or so, someone comes scrabblin' out.
translation: 信不信由你，那里面到现在还有人居住！并且每隔几年，就会有人爬出来。

original: For those of you not in the know, to the northwest of Megaton there's this vault. Vault 101.
translation: 对还不知道的朋友，在兆吨镇的西北方向有个避难所——101号避难所。

original: So if your travels take you to Canterbury Commons, keep your head down and your assault rifle loaded for crazy.
translation: 所以你要是正好要去坎特伯雷社区，保持低调并把突击步枪装满子弹以应对疯狂。

original: Hey kiddies, this is Three Dog, wow wow -- your voice in the darkness. Or... at least, the radiation.
translation: 嗨，孩子们，这里是三狗，喔喔 — 你们黑暗中的圣音。或者……至少是辐射。

original: Every day it seems to be the same nutty scene, with the scuffles ending in a stalemate.
translation: 每天上演的荒诞戏码如出一辙，双方冲突总是以僵局收场。

original: One of these wackos seems to be assisted by robots, and the other by mutated bugs.
translation: 其中一个怪胎操纵着机器人军团，另一个则驱使着变异昆虫群。

original: I've been getting some scattered reports that a couple of costumed kooks have been battling for control of the settlement called Canterbury Commons.
translation: 我收到一些零散报告，称有两个穿着奇装异服的疯子正在争夺一个叫坎特伯雷社区的聚居地控制权。

original: All right, Three Dog has heard about some crazy things going on out there in the Capital Wasteland, but this one just might beat them all.
translation: 好吧，三狗可听过不少发生在首都废土的的疯狂事，但这次的事绝对最离谱。

original: That, my friends, is fighting the good fight.
translation: 我的朋友，那叫正义之战。

original: Hellooooo Capital Wasteland! This is Three Dog, awoooo, coming to you loud and proud from Galaxy News Radio.
translation: 哈喽~~首都废土！我是三狗，嗷哦~~，在银河新闻电台，满怀自豪地大声向你们播报。

original: These guys are schemers, crooks, and killers, and the sooner you all realize that and stand up to their oppression, the better.
translation: 那些家伙是阴谋家、恶棍和杀手，你越快意识到这一点越好，勇敢地对抗他们的压迫。

original: Wake up, children -- the Enclave have a giant truck full 'o Brahmin, and they've been spoon-feeding you the bullshit.
translation: 醒醒，孩子们 — 英克雷有辆装满了双头牛的巨型卡车，他们填鸭式地向你们灌输牛粪。

original: The Enclave, and that includes their Homecoming King, "President" John Henry Eden and his gorilla Colonel Augustus Autumn, are NOT here to help you.
translation: 英克雷，包括他们的返乡国王，“总统”约翰·亨利·伊登，还有他的打手奥古斯塔斯·奥特姆上校，都不是来帮你们的。

original: Children, I don't care if you've ignored every other word that's come out of my mouth for the past five years. Please. Hear me now, and believe.
translation: 孩子们，我不介意过去五年你是不是把我的每一句话当成耳旁风。不过现在，听我说，并且相信我。

original: From Rivet City to downtown D.C., the Enclave is on the scene and setting up shop.
translation: 从铆钉城到特区市区，英克雷无处不在并且到处发展。

original: Good golly, Holly. This is the worst thing to happen to our neighborhood since the HOA instituted their mandatory "scavenged rags" dress code.
translation: 上帝，霍莉，这是自从他们强行穿着“扫破烂”装以来，发生在我们周围最坏的事情。

original: So if you're out by Grayditch, you may want to pop in and see what's what.
translation: 所以你要是路过灰渠，你没准要去拜访拜访，看看事情的真相。

original: Wake up, Wasteland! It's me, Three Dog, bringing you all the music and news your little hearts can handle.
translation: 醒醒，废土！是我，三狗，带来各种音乐与新闻，让各位的小心脏应接不暇。

original: Residents haven't come out to trade with the caravaners, and attempts to make contact have been met with... silence.
translation: 居民们从没有出来与商人做过生意，他们的所有试图得到的只是……缄默。

original: Okay... it seems the settlement of Grayditch has gone quiet.
translation: 好的……看来这灰渠居民区已经安静了。

original: Come on, Al, cut the Ghoulies a break. If they've got the caps and you've got the space, it's a win-win, right? Whadaya say?
translation: 嗨，奥利斯特，给尸鬼们点机会。如果他们得到了瓶盖，而你得到了地盘，那就是双赢，对吧？你说怎么样？

original: You're listening to Galaxy News Radio, and I'm your host, Three Dog, lord and master of all I survey!
translation: 你正在收听银河新闻电台。我是你的主播，三狗，一切的君主！

original: Ah, but lush at large Allistair Tenpenny says, "No zombies, no how!"
translation: 哈……但花里胡哨的奥利斯特·特佩尼明明白白地说，“不要丧尸，不择手段！”

original: According to reports from the ever so hoity toity Tenpenny Tower, a group of displaced Ghouls have been trying to gain entrance.
translation: 根据这条来自一贯如此装腔作势的特佩尼大厦的消息，一群卷土重来的尸鬼企图闯进来。

original: The rest of you Brotherhood cats -- can't you extend an olive branch or something? You'd think fighting the Super Mutants would be enough...
translation: 至于兄弟会的各位好汉，就不能递个橄榄枝啥的？和变种人厮杀还不够你们忙活的吗……

original: GNR. Three Dog. All you need to know.
translation: 银新台。三狗。有你需要知道的一切。

original: So, Brotherhood Outcasts -- knock it off! I'd prefer not to get murdered in my own backyard.
translation: 放逐者的小子们，给我消停点儿！我可不想在自家后院挨黑枪。

original: But when the Outcasts decide to take pot shots at my building -- which the Brotherhood uses as an outpost -- I make an exception.
translation: 但当放逐者决定对兄弟会用作前哨站的本台大楼放冷枪时，我必须破例开麦。

original: Now, normally, family squabbles are none of my business.
translation: 要搁平时，家庭口角我懒得掺和。

original: Tensions continue to mount between the courageous forces of the Brotherhood of Steel and their estranged brethren, the Outcasts.
translation: 钢铁兄弟会的英勇势力与其疏远的兄弟派系放逐者之间的紧张关系持续恶化。

original: Today's weather -- excessively violent, with a chance of dismemberment. Tune in later for our 5-day forecast.
translation: 今日天气——极其暴力，有被肢解的风险。请稍后关注我们的五日天气预报。

original: What's up Wastelanders? This is Three Dog, wow wow, and you're listening to GNR! That's Galaxy News Radio, in case you forgot...
translation: 废土人，最近过得咋样？这里是三狗，喔喔喔，你正在收听的是银新台！全称银河新闻电台，免得有人忘了……

original: So if you see a Knight or Paladin out there fighting your battles for you, give him a big thanks. Or even better -- some ammo.
translation: 所以，如果你看到一位骑士或圣骑士在外为你作战，请向他好好道谢。或者给他一些弹药更好。

original: Be sure and tune in next time, for another exciting adventure of me, Herbert "Daring" Dashwood, and my stalwart Ghoul manservant Argyle!
translation: 锁定频道，下次我会讲述另一个奇特经历。我是赫伯特“大胆”达什伍德，还有我勇敢的尸鬼仆人阿盖尔！

original: Without our buddies from the Brotherhood, I'm guessing the entire Capital Wasteland would have been overrun a long time ago.
translation: 要是没有我们兄弟会的弟兄，我猜整个首都废土早就被蹂躏了。

original: They've recently stepped up patrols in the downtown D.C. ruins in response to increasing sightings of everybody's favorite freaks, the Super Mutants.
translation: 他们最近加强了对特区市中心废墟的巡逻，以应对越来越多的大家喜欢的怪胎目击事件——超级变种人。

original: The boys and girls of the Brotherhood of Steel continue to fight the good fight, folks.
translation: 家人们，钢铁兄弟会的小伙子和姑娘们将继续为正义而奋战。

original: Word is, these guys take all the contracts the other mercs won't. In short -- there's nothing they won't do. So be careful out there.
translation: 据说，这些人接了其他佣兵不接的所有合同。简而言之——没有他们不干的事。所以在外一定要小心。

original: People of the Capital Wasteland, you can HEAR MEEEE!!!! Yeeeaa haaaa!!! You can't stop the signal, baby!
translation: 首都废土的人们，你们听见的是我！！呀哈！这是永不消逝的电波，宝贝！

original: If you see these hombres, steer clear. Whatever you have, they want, and they're not really into asking politely.
translation: 如果你碰见这些家伙，请避开。不管你有什么，他们都想要，而且他们并不喜欢礼貌地询问。

original: I've been getting more and more reports of these mercenary maniacs from Talon Company, especially in the downtown D.C. area.
translation: 我收到越来越多关于鹰爪公司那些雇佣兵疯子的报告，尤其是在特区市区。

original: Keep that in mind the next time you feel like nosing around that neighborhood.
translation: 谨记下次别再发出噪音打扰周围的邻居。

original: Today's episode - escape from Paradise Falls!
translation: 今天的节目 — 逃离天堂瀑！

original: There have been more and more sightings of Raiders over by Evergreen Mills. Smart money's on them having some kind of camp out that way.
translation: 常青工厂聚集了越来越多的掠夺者，他们在那打家劫舍。

original: Here's a question for all you faithful listeners. Have you guys and gals ever seen... a tree?
translation: 给各位忠实听众提个问题。你们这些伙计和姑娘们，可曾见过……一棵树？

original: This is Margaret and you're listening to... Oh, the hell with it. Listen to some music, and pray we find someone to replace Three Dog.
translation: 这是玛格丽特，你正在收听……哦，见鬼，叫什么来着。让我们听些音乐，顺便祈祷我们能找到三狗的继任者。

original: No, no, no. Not those shriveled black things. I'm talking real trees. Brown bark, green leaves, photosynthesis, all that good stuff.
translation: 不，不，不。不是那些枯萎的黑色的东西，我说的是真正的树。有棕色的树皮，绿色的树叶，还有光合作用，都是些好东西。

original: Now what if I, the all-powerful Three Dog, wow wow wow, were to tell you that somewhere right here in the Capital Wasteland, there's a place with LOTS of trees.
translation: 现在，如果我，全能的三狗，喔 喔 喔，告诉你，在首都废土这的某个地方，长满了苍翠的大树。

original: A veritable Oasis of green in that depressing sea of brown.
translation: 一片货真价实的绿洲，在灰黄废土中绿得发慌。

original: Look, it was years ago, and I MAY have been experimenting with Jet at the time, but I'm telling you, it's out there...
translation: 听着，那是好多年前了，我当时好像在做什么杰特的试验，但我告诉你，它就在那里……

original: What the hell is going on down there? Revolution? Vacation? Somebody fart? Your guess is as good as mine, kiddies.
translation: 下面到底发生了什么？革命？放假？有人放屁？孩子们，你们猜得和我一样准。

original: [Argyle] So little faith, boss. I could disarm this Slaver junk with my eyes closed. One second... <click!> there! Now for yours... stand still! <click!>
translation: [阿盖尔] 太没信心了，老板。我闭着眼都能把这奴隶贩子的垃圾给解开。稍等……<咔嗒！>好了！到你了……别动！<咔嗒！>

original: Turns out it gets better. I've got a new report here that says someone ELSE has just climbed out of that hole!
translation: 事实证明情况变得更好了。我这收到一份新报告，说有人刚刚从那个洞里爬出来！

original: Not too long ago, I reported that a cat recently left Vault 101. His name is James. Good guy.
translation: 不久前，我报道了一只猫最近离开了101号避难所。它的名字是詹姆斯。一个好人。

original: And for all you other cats out there listening, if you see the kid from Vault 101 out there, give her a pat on the back and wish her luck.
translation: 而你们这些外面的小猫们，听好了，如果你们在外面看到那来自101号避难所的孩子，请给她点鼓励，并祝她好运。

original: [Dashwood] Argyle, you magnificent bastard! You did it!
translation: [达什伍德] 阿盖尔，你这了不起的混蛋！你做到了！

original: And for all you other cats out there listening, if you see the kid from Vault 101 out there, give him a pat on the back and wish him luck.
translation: 而你们这些外面的小猫们，听好了，如果你们在外面看到那来自101号避难所的孩子，请给他点鼓励，并祝他好运。

original: But James, if you're listening... Your kid's out, man, and she misses you. So you might want to find her before she gets swallowed up and spit out.
translation: 还有詹姆斯，如果你也在听……你的孩子就在外面，伙计，她想念你。所以，或许你应该在她被什么东西吃下去再拉出来之前找到她。

original: But James, if you're listening... Your kid's out, man, and he misses you. So you might want to find him before he gets swallowed up and spit out.
translation: 还有詹姆斯，如果你也在听……你的孩子就在外面，伙计，他想念你。所以，或许你应该在他被什么东西吃下去再拉出来之前找到他。

original: Is that why he left the vault? Looks that way. So who knows, maybe James is going to save the world. Can't think of a better cause than that.
translation: 这就是他离开避难所的原因？看来就是这了。谁知道呢，或许詹姆斯就是想拯救这世界。找不到比这更好的理由了。

original: See, James left Vault 101 without telling the kid why. Now, I've since learned that James is a scientist and is working on something big.
translation: 看，詹姆斯没告诉孩子原因就离开了101号避难所。我后来才知道，詹姆斯是个科学家，正在研究一件大事。

original: I know! I know! I couldn't make this shit up! Okay, but now it gets kind of sad. You see, the kid is looking for her dad, looking for James.
translation: 我知道！我知道！我编不出这种屁话！好吧，不过现在有点悲哀了。你看，这孩子正在寻找她的爸爸，找詹姆斯。

original: I know! I know! I couldn't make this shit up! Okay, but now it gets kind of sad. You see, the kid is looking for his dad, looking for James.
translation: 我知道！我知道！我编不出这种屁话！好吧，不过现在有点悲哀了。你看，这孩子正在寻找他的爸爸，找詹姆斯。

original: Now. You want to know if it gets better, don't you? Well hell YES it gets better! Turns out vault dweller #2 was none other than James's kid!
translation: 现在，你们想知道情况是否好转了，是吧？这该死的事情还真的好转了！事实证明，避难所居民2号不是别人就是詹姆斯的孩子！

original: Weeeeelll... Guess who came to visit ole' Three Dog at his luxurious studio in beautiful downtown D.C.? That's right - the other vault dweller!
translation: 喔喔喔……猜猜谁来拜访了老三狗位于特区市中心的豪华工作室？没错——那另一位避难所居民！

original: Okay, so I told you about James, the guy from the vault. And then I told you somebody else crawled outta there too. Right.
translation: 好吧，我跟你们说过詹姆斯，那来自避难所的家伙。然后我告诉你们还有其他人也从那里出来了。没错。

original: Hoooooo BOY! Children, you are going to LOVE this.
translation: 哦~~~兄弟！孩子们，你们一定会喜欢这。

original: Kid, you get your ass back to GNR, you hear me? We've got some stuff to talk about!
translation: 孩子，快滚回银河台，你听到吗？我们得谈谈！

original: [Argyle] Don't thank me yet, boss. We still need to get out of here. Let's go! While the guard's away from the front gate!
translation: [阿盖尔] 先别急着谢我，老板。我们还得离开这。赶快走吧！趁着守卫不在前门！

original: From here on in, it's bye-bye stupid static, hello magnificent music. So sit back, relax, and absorb these classic tunes.
translation: 从现在开始，再见愚蠢的静电，你好美妙的音乐。请坐好，放松，欣赏这些经典曲目。

original: Because of the kid from Vault 101, that's how! That gal actually managed to repair our antenna relay. How's that for ingenuity, folks?
translation: 因为那来自101号避难所的孩子，就是这样！那女孩居然修好了我们的天线中继器。这样的才智如何，伙计们？

original: Because of the kid from Vault 101, that's how! That cat actually managed to repair our antenna relay. How's that for ingenuity, folks?
translation: 因为那来自101号避难所的孩子，就是这样！那只猫居然修好了我们的天线中继器。这样的才智如何，伙计们？

original: But Three Dog! You're in that cool radio studio in D.C. How do YOU know I can hear you, all the way out here in the ass end of nowhere?
translation: 但是三狗！你现在正位于特区那酷酷的电台工作室里。你怎么知道我在这鸟不拉屎的地方能听到你？

original: That's right, from Megaton to Girdershade, Paradise Falls to the Republic of Dave, we are coming to you loud and proud, in a special live report!
translation: 没错，从兆吨镇到梁影村，从天堂瀑到戴夫共和国，我们响亮而自豪的来到你身边，并带给你特殊的直播报道！

original: And... According to my super secrety sources, Rivet City council member and lead egghead Doctor Madison Li is personally involved.
translation: 并且……根据我的超级秘密的消息来源，铆钉城议会成员和知识分子领袖麦迪逊·李博士以个人身份参与其中。

original: [Dashwood] Not so fast, my flesh-rotten friend! That girl we came in with. We're the only chance she's got. Come on!
translation: [达什伍德] 别那么快，我的腐肉朋友！和我们一起进来的那个女孩。我们是她唯一的机会。快点！

original: Hey, all I can tell you is the Vault kid showed up, and the scientists there started running around like their pointy heads were on fire.
translation: 嗨，我所能告诉你的就是：当避难所孩子出现后，那的科学家就像是脑袋着火似的东奔西跑。

original: SOMETHING is going on down in Rivet City, and you-know-who is involved.
translation: 在铆钉城发生了一些事，而你 — 知道 — 谁 — 参与其中。

original: Here's hoping they can hold onto each other this time around.
translation: 希望这次他们能够互相扶持。

original: [Argyle] <Sigh> Always with the dames.
translation: [阿盖尔] <叹息>又是女人。

original: But none of that matters now! Father and daughter were spotted walkin' and talkin' together out there in the Wastes.
translation: 不过，现在无所谓了！有人看到父女俩在废土边走边谈。

original: But none of that matters now! Father and son were spotted walkin' and talkin' together out there in the Wastes.
translation: 不过，现在无所谓了！有人看到父子俩在废土边走边谈。

original: What kind of dad leaves his kid in an underground bunker? Children, I just don't know. It ain't for Three Dog to judge, and you shouldn't either.
translation: 什么样的父亲才会把自己的孩子们留在地下掩体里？孩子们，我只是不明白。这不该让三狗来下判断，也不应该由你来。

original: You see, the kid from Vault 101 has been looking for her dad, a very nice man named James, who left his daughter in the vault when he took off.
translation: 你看，来自101号避难所的孩子一直在寻找她的父亲，一个叫詹姆斯的人，一个离开时却把女儿留在避难所里的“好男人”。

original: You see, the kid from Vault 101 has been looking for his dad, a very nice man named James, who left his son behind in the vault when he took off.
translation: 你看，来自101号避难所的孩子一直在寻找他的父亲，一个叫詹姆斯的人，一个离开时却把儿子留在避难所里的“好男人”。

original: It's about love, abandonment, and - now this is the good part - reunion!
translation: 这是关于爱、遗弃，和 — 现在这的高潮部分 — 团圆！

original: Grab your hankies, children, cause I've got a heart-warming tale to tell. It's about a little girl's search for her... for her daddy. Waaaahh!
translation: 拿好你的手帕，孩子们，因为我有一个温暖人心故事要讲述。它是关于一个小女孩寻找她的……她的爸爸的故事。哇哇哇！

original: Grab your hankies, children, cause I've got a heart-warming tale to tell. It's about a little boy's search for... for his daddy. Waaaahh!
translation: 拿好你的手帕，孩子们，因为我有一个温暖人心故事要讲述。它是关于一个小男孩寻找他的……他的爸爸的故事。哇哇哇！

original: Well, boys and girls, what can I say. Looks like President Eden wasn't completely full of shit after all. Methinks we are screwed...
translation: 男孩们和女孩们，怎么说呢。毕竟伊登总统看起来还不是完全一无是处。据我看来，我们都被耍了……

original: <Sound of movement, huffing and puffing>
translation: <行动声，喘息声>

original: They're safe and sound now at the Citadel. Praise Jesus! Praise Jesus! No sign of the kid's father, though. Here's hoping James is okay.
translation: 他们现在安然无恙的抵达五角大本营了。赞美耶稣！赞美耶稣！尽管还没有关于这孩子父亲的消息，但大家都希望詹姆斯没事。

original: And, when the Man showed up, a bunch of scientists went running. With them was Rivet City's own Dr. Madison Li, and that crazy kid from Vault 101.
translation: 而且，当那男人出现时，一大批科学家冲了上去。和他们一起冲上去的是铆钉城的负责人麦迪逊·李博士, 还有那来自101号避难所的疯狂孩子。

original: You heard it here first, my friends - the Enclave is on the scene. I've got reports of flying ships and shock troops in high-tech power armor.
translation: 这是第一手的消息，忠实的听众们 — 英克雷就在现场。我得到了关于飞船和身穿高科技动力装甲的突击部队的现场报告。

original: Tinfoil hat time, children. My eyes and ears tell me the Big Bad Government has taken over that big machine thingy at the Jefferson Memorial.
translation: 别再浪费时间了，孩子们。我的眼睛和耳朵告诉我，邪恶的政府已经接管了杰斐逊纪念馆的大型机械。

original: Good luck with that, my friend. Only thing been seen out in those parts is Yao Guai, Super Mutants, and some crazy mountain kids.
translation: 祝你好运，我的朋友。在那些地方唯一能看到的就是妖怪、超级变种人和一些疯狂的山里孩子。

original: [Dashwood] All right. She's locked in there. They call it... "the box." First, we need to remove that guard...
translation: [达什伍德] 好的。她被关在那。他们称之为……“盒子”。首先我们需要引走那守卫……

original: Makes perfect sense to me. The kid's had enough of the wild and wooly Wasteland, and is looking for another old vault to crawl into.
translation: 我觉得很正常。这孩子已经受够了废土的狂野，正在寻找另一个可以爬进去的老避难所。

original: The kid from Vault 101, aka the Wanderer, aka "That Crazy Sonnuvabitch," has been spotted poking around some caves way out west.
translation: 来自101号避难所的那孩子，又名“漫游者”，又称“婊养的疯子”，被发现在西部的一些洞穴里探险。

original: So what was Vault kid doing out there? You do the math.
translation: 避难所小孩正在那干嘛？你自己想想吧。

original: [Argyle] Allow me. <walking> Hey fella, got a light?
translation: [阿盖尔] 让我来。<步行声>嗨，哥们，有火吗？

original: But Three Dog, the selling of live human beings is completely fucked up! Yes, children. Yes it is.
translation: 而三狗要说！这种贩卖活人的勾当就应当被收拾！是的，孩子们。必须的。

original: Do you know what goes on out there in the stripmall that time forgot? Wake up, children! It's a goddamned slaver compound! They. Sell. People.
translation: 你知道那被时间遗忘的狭长广场发生了什么？醒醒吧，孩子们！那是个该该死的奴隶贩大院！他们，贩卖，人口。

original: The gal from Vault 101 was seen walking into Paradise Falls, and then walking back out with a big smile on her face.
translation: 有人看见，从101号避难所来的女孩走进了天堂瀑，然后带着灿烂的笑容出来了。

original: The cat from Vault 101 was seen walking into Paradise Falls, and then walking back out with a big smile on his face.
translation: 有人看见，从101号避难所来的小猫走进了天堂瀑，然后带着灿烂的笑容出来了。

original: But more importantly - does it even matter worth a damn? Slavers are dead, slaves are free. That's a win-win if you ask me, children.
translation: 但更重要的是 — 这该死的事值得一搏，不是吗？奴隶贩子会被干掉，而奴隶都将获得自由。孩子们，如果你问我，我会说：这可是件一举两得的事。

original: Did they sell her a bum slave and then refuse the refund, or was it some elaborate rescue operation?
translation: 是不是他们卖给了她一个次品奴隶，然后还拒绝退款？或者这本来就是一个精心准备的救援行动？

original: Did they sell him a bum slave and then refuse the refund, or was it some elaborate rescue operation?
translation: 是不是他们卖给了他一个次品奴隶，然后还拒绝退款？或者这本来就是一个精心准备的救援行动？

original: You heard it here first, faithful listeners. The Wanderer showed up at slaver central and bad guys started dropping left and right.
translation: 这是最新消息，忠实的听众们。在漫游者现身奴隶中心后，坏家伙们就开始纷纷倒下。

original: Gasp! But what's this? The bothersome bumblebee looked suspiciously like a certain kid, from a certain vault...
translation: 呼！但是，这是什么？这惹人厌的大马蜂看起来的确像某个来自避难所的孩子……

original: Those scumbag Slavers way over in Paradise Falls had one big ole bee on their bonnet, and this baby knew how to sting.
translation: 天堂瀑的那些卑鄙的奴隶贩子们，他们的帽檐可是有着一只大马蜂，而且这马蜂知道怎么去蛰人。

original: Look, all I'm sayin' is the Wanderer showed up, and then some slaves mysteriously escaped. Coincidence? Oh, I think not...
translation: 听着，我所能说的就是：漫游者出现后，一些奴隶就神秘地逃跑了。巧合吗？噢，我想不是……

original: Gasp! But what's this? The bothersome bumblebee looks suspiciously like a certain kid, from a certain vault...
translation: 呼！但是，这是什么？这惹人厌的大马蜂看起来的确像某个来自避难所的孩子……

original: Those scumbag Slavers way over in Paradise Falls have one big ole bee on their bonnet. Buzz, buzz, buzz, buzz, buzz!
translation: 那些在天堂瀑的卑鄙奴隶贩子们，他们的帽檐可是有着一只大马蜂。嗡嗡嗡，嗡嗡嗡，嗡嗡嗡，嗡嗡嗡！

original: Good luck, Wanderer. You'll need it.
translation: 祝你好运，漫游者。你正需要这。

original: [Guard] Huh?
translation: [守卫] 啊？

original: Anyway, the vertibird was headed northwest into the mountains, where I have it on good authority the Enclave has their big underground clubhouse.
translation: 总之，飞鸟已进入了西北方的山脉，据可靠的消息称，那地下有英克雷的大型俱乐部。

original: I mean, how willing can you be when you're encased in a block of ice? Crazy, I know, but these are crazy times we live in...
translation: 我是说，当你被困在冰棺材里，你的意志能有多坚强？我知道这很疯狂，但是我们不就活在疯狂的时代里吗…

original: My deep cover super secret agents tell me a vertibird recently flew out of the mountains to the west, and the vault kid was an unwilling passenger.
translation: 我的超级秘密特工向我报告说，最近有一架飞鸟飞入了西边山脉，而避难所孩子就是那不情愿的乘客。

original: Yikes. Looks like the lone Wanderer has wandered himself right into the Enclave's sinister clutches.
translation: 呀。看来，独行客已经把他自己逛进了英克雷的魔爪中。

original: Yikes. Looks like the lone Wanderer has wandered herself right into the Enclave's sinister clutches.
translation: 呀。看来，独行客已经把她自己逛进了英克雷的魔爪中。

original: Time for a showdown with the remaining Enclave forces at the Jefferson Memorial? You keep listening, children, and GNR will keep you posted!
translation: 是时候向驻留在杰斐逊纪念馆的英克雷军队摊牌了？请继续收听，孩子们，银河新闻电台将为您追踪报道！

original: [Argyle] Lotus... kick! Yieee!! <sound of a hit>
translation: [阿盖尔] 摆莲……踢！咦耶！！<击打声>

original: In other news, the Brotherhood of Steel has amassed a large assault force at the Citadel.
translation: 其他方面的消息，钢铁兄弟会已在大本营集结了大量突击部队。

original: Can't have everything, I guess.
translation: 我想我们也不可能掌握一切消息。

original: Now here's the bad news. Unfortunately, the little bitch from Vault 101 managed to crawl out before the place went kaboom.
translation: 现在，这有个坏消息。非常不幸，来自101号避难所的小婊子在那地方爆炸之前就爬出去了。

original: Now here's the bad news. Unfortunately, the little prick from Vault 101 managed to crawl out before the place went kaboom.
translation: 现在，这有个坏消息。非常不幸，来自101号避难所的小滑头在那地方爆炸之前就爬出去了。

original: Time for a showdown with the remaining Enclave forces at the Jefferson Memorial? You keep listening, children, and GNR will keep you posted!
translation: 是时候向驻留在杰斐逊纪念馆的英克雷军队摊牌了？请继续收听，孩子们，银河新闻电台将为您追踪报道！

original: In other news, the Brotherhood of Steel has amassed a large assault force at the Citadel.
translation: 其他方面的消息，钢铁兄弟会已在大本营集结了大量突击部队。

original: Keep fighting the good fight, kid! We're with you all the way!
translation: 坚持为正义而战，孩子！我们永远与你同在！

original: And if that weren't good enough news, word is our old friend from Vault 101 made it out of there in one piece.
translation: 如果这还不算好消息的话，这还有一个：我们从101号避难所里来的老朋友已经安然无恙的脱身了。

original: Sure enough, the Enclave radio station is officially offline. Hell, check for yourself if you don't' believe me!
translation: 毫无疑问，英克雷电台正式垮台了。该死，如果你不相信我的话可以自己去看看！

original: The Enclave's not-so-secret base way up in the northwest just went kablooey! And I have reports, damn good ones, that Eden didn't make it out alive!
translation: 英克雷那条位于西北方向的非秘密通道刚刚发生了爆炸！而且我这有个报道，真他妈的好，伊登没有活着出来！

original: I'm coming to you live with a special report! Ding, dong, the sanctimonious, self-righteous, self-proclaimed Presidential asshole is dead!
translation: 我来给你们带来了一个特别报道！叮咚。那伪善的、自以为是、自封为总统的混蛋终于死了！

original: If Eden declares this kid vice president, I swear to God I'll swallow this microphone.
translation: 如果伊登宣布这孩子为副总统，我向上帝发誓我会吞下这麦克风。

original: Attention all Raven Rock personnel. This is your President, John Henry Eden.
translation: 注意，所有渡鸦岩的人们。我是你们的总统，约翰·亨利·伊登。

original: If anyone can hear this, this is Bob Andersteen.
translation: 有人能听到这条消息吗，我是鲍勃·安德斯丁。

original: Mayday. Mayday. Mayday.
translation: 求救。求救。求救。

original: <unintelligible>
translation: <莫明其妙的>

original: <unintelligible>
translation: <莫明其妙的>

original: <unintelligible>
translation: <莫明其妙的>

original: Greetings to the oppressed masses from the peace-loving peoples of China!
translation: 热爱和平的中国人民向被压迫的劳苦大众致以最诚挚的问候！

original: All peace-loving peoples must join together to stop the war of aggression being waged by the Wall Street gang!
translation: 所有热爱和平的人民应当紧密团结起来，遏制由华尔街罪恶组织发动的侵略战争！

original: People of the Capital Wasteland, you can HEAR MEEEE!!!! Yeeeaa haaaa!!! You can't stop the signal, baby!
translation: 首都废土的人们，你们听见的是我！！呀哈！这是永不消逝的电波，宝贝！

original: This is Margaret and you're listening to... Oh, the hell with it. Listen to some music, and pray we find someone to replace Three Dog.
translation: 这是玛格丽特，你正在收听……哦，见鬼，叫什么来着。让我们听些音乐，顺便祈祷我们能找到三狗的继任者。

original: If Three Dog were here, he'd say something witty. But he's not. Cause somebody killed him. So you get me playing music. Yay.
translation: 要是三狗在这，他准会说些逗趣的话。但他没有，因为他被杀了。所以只得由我来播放音乐了。哈。

original: It's me again, Margaret the technician, talking into the microphone and hoping somebody gives a shit. Enjoy the music.
translation: 又是我，技师玛格丽特，对着麦克风唠叨，希望能引起谁的注意。让我们欣赏音乐。

original: Margaret here, bringing you... music. Why just music? Because I'm just a technician, and some asshole murdered our DJ. Hooray.
translation: 这是玛格丽特，带给你……音乐。为什么只有音乐？因为我只是个技师，我们的DJ被一个混蛋给杀了。

original: This is Margaret again, with another funtabulous round of ancient music. Three Dog's dead, and that's all I got.
translation: 这还是玛格丽特，带给你又一轮美妙的复古音乐。三狗死了，我的箱底只有这些。

original: Hey everybody, this is Three Dog, your friendly neighborhood disc jockey. What's a "disc"? Hell if I know. But I'm gonna keep talkin' anyway.
translation: 嘿，各位，这里是三狗，你们友爱的邻家打碟男孩。什么是“碟”？鬼才知道呢。但我还是会继续唠下去。

original: People of the Capital Wasteland! It is I, Three Dog, your ruler! Hear me, and obey! Oh, sorry, that's that OTHER radio station.
translation: 首都废土的居民们！是我，三狗，你们的主宰！听我号令，服从于我！哦，抱歉，那是隔壁电台的台词。

original: Men and ladies, boys and girls, prepare to be astounded, bedazzled, and otherwise stupefied! I am Three Dog, your master of ceremonies!
translation: 先生们女士们，男孩、女孩们，准备好迎接震撼、目眩神迷和惊叹吧！我是三狗，你们的司仪大师！

original: Hey nifty America. It's me, your president, John Hen... Ahhhh... Gotcha! Three Dog here! How's everyone doin'?
translation: 你们好，亲爱的美国民众。是我，你们的总统，约翰……啊……骗到你了！这是三狗！大家过的怎样？

original: Thrrreeee Dooooggg! That's me, kids. Comin' to you taped from my fortified bunker in the middle of the D.C. hellhole. Ain't life grand?
translation: 三~~~狗~~~！就是我，孩子们。从我在地狱般的特区那坚固堡垒里给你带来的电台。生活得美好吗？

original: Because one dog ain't enough, and two is too low, it's me, Three Dog! How you kids handlin' Post-Apocalyptia today?
translation: 因为一狗不够，两也太少，所以只有我三狗了！孩子们，劫后余生的今天过得怎么样？

original: Hey kiddies, this is Three Dog -- your voice in the darkness. Or... at least, the radiation.
translation: 嗨，孩子们，这里是三狗 — 你们黑暗中的圣音。或者……至少是辐射。

original: Hellooooo Capital Wasteland! This is Three Dog, coming to you loud and proud from Galaxy News Radio.
translation: 哈喽~~首都废土！我是三狗，在银河新闻电台，满怀自豪地大声向你们播报。

original: Wake up, Wasteland! It's me, Three Dog, bringing you all the music and news your little hearts can handle.
translation: 醒醒，废土！是我，三狗，带来各种音乐与新闻，让各位的小心脏应接不暇。

original: You're listening to Galaxy News Radio, and I'm your host, Three Dog, lord and master of all I survey!
translation: 你正在收听银河新闻电台。我是你的主播，三狗，一切的君主！

original: GNR. Three Dog. All you need to know.
translation: 银新台。三狗。有你需要知道的一切。

original: What's up Wastelanders? This is Three Dog, and you're listening to GNR! That's Galaxy News Radio, in case you forgot...
translation: 废土人，最近过得咋样？这里是三狗，你正在收听的是银新台！全称银河新闻电台，免得有人忘了……

original: This next piece is dedicated to my old friend Crazy Wolfgang. No one can scour the Wasteland and find such oddities as you.
translation: 接下来的歌曲献给我的老朋友疯子沃尔夫冈。踏遍废土也没人能找出像你这样的怪人。

original: I'd like to play this next piece of music for the man out there who keeps an old lady alive and well. Doc Hoff, once again I thank you.
translation: 我想为那位让老妇活得很好的人演奏下一首乐曲。霍夫医生，我再次感谢你。

original: To the traveling merchant who only goes by the name Crow, I thank you for all the times you spent keeping me company. Enjoy the music, my love.
translation: 致被称为乌鸦的旅行商人，感谢你长久以来伴我左右。欣赏这段音乐吧，我的爱人。

original: This is just a quick thank you to my new friend. Thank you for bringing me what I'd been searching for all these years.
translation: 这是一条对我新朋友的简洁谢言。感谢你给了我长久来一直找寻的真情。

original: Music has always been an important part of my life. I hope you enjoy listening to these pieces as much as I enjoy playing them.
translation: 音乐，向来是我生命中的重要部分。这些音乐，我希望你们能够倾听它们，并且如同我播放它们时一样，收获同样的欣喜。

original: Here is another lovely song for a lonely traveler wandering the Wasteland. You know who you are.
translation: 这首情歌献给一位在废土流浪的孤独旅者。你知道我说的是谁。

original: If my notes sound sweeter it's all thanks to a special someone who helped out a poor old lady living alone in the Wasteland. Thank you, my friend.
translation: 如果我的语调听起来都欢快了，那全拜一位帮助独居老妇的人所赐。谢谢，我的朋友。

original: Remember, Agatha is with you on those cold nights. Just keep listening to this broadcast and I'll keep you company. It's the least I can do.
translation: 记着，漫漫寒夜，阿加莎伴你身侧。继续收听这电台，我会伴你度过。这是我能尽的绵薄之力。

original: They say recent events have made the world seem like a better place. I hope all of you out there can smile and feel better knowing that it's true.
translation: 有人说一些近期的事件让这世界变得更美好了。在知道这是事实后，我希望所有的人都能笑一笑，感觉好些。

original: This next selection was one of my mother's favorites. I hope you'll enjoy hearing it as much as I enjoy playing it.
translation: 接下来的选曲是我母亲的至爱。我希望你们能够倾听它们，并且如同我播放它们时一样，收获同样的欣喜。

original: That song reminded me how wonderful these composers were. How delightful to have such an amazing imagination.
translation: 那首歌让我怀念起这些作曲家的横溢才华。拥有如此惊人的想象力是件多么愉悦的事。

original: This is for all those people out there who take the time to help out those in need. Enjoy the music... you've earned it.
translation: 这首歌献给所有雪中送炭的好心人。欣赏音乐……这是你们应得的。

original: This next piece reminds me of something my husband said. "Friendship is like a violin. Even if the music stops, you'll still have the strings."
translation: 接下来的音乐让我想起我丈夫的一席话：“友谊就像一把小提琴。就算音乐停止，你仍能听到弦外之音。”

original: Just a word to my Wasteland friends out there. Stay safe, stay healthy and above all, stay happy.
translation: 对我的废土同胞们说句话。愿你平安，健康，最重要的是，要快乐。

original: I'm dedicating this next piece of music to my loving husband. May his soul find peace.
translation: 我将接下来这首歌献给我挚爱的丈夫。希望他的灵魂得到安息。

original: We stand now at the precipice.
translation: 我们现在站在悬崖边上。

original: This is the Overseer.
translation: 我是监督者。

original: This is the Overseer.
translation: 我是监督者。

original: Remember - A clean vault is a healthy vault. Please place all trash into the appropriate incineration receptacle on your scheduled burning day.
translation: 记住——干净的避难所就是一个健康的避难所。请在你预定的焚烧日将所有垃圾放入相应的焚烧容器。

original: Remember - Your Pip-Boy is not a toy. Proper cleaning and maintenance will ensure the device's operation for this, and future, generations.
translation: 记住——你的哔哔小子不是玩具。适当的清洁和维护将确保该设备能供本代和后代使用。

original: Remember - Vault 101 IS America.
translation: 记住——101号避难所就是美国。

original: Remember - Vault Depressive Syndrome, or V.D.S., is a treatable condition. See your vault physician today for an antidepressant that's right for you.
translation: 记住——避难所抑郁症，简称V.D.S，是可以治疗的。现在就向你的避难所医生求助，寻找适合你的抗抑郁药剂。

original: Remember - Only you can prevent fatal work-related injuries. Proper use and storage of all high-velocity tools is essential to survival.
translation: 记住——只有你自己才能避免致命的工伤。正确使用和存放所有高速工具是生存的关键。

original: The Overseer's authority is absolute.
translation: 监督者的权威不容质疑。

original: This is Vault 101, and you're enjoying a brighter future… underground.
translation: 这里是101号避难所，你们在地下……享受着更光明的未来。

original: Current radiation level -- 0 rads. As always.
translation: 当前放射线等级 — 辐射值为0，一如往常。

original: Walk. Don't run.
translation: 慢行。不要奔跑。

original: Did you know - the average life expectancy of a resident in a properly maintained vault is 92.3 years?
translation: 你知道么？在一座维护得当的避难所里，居民的平均寿命高达92.3岁。

original: Did you know - due to the threats of radiation and mutant domination, the United States will not be habitable again for at least three centuries?
translation: 你知道吗？由于辐射的威胁和变种人的统治，合众国至少三个世纪内都不适合人类居住。

original: Did you know - the odds of a Vault-Tec shelter failing are 1,763, 497… to 1?
translation: 你知道吗？一座避难所科技的庇护所崩塌的可能性仅有1,763,497……分之1。

original: Did you know - Vault-Tec water and life support systems can sustain a vault for over 900 years, without failure?
translation: 你知道吗？避难所科技的水体与生命保障系统可维持避难所900多年而不出故障。

original: Did you know -- the Vault-Tec/RobCo partnership is considered the most successful joint venture in the history of American industry?
translation: 你知道吗——避难所科技/RobCo的合作被公认为是美利坚工业史上最成功的合资。

original: This is an automated distress message from Vault-Tec Vault 101. Message begins:
translation: 这是一条由101号避难所发出的自动求救信号。消息内容如下：

original: To anyone who can hear me: my name is Wernher. I come from a settlement to the north.
translation: 致所有能见我的人: 我叫沃纳。我来自北边的一个聚居地。

original: {start}
translation: {start}

original: Until next time, this is President Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until we meet again, this is President Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until next time, this is John Henry Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until we meet again, this is John Henry Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until next time, this is your President, John Henry Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Until we meet again, this is your President, John Henry Eden, signing off.
translation: 下次再见，我是亨利·伊登总统，播报完毕。

original: Message repeats.
translation: 重复讯息。

original: Roof access to the Statesman Hotel is only through the adjoining hospital. Please hurry! Butcher out.
translation: 只有经由旁边的医院才能通往政要酒店楼顶。请快一点！完毕。

original: We will continually broadcast as often as we can, but I'm afraid we don't have much time left. Butcher out.
translation: 我们会尽可能频繁地反复广播，但我担心我们抵抗不了多久了。完毕。

original: Keep your eyes open... we've left booby traps and mines to help slow the Mutants down.
translation: 眼睛放亮点……我们装置了用来拖延那些变种人的陷阱和地雷。

original: Oh, shit... here they come again...
translation: 哦，狗屎……他们又来了……

original: This message repeats.
translation: 重复这条信息。

original: Looks like I've gotten us into one heck of a pickle, Argyle old chum. One heck of a pickle indeed...
translation: 好像我让我们陷入大麻烦了，阿盖尔老伙计。真正的大麻烦……

original: Quite right. We've been trying to capture these Rockopolis rodents for years. Never could have done it without you, Daring.
translation: 非常正确。多年来我们一直想抓住这些岩石城的啮齿动物。“大胆”，没有你，我们永远也做不到。

original: I knew it! I knew this dame was no good! But it's worse than I thought. She's the Black Widow! The leader of the Slavers!
translation: 我就知道！我就知道这女人不是什么好东西！但情况比我想的更糟。她是黑寡妇！奴隶贩子的头！

original: Jabber all you want. In about 30 seconds, my associates from Paradise Falls will join us.
translation: 想说什么就说吧么。再过30秒，我的帮手就要从天堂瀑过来加入我们了。

original: Here I thought we were friends. And now you have a gun in my face. Bad form, Miss Chase. Bad form.
translation: 我以为我们是朋友了。现在你却拿枪指着我的脸。太没礼貌了，蔡斯小姐。太差劲了。

original: Oh, I don't know, Daring darling. I find the ghoul's instincts to be... frighteningly accurate.
translation: 哦，我不知道，亲爱的“大胆”。我发现尸鬼的直觉……准得吓人。

original: Ignore my manservant's mutterings, Penelope. He has a penchant for the dramatic you see. Why one time...
translation: 佩内洛普，不要理会我男仆的咕囔。他喜欢戏剧性的东西，你懂的。为什么有一次……

original: Listen to yourself, boss! This is Rockopolis! One of the safest places in the Wasteland, and you just showed a stranger where it is!
translation: 听听你说了什么，老板！这是岩石城！废土上最安全的地方之一，而你刚刚给一个陌生人指出了它在哪！

original: Oh, no, Miss Chase! I can assure you, this will be our special place.
translation: 哦，不，蔡斯小姐！我能保证，这将是我们专属的地方。

original: Now that's what I call a getaway, Daring! So tell me, do you take all your girlfriends here?
translation: 这就是我所说的度假地，“大胆”！那么告诉我，你会带你所有的女朋友来这？

original: Just over here! This large boulder! And now... the secret knock.  And... voila!
translation: 就在这！这块大石头！现在……敲击出暗号。然后……瞧！

original: So you do know where it is! Well come on then, those Super Mutants can't be far behind!
translation: 所以你知道它在哪了！那就快点吧，那些超级变种人就在后面不远了！
