original: Trouble, oh we got trouble, right here in Rivet City! Looks like trusted resident and head of security Harkness has unexpectedly flown the coop.
translation: 麻烦了，哦，我们有麻烦了，就在铆钉城！那看似可信的居民兼警卫主管哈克尼斯居然逃之夭夭了。

original: One small step backwards for man, one giant evolutionary rewind for mankind.
translation: 他后退一小步，人类倒退一大步。

original: You see, they worked together to completely wipe out a group of noble, slavery-hating abolitionists at a place called the Temple of the Union.
translation: 你看，他们在一个叫联邦圣殿的地方，合力彻底消灭了一群高尚的、憎恨奴隶制的废奴主义者。

original: Well you're in luck! Human bondage is here to stay, folks, thanks to that asshole from Vault 101 and his Slaver amigos.
translation: 你太幸运了！伟大的奴隶制保存了下来！人民们，这多亏了这来自101号避难所的混蛋和他的奴隶贩子朋友。

original: Are you sick enough to think slavery is the best thing to happen to the Capital Wasteland since broiled Mirelurk Cakes?
translation: 你真的傻到认为除了泥沼蟹饼，奴隶制就是首都废土上最好的事吗？

original: Are you a worthless piece of human trash who'd like nothing better than to own another human being?
translation: 你是一个只想占有别人的人渣吗？

original: And special thanks to 101, for kicking the bad guys where it counts -- their wallets.
translation: 特别感谢101，踢到了那群人渣的痛处 — 他们的钱包。

original: Slavers of the Capital Wasteland, consider this the big "fuck you" you've had coming since starting this scurrilous skin trade.
translation: 自废土上奴隶贸易诞生以来，这是奴隶贩子所面临的最大威胁。

original: So if you're a slave on the run, the time for lying low is long gone. Head to the Temple of the Union and keep your head held high.
translation: 所以如果你是一个逃亡的奴隶，那么担惊受怕的日子就一去不复返了。挺胸抬头朝着联邦圣殿去吧。

original: Is the tide finally turning for those scumbag Slavers? Lordy knows it's been open season on defenseless settlers long enough.
translation: 最终卑鄙的奴隶贩子会成为主宰吗？连上帝都知道，废土上毫无防备的人们被肆意捕猎很久了。

original: Looks like our friend from Vault 101 has turned amateur abolitionist, lending a hand to the folks at the Temple of the Union.
translation: 看来我们101号避难所的朋友变成了一个业余的废奴主义者，还向那些联邦圣殿的家伙施以援手。

original: Hey, wouldn't you know it, the lone Wanderer is done collecting bottles of soda. Christ, talk about your slow news days...
translation: 嘿，你不知道吗，独行客已经完成了收集汽水瓶工作。天哪，说到你的慢新闻日了……

original: I've also heard it tastes like Radscorpion shit and turns your piss blue. Or does it taste like Radscorpion piss and turn your shit blue? Whatever.
translation: 我还听说那玩意尝起来像辐射蝎的大便，而且能让你尿出蓝色的东西。或者是那玩意尝起来像辐射蝎的尿而让你排出蓝色的大便？管他呢。

original: It's called Nuka-Cola Quantum, and I believe it was made in limited quantities before the war.
translation: 那叫量子可乐，而且我相信这东西在战前是限量生产的。

original: God knows why, but the kid from Vault 101 is scouring the Capital Wasteland for a unique brand of Nuka-Cola.
translation: 天知道为什么，但101避难所的那个孩子正在首都废土上寻找一种独特的核子可乐。

original: Shame, shame, shame on you...
translation: 可耻，可耻，你真可耻……

original: Oh, you heard me right! 101, a little defenseless boy begged you for help, and what did you do? You SOLD HIM AS A FUCKING SLAVE!
translation: 哦，你听说过对不对！101，一个毫无恶意的小男孩请求你的帮助，你都做了什么？你把他当做一个恶心的奴隶给卖了！

original: I'll tell you where Bryan Wilks is. He's at fucking Paradise Falls, that's where!
translation: 我会告诉你布赖恩·威尔克斯在哪。他在该死的天堂瀑，就在那！

original: So if you see Bryan and his new parents, wish them all good luck. Oh, and 101? Nice work.
translation: 所以要是你看见布赖恩和他新的监护人，祝他们所有人好运。还有什么，101？干的真漂亮。

original: You see, not only did Miss Vault 101 stop the Ant problem, she also found little Bryan Wilks a new home.
translation: 你看，101号避难所小姐不仅解决了蚂蚁问题，她还给小布赖恩·威尔克斯找了一处新家。

original: You see, not only did Mister Vault 101 stop the Ant problem, he also found little Bryan Wilks a new home.
translation: 你看，101号避难所先生不仅解决了蚂蚁问题，他还给小布赖恩·威尔克斯找了一处新家。

original: Bryan, sadly, was the sole survivor. That's where the kid from Vault 101 comes in, and where our story, thankfully, gets better.
translation: 很遗憾，布赖恩是唯一的幸存者。然后那101号避难所的孩子就出场了，这也是我们故事发生的地方，万分感谢你，祝你过得更好。

original: So for the love of God, if someone is in the vicinity of Grayditch, could you please give the kid a Nuka-Cola, a Salisbury steak, something?
translation: 看在上帝的份上，要是有谁在灰渠的附近，求求你给那孩子一瓶核子可乐，一块索尔兹伯里肉饼什么的？

original: Good God, 101, have you no conscience? You left the kid to rot in that fallout shelter. I have witnesses!
translation: 天啊，101，你一点良心也没有吗？你把那孩子扔在充满辐射的掩体里自生自灭。我有证据！

original: I'll tell you where Bryan Wilks is. That little boy is stuck in a fucking box, that's where!
translation: 我告诉你布赖恩·威尔克斯在哪。那小男孩被卡在一个该死的亭子里，就在那！

original: But, what did she do with the boy, Three Dog? Where's Bryan Wilks now?
translation: 但是，她对那男孩做了什么，三狗？布赖恩·威尔克斯现在在哪？

original: But, what did he do with the boy, Three Dog? Where's Bryan Wilks now?
translation: 但是，他对那男孩做了什么，三狗？布赖恩·威尔克斯现在在哪？

original: You see, Miss Vault 101 may have stopped the Ant problem, but she couldn't be bothered to help poor little Bryan. Noooo.
translation: 你看，101号避难所小姐可能解决了蚂蚁问题，但现在却为帮助穷小孩布赖恩的事而头疼了。不 —

original: You see, Mister Vault 101 may have stopped the Ant problem, but he couldn't be bothered to help poor little Bryan. Noooo.
translation: 你看，101号避难所先生可能解决了蚂蚁问题，但现在却为帮助穷小孩布赖恩的事而头疼了。不 —

original: Bryan, sadly, was the sole survivor. That's where the kid from Vault 101 comes in, and where our story, unfortunately, gets even worse.
translation: 很遗憾，布赖恩是唯一的幸存者。然后那101号避难所的孩子就出场了，这也是我们故事发生的地方，很不幸，屋漏偏逢连夜雨。

original: You see, Bryan's from Grayditch, a small settlement that was recently overrun with overzealous Giant Ants.
translation: 你瞧，布赖恩来自灰渠，那个巨蚁泛滥的小型定居点。

original: This, faithful listeners, is the story of a little boy. A little boy... named Bryan Wilks.
translation: 我忠实的听众，这是一个小男孩的故事。一个小的男孩……他叫布赖恩·威尔克斯。

original: Following this thing's advice'll get you killed faster than you can say, "Hug a deathclaw!"
translation: 照这破书的建议行动，保准让你死得比说句“抱抱死亡爪”还快！

original: The kid from Vault 101 had a big hand in getting this thing written, and her research methods suck. There, I said it.
translation: 101号避难所那姑娘深度掺和了这本书的编写，她的调研手法简直烂到家。好了，我直说了。

original: The kid from Vault 101 had a big hand in getting this thing written, and his research methods suck. There, I said it.
translation: 101号避难所那小子深度掺和了这本书的编写，他的调研手法简直烂到家。好了，我直说了。

original: Public Service Warning, children! Watch out for a book claiming to be a "Wasteland Survival Guide!"
translation: 公共服务警告，孩子们！千万当心那本自称《废土生存指南》的破书！

original: Survive, Thrive, and Revive, that's the name of the game. The book is the Wasteland Survival Guide! Pick up your copy today!
translation: “生存”、“成长”和“复活”，那就是这游戏的名字。这本书就是废土生存指南！今天就来买本吧！

original: Now, let me tell ya. This thing's got all sorts of useful tips. Where to find food, how to deal with radiation, tons o' stuff.
translation: 现在，让我告诉你。这东西里面有各种各样有用的小秘诀。例如到哪去找吃的，怎么处理辐射，有用的东西非常多。

original: Oh, and, get this - researched and co-authored by none other than - yep, you guessed it - that tenacious teenager from Vault 101.
translation: 哦，还有，记着住这一点 — 这些研究的调查者和合著者不是别人 — 不错，你猜对了，就是那来自101号避难所的顽强少年。

original: Our first masterpiece is called "The Wasteland Survival Guide," written by Underworld's own Moira Brown.
translation: 我们的首部大作名为“废土生存指南”，由冥界的莫伊拉·布朗撰写。

original: Our first masterpiece is called "The Wasteland Survival Guide," written by Megaton's own Moira Brown.
translation: 我们的首部大作名为“废土生存指南”，由兆吨镇的莫伊拉·布朗撰写。

original: Know what I've decided, children? I'm gonna start a bookclub. Right... NOW! Wanna join? Good, cause you got no choice!
translation: 知道我做了什么决定吗，孩子们？我就要办一个读书俱乐部。没错……就是现在！想加入吗？没问题，只此一家别无分店！

original: So let's recount - our old friend shows up, weird shit happens, but in the end she saves the day. Yeah, that sounds about right.
translation: 让我们回顾一下：我们的老朋友一现身，怪事就频发，但最终她力挽狂澜。害，老套路吧。

original: So let's recount - our old friend shows up, weird shit happens, but in the end he saves the day. Yeah, that sounds about right.
translation: 让我们回顾一下：我们的老朋友一现身，怪事就频发，但最终他力挽狂澜。害，老套路吧。

original: In any event, the super silly situation's been dealt with, Canterbury Commons is safe, and 101 is the woman of the hour.
translation: 不管怎样，这场超级荒谬的闹剧已经收场，坎特伯雷社区太平了，而101来的姑娘正是那位风云人物。

original: In any event, the super silly situation's been dealt with, Canterbury Commons is safe, and 101 is the man of the hour.
translation: 不管怎样，这场超级荒谬的闹剧已经收场，坎特伯雷社区太平了，而101来的小伙正是那位风云人物。

original: From who, you ask? A couple of self-obsessed super psychos called... the AntAgonizer and the Mechanist! Hey, I couldn't make this shit up if I tried.
translation: 你问谁是罪魁？一对心理变态的自恋狂，好像叫……痛苦蚁后和机械侠！嘿，这鬼话我编都编不出来。

original: A big 'thank you' goes out to the mysterious traveler from Vault 101, for saving the little town of Canterbury Commons.
translation: 小镇坎特伯雷社区得救了，我们把一句真心的“谢谢你”送给来自101号避难所的神秘旅者。

original: Looks like I've got a spot o' good news for you, children.
translation: 看来我有了一丁点儿好消息要告诉你们，孩子们。

original: Somethin' about Super Mutants takin' residents prisoner... All I know is the kid could have helped, and didn't. Nice going, asshole.
translation: 说是超级变种人绑了居民作俘虏……我只知道，那崽子明明能搭把手却装死。干得好啊，混球。

original: Somethin' about a rescue from Super Mutants, if you can believe that. Nice going, kid.
translation: 听说是从超级变种人手里搞了波营救，这没吹牛皮哦。可以啊，孩子。

original: Now, I've got new reports from the settlement known as Bigtown that Little Miss Vault Gal has helped them out with one hell of a mess.
translation: 新消息，我刚收到那个叫大镇的聚居地报告，那位避难所小姐帮他们解决了一个大麻烦。

original: Now, I've got new reports from the settlement known as Bigtown that Mister Vault Guy has helped them out with one hell of a mess.
translation: 新消息，我刚收到那个叫大镇的聚居地报告，那位避难所小伙帮他们解决了一个大麻烦。

original: Keep that in mind the next time you feel like nosing around that neighborhood.
translation: 谨记下次别再发出噪音打扰周围的邻居。

original: There have been more and more sightings of Raiders over by Evergreen Mills. Smart money's on them having some kind of camp out that way.
translation: 常青工厂聚集了越来越多的掠夺者，他们在那打家劫舍。

original: Word is, these guys take all the contracts the other mercs won't. In short -- there's nothing they won't do. So be careful out there.
translation: 据说，这些人接了其他佣兵不接的所有合同。简而言之——没有他们不干的事。所以在外一定要小心。

original: If you see these hombres, steer clear. Whatever you have, they want, and they're not really into asking politely.
translation: 如果你碰见这些家伙，请避开。不管你有什么，他们都想要，而且他们并不喜欢礼貌地询问。

original: I've been getting more and more reports of these mercenary maniacs from Talon Company, especially in the downtown D.C. area.
translation: 我收到越来越多关于鹰爪公司那些雇佣兵疯子的报告，尤其是在特区市区。

original: So if you see a Knight or Paladin out there fighting your battles for you, give him a big thanks. Or even better -- some ammo.
translation: 所以，如果你看到一位骑士或圣骑士在外为你作战，请向他好好道谢。或者给他一些弹药更好。

original: Without our buddies from the Brotherhood, I'm guessing the entire Capital Wasteland would have been overrun a long time ago.
translation: 要是没有我们兄弟会的弟兄，我猜整个首都废土早就被蹂躏了。

original: They've recently stepped up patrols in the downtown D.C. ruins in response to increasing sightings of everybody's favorite freaks, the Super Mutants.
translation: 他们最近加强了对特区市中心废墟的巡逻，以应对越来越多的大家喜欢的怪胎目击事件——超级变种人。

original: The boys and girls of the Brotherhood of Steel continue to fight the good fight, folks.
translation: 家人们，钢铁兄弟会的小伙子和姑娘们将继续为正义而奋战。

original: Today's weather -- excessively violent, with a chance of dismemberment. Tune in later for our 5-day forecast.
translation: 今日天气——极其暴力，有被肢解的风险。请稍后关注我们的五日天气预报。

original: The rest of you Brotherhood cats -- can't you extend an olive branch or something? You'd think fighting the Super Mutants would be enough...
translation: 至于兄弟会的各位好汉，就不能递个橄榄枝啥的？和变种人厮杀还不够你们忙活的吗……

original: So, Brotherhood Outcasts -- knock it off! I'd prefer not to get murdered in my own backyard.
translation: 放逐者的小子们，给我消停点儿！我可不想在自家后院挨黑枪。

original: But when the Outcasts decide to take pot shots at my building -- which the Brotherhood uses as an outpost -- I make an exception.
translation: 但当放逐者决定对兄弟会用作前哨站的本台大楼放冷枪时，我必须破例开麦。

original: Now, normally, family squabbles are none of my business.
translation: 要搁平时，家庭口角我懒得掺和。

original: Tensions continue to mount between the courageous forces of the Brotherhood of Steel and their estranged brethren, the Outcasts.
translation: 钢铁兄弟会的英勇势力与其疏远的兄弟派系放逐者之间的紧张关系持续恶化。

original: Come on, Al, cut the Ghoulies a break. If they've got the caps and you've got the space, it's a win-win, right? Whadaya say?
translation: 嗨，奥利斯特，给尸鬼们点机会。如果他们得到了瓶盖，而你得到了地盘，那就是双赢，对吧？你说怎么样？

original: Ah, but lush at large Allistair Tenpenny says, "No zombies, no how!"
translation: 哈……但花里胡哨的奥利斯特·特佩尼明明白白地说，“不要丧尸，不择手段！”

original: According to reports from the ever so hoity toity Tenpenny Tower, a group of displaced Ghouls have been trying to gain entrance.
translation: 根据这条来自一贯如此装腔作势的特佩尼大厦的消息，一群卷土重来的尸鬼企图闯进来。

original: So if you're out by Grayditch, you may want to pop in and see what's what.
translation: 所以你要是路过灰渠，你没准要去拜访拜访，看看事情的真相。

original: Residents haven't come out to trade with the caravaners, and attempts to make contact have been met with... silence.
translation: 居民们从没有出来与商人做过生意，他们的所有试图得到的只是……缄默。

original: Okay... it seems the settlement of Grayditch has gone quiet.
translation: 好的……看来这灰渠居民区已经安静了。

original: That, my friends, is fighting the good fight.
translation: 我的朋友，那叫正义之战。

original: These guys are schemers, crooks, and killers, and the sooner you all realize that and stand up to their oppression, the better.
translation: 那些家伙是阴谋家、恶棍和杀手，你越快意识到这一点越好，勇敢地对抗他们的压迫。

original: Wake up, children -- the Enclave have a giant truck full 'o Brahmin, and they've been spoon-feeding you the bullshit.
translation: 醒醒，孩子们 — 英克雷有辆装满了双头牛的巨型卡车，他们填鸭式地向你们灌输牛粪。

original: The Enclave, and that includes their Homecoming King, "President" John Henry Eden and his gorilla Colonel Augustus Autumn, are NOT here to help you.
translation: 英克雷，包括他们的返乡国王，“总统”约翰·亨利·伊登，还有他的打手奥古斯塔斯·奥特姆上校，都不是来帮你们的。

original: Children, I don't care if you've ignored every other word that's come out of my mouth for the past five years. Please. Hear me now, and believe.
translation: 孩子们，我不介意过去五年你是不是把我的每一句话当成耳旁风。不过现在，听我说，并且相信我。

original: From Rivet City to downtown D.C., the Enclave is on the scene and setting up shop.
translation: 从铆钉城到特区市区，英克雷无处不在并且到处发展。

original: Good golly, Holly. This is the worst thing to happen to our neighborhood since the HOA instituted their mandatory "scavenged rags" dress code.
translation: 上帝，霍莉，这是自从他们强行穿着“扫破烂”装以来，发生在我们周围最坏的事情。

original: So if your travels take you to Canterbury Commons, keep your head down and your assault rifle loaded for crazy.
translation: 所以你要是正好要去坎特伯雷社区，保持低调并把突击步枪装满子弹以应对疯狂。

original: Every day it seems to be the same nutty scene, with the scuffles ending in a stalemate.
translation: 每天上演的荒诞戏码如出一辙，双方冲突总是以僵局收场。

original: One of these wackos seems to be assisted by robots, and the other by mutated bugs.
translation: 其中一个怪胎操纵着机器人军团，另一个则驱使着变异昆虫群。

original: I've been getting some scattered reports that a couple of costumed kooks have been battling for control of the settlement called Canterbury Commons.
translation: 我收到一些零散报告，称有两个穿着奇装异服的疯子正在争夺一个叫坎特伯雷社区的聚居地控制权。

original: All right, Three Dog has heard about some crazy things going on out there in the Capital Wasteland, but this one just might beat them all.
translation: 好吧，三狗可听过不少发生在首都废土的的疯狂事，但这次的事绝对最离谱。

original: Huzzah! The time of British oppression is finally over! Now we can finally turn our attention to the Super Mutants, Raiders, and Radscorpions...
translation: 呜啊！英国佬的压迫终于到头了！现在我们终于可以把注意力转到超级变种人、掠夺者和辐射蝎身上了……

original: The kid has recovered one of this country's most important historical artifacts -- the Declaration of Independence.
translation: 这小孩找回了这国家最重要的历史文物 — 《独立宣言》。

original: The mistress of adventure herself, that rough and tumble lass from Vault 101, has really outdone herself this time.
translation: 我们的冒险家小姐，那个来自101号避难所，生性浪荡的小淫妇，这回真的战胜了她自己。

original: The master of adventure himself, that rough and tumble lad from Vault 101, has really outdone himself this time.
translation: 我们的冒险家小子，那个来自101号避难所，喜欢不按常理出牌的小流氓，这回真的战胜了他自己。

original: Hey, nice work 101. Next time you're in the neighborhood, pop into the studio. Ole Three Dog's toaster's been on the fritz...
translation: 嗨，干得漂亮，101。下回你要是经过附近，到我们的播音室来坐坐。呃……三狗的烤面包机出了故障……

original: The town's sheriff, one Lucas Simms, commissioned the one, the only lone wanderer from Vault 101 to disarm the nasty nuke, and the kid delivered.
translation: 那个镇的警长，一个叫卢卡斯·西姆斯的人，委任来自101号避难所的独行客拆除镇子上那颗龌龊的核弹，而那孩子已经把这事搞定了。

original: Got some great news out of the town of Megaton. Turns out that live atomic bomb in the town's center has finally been deep-sixed for good.
translation: 来自兆吨镇的大新闻，镇子中央的原子弹已经彻底拆除了。

original: But just who did the dirty deed? Ask yourself this -- why has the kid from Vault 101 been sighted hanging around Tenpenny Tower? Why indeed...
translation: 但究竟谁干了这龌龊事？不妨自问：为何有人频繁目击那来自101号避难所的小鬼在特佩尼大厦附近游荡？为什么呢……

original: I suspect foul play, folks.
translation: 我怀疑其中有诈，各位。

original: Word is that twisted old land grabber Allistair Penny, founder of the posh Tenpenny Tower, has been looking to secure that spot for years.
translation: 据说那心理扭曲的老地主奥利斯特·佩尼，也就是豪华特佩尼大厦的创始人，多年来一直觊觎这块地皮。

original: But it was all just a tragic accident, right? Don't you believe that for a second, folks.
translation: 但这真的不过是一场悲惨的事故吗？各位可千万别信这套。

original: Well go kaboom it has.
translation: 而它真的炸了！

original: It's been no secret that the pre-war nuke in the center of town had a live atomic core, and under the wrong conditions, could still go kaboom.
translation: 镇中心那枚战前核弹的核心部件从未失效，这早已不是秘密，一旦条件成熟随时可能咔嘭一声。

original: GNR sources have confirmed that the mushroom cloud seen in the vicinity of Megaton was in fact... Megaton.
translation: 银新台消息源证实，在兆吨镇附近地区出现的蘑菇云，其实就来自……兆吨镇。

original: Children, I'm afraid I've got some terrible, terrible news.
translation: 孩子们，我恐怕有一些很坏很坏的消息。

original: The butcher-at-large? Yep, you guessed it -- none other than the kid from Vault 101. Nice going, scumbag.
translation: 逍遥法外的屠夫？好了，你们猜对了 — 正是那来自101号避难所的小家伙。一路顺风，卑鄙的家伙。

original: You see, those hapless, homeless irradiated rejects have all been brutally slaughtered in their temporary digs in the tunnels of Warrington Station.
translation: 你看，那些无家可归，倒霉的辐射感染者已经在他们的沃灵顿站隧道中被残忍的屠杀。

original: Looks like that dream has died on the vine.
translation: 看来那梦想中途夭折了。

original: Hey, remember those down-on-their-luck Ghouls who wanted to share the luxury accommodations at the fancy shmancy Tenpenny Tower?
translation: 嗨，记得那些倒霉的尸鬼想要分享那梦幻般的特佩尼大厦的豪华住所吗？

original: Oh, and kiddo from Vault 101? You look like a complete freakshow in that mask. Hey, somebody had to say it...
translation: 哦，和来自101号避难所来的小家伙？你带着那面具活像一个畸形。嗨，总有人要说出来……

original: Three Dog's all for stickin' it to the Man, but good golly Ghoulies -- that's a liiittle much.
translation: 三狗虽然也是站在人类这边，但是对于那些尸鬼的做法 — 有点点过分了。

original: Looks like they finally got their upscale address! And all it took was the wholesale slaughter of every other Tenpenny resident!
translation: 看来他们最终占据了上流社会的位置！此外它造成的是对特佩尼居民大规模的屠杀!

original: Hey, remember those down-on-their-luck Ghouls who wanted to share the luxury accommodations at the fancy shmancy Tenpenny Tower?
translation: 嗨，记得那些倒霉的尸鬼想要分享那梦幻般的特佩尼大厦的豪华住所吗？

original: Maybe I'll just ask around Underworld, hmmm? Cause a little irradiated birdy told me you've been spending some serious time down in Ghoulville...
translation: 或许我会到冥界附近打听打听，嗯？因为一些被辐射过的烂人告诉我说，你在尸鬼村度过了一段严酷的时光……

original: What's the deal, 101? You killin' for kicks, or is this a paying gig?
translation: 出了什么事，101？你杀人是为了寻欢作乐，还是为了赚取赏钱？

original: Looks like that loony lass from Vault 101's been busy lately, this time systematically executing some of the Wasteland's most colorful characters.
translation: 看样子那101号避难所的小淫妇最近很忙，目前正忙于处决废土的一系列闪亮人物。

original: Looks like that loony lad from Vault 101's been busy lately, this time systematically executing some of the Wasteland's most colorful characters.
translation: 看样子那101号避难所的小流氓最近很忙，目前正忙于处决废土的一系列闪亮人物。

original: Those Feral Ghouls that prefer the dark, dank underground? They ARE basically mindless zombies. So kill as many as you damn well please.
translation: 那些狂尸鬼比较偏爱阴暗潮湿的地下？他们基本上是没脑子的丧尸，所以你能杀多少就他妈的杀多少。

original: Ah yes, one important caveat, kiddies.
translation: 啊，是的，一个郑重的警告，小孩。

original: So please, if you meet one of the Capital Wasteland's many Ghouls, leave your prejudice at the door an your pistol in its holster.
translation: 所以求求你，你要是在首都废土遇到一个尸鬼，抛开你的成见，收起你的武器。

original: Sure, they may look like hideous zombies from an old monster flick, but their hearts, their souls, their tears are all very much human.
translation: 当然，他们看起来像丑陋的丧尸，但他们的内心，他们的灵魂，他们的眼泪却是十足的人类。

original: You see, children, Ghouls are simply humans who've been exposed to an ungodly amount of radiation and haven't had the good fortune to die.
translation: 孩子们，你们看，尸鬼完全是遭受了大量不人道的辐射，而没在厄运中死去的人类。

original: Just a friendly reminder to all you would-be bigots out there -- Ghouls are people too.
translation: 仅仅是对所有偏执狂的一个友善的提示 — 尸鬼也是人。

original: So run, hide or fight if you've got the balls and the guns. But for God's sake, don't go wavin' the white flag. They'll just strangle you with it.
translation: 所以，如果你们有种，又有枪，那就跑、躲起来或者奋起反抗。但看在上帝的份上，千万别举白旗，他们只会用它来勒死你。

original: Raiders can't be bargained or reasoned with, and there ain't no use surrenderin', cause they'll just shoot you anyway.
translation: 掠夺者既不吃谈判那套，也没法跟他们讲道理，投降也没用，因为不管怎样他们都会开枪。

original: When these psychos come to play, they have one thing on their minds -- making your life as fucking miserable as humanly possible.
translation: 这些疯子来闹事的时候，心里就一个念头：尽其所能，把你们的生活搅得一团糟。

original: Remember, children, when the Raiders come, there ain't no shame in locking your doors, barricading the windows, and cowering under the nearest bed.
translation: 孩子们，记住了，当掠夺者来袭，锁好门、堵住窗户，躲在最近的床底下，这不丢人。

original: Consider yourself officially warned.
translation: 对你郑重的警告。

original: According to most of our reports on the Super Mutants, they actually prefer capturing their victims and hauling them off to God-knows-where.
translation: 根据我们所获得的关于超级变种人大多数消息指出，他们事实上更喜欢抓住受害人，然后把他们带到不知什么鬼地方。

original: You see, children, the Frankensteins might violently and horrifically rip you to shreds -- but only if you're lucky.
translation: 你们看，孩子们，这些极端恐怖地科学怪人们可能会把你们撕成碎片 — 其实，这已经算是客气的了。

original: For all you guys and gals tempted by the thought of scavving in the downtown D.C. ruins, here's a tip...
translation: 考虑到特区市区遗址的垃圾可能会诱惑到你们这些男孩和女孩，给你们一个提示……

original: So be smart. Salvage those parts and make repairs whenever you can.
translation: 机灵点，尽你所能去拾取零件，以后有机会再进行修理。

original: If your weapon is falling apart, the only Wasteland asshole it's gonna kill is you.
translation: 要是你的武器散架了，你很可能会因此丧命。

original: Listen kiddos, never forget the importance of periodic weapon maintenance. Rifle, pistol, police baton -- I don't care which.
translation: 听着，小鬼们，永远不要忘记定期保养武器的重要性。步枪、手枪、警棍 — 无论是哪种武器。

original: Don't feed the Yao Guai! That is all.
translation: 别让自己喂了妖怪！就这样。

original: If you do need to head into the heat, be smart -- give yourself a nice boost of RadX first. Remember, only you can prevent human flesh fires.
translation: 如果你实在想去高辐射区域，那就机灵点——先给自己来点抗辐宁。记住了，只有你自己能制止人体自燃。

original: Keep your eyes on those geiger counters, kids. Tick, tick, tickety means run your ass outta there, and then pop some RadAway for good measure.
translation: 孩子们，留意盖格计数器上的那些数字。滴答、滴答、滴答声意味着你要赶紧拍屁股从所在的地方闪人，然后来点消辐宁以防万一。

original: We all know the dangers of radiation, but with the right precautions, you CAN prevent accidental death or even -- eewww -- ghoulification.
translation: 我们都知道辐射的危险，但有了正确的预防措施，你就能避免意外死亡乃至 — 嗯嗯 — 尸鬼化。

original: Time once again for an important GNR Public Service Announcement.
translation: 又到了银河新闻电台重要的公共服务播报时间。

original: Now listen close for this important Public Service Announcement.
translation: 现在仔细听这一重要的公共服务播报。

original: Up next we've got a Public Service Announcement. Listen up, children. This stuff's important.
translation: 接下来是我们的公共服务播报。听着，孩子们，这一内容非常重要。

original: And now, a super important Public Service Announcement.
translation: 现在，有一项超级重要的公共服务要播报。

original: That was the Ink Spots, with "I Don't Want to Set the World on Fire."
translation: 播送一首墨迹乐团的“我不想世界卷入战火”。

original: That was the Ink Spots, with "Maybe."
translation: 播送一首墨迹乐团的“或许”。

original: That was Bob Crosby with "Happy Times."
translation: 播送一首鲍勃·克罗斯比的“欢乐时光”。

original: That was Bob Crosby with "Way Back Home."
translation: 播送一首鲍勃·克罗斯比的“漫漫回家路”。

original: That was Roy Brown with "Butcher Pete."
translation: 播送一首罗伊·布朗的“屠夫皮特”。

original: That was Roy Brown with "Mighty Mighty Man."
translation: 播送一首罗伊·布朗的“大男人”。

original: That was Billie Holiday with "Crazy He Calls Me."
translation: 播送一首比莉·霍利戴的“他说我疯了”。

original: That was Billie Holiday with "Easy Living."
translation: 播送一首比莉·霍利戴的“逍遥自在”。

original: That was Danny Kaye and the Andrew Sisters with "Civilization."
translation: 播送一首丹妮·凯依和安德鲁·凯依姐妹合唱的“文明”。

original: That was Ella Fitzgerald with "Into Each Life Some Rain Must Fall."
translation: 播送一首艾拉·费兹洁拉德的”生活总会有风雨”。

original: That was Tex Beneke with "A Wonderful Guy."
translation: 刚才是泰克斯·本尼克和“棒小伙”。

original: That was Cole Porter with "Anything Goes."
translation: 播送一首科尔·波特的“万事成空”。

original: Ohhh... Bad form, 101. Bad form, indeed...
translation: 啧啧……101号出来的，办事不地道啊，太不地道了……

original: The kid THEN delivered the violin to some guy at Rivet City, NOT the old lady who had commissioned the retrieval job.
translation: 这崽子拿到琴后，居然没交给委托任务的阿婆，反而送给了铆钉城的某个家伙！

original: Should we suspect foul play? Damn straight. And you're Suspect Numero Uno, vault asshole.
translation: 要说这不是谋杀？鬼才信！你个避难所混蛋就是头号嫌疑犯。

original: The kid THEN delivered the violin to some old lady, who shortly thereafter was found stone cold dead AND violinless.
translation: 那崽子倒是把小提琴交给了某个老妇人，而没过多久她就被发现陈尸当场，琴也不翼而飞。

original: Now here's where the story gets sketchy, in true Capital Wasteland style.
translation: 但接下来故事就诡异了，以典型的首都废土粗线条风格。

original: Agatha, we love ya. Keep playin', sister. And Vault kid? You've helped make the Capital Wasteland a better place. Hats off, my friend.
translation: 阿加莎，我们爱你。继续演奏吧，我的姐！至于避难所的孩子？你让首都废土多了一丝人性光辉。向你致敬，我的朋友。

original: Here's the best part. The violin was for an old woman named Agatha, who has taken to the airwaves herself to share some truly beautiful music.
translation: 最精彩的部分来了。这把琴的主人，是位名叫阿加莎的老妇人，她本人也通过电波分享过许多真正美妙的音乐。

original: Oh, but not just any ole violin, children... We're talking Stradivarius here. That's one top o' the line fiddle, you dig?
translation: 哦，可不是普通的小提琴，孩子们……我们说的是斯特拉迪瓦里。顶级古董琴，明白了？

original: My contacts report that he recently went on a highly dangerous excursion to recover -drum roll please - a violin.
translation: 我的线人报告，他最近进行了一次极其危险的远足，就为取回——来点鼓声——一把小提琴。

original: Now, the Lone Wanderer, aka "that kid from Vault 101," has done some pretty interesting things, but this one takes the cake.
translation: 现在，“独行客”，又名“来自101号避难所的那孩子”，干了不少相当有意思的事，但这次堪称一绝。

original: Look, it was years ago, and I MAY have been experimenting with Jet at the time, but I’m telling you, it’s out there...
translation: 听着，那是好几年前的事了，当时我可能磕了点杰特，但我跟你们说，那地方真的存在……

original: A veritable Oasis of green in that depressing sea of brown.
translation: 一片货真价实的绿洲，在灰黄废土中绿得发慌。

original: Now what if I, the all-powerful Three Dog, were to tell you that somewhere right here in the Capital Wasteland, there’s a place with LOTS of trees.
translation: 现在，要是我，全能的三狗告诉你，就在首都废土的某个角落，有一片全是树的地方。

original: No, no, no. Not those shriveled black things. I’m talking real trees. Brown bark, green leaves, photosynthesis, all that good stuff.
translation: 不不不，不是那些干枯发黑的玩意。我说的是真正的树。棕树皮、绿叶子、光合作用，全是好东西。

original: Here's a question for all you faithful listeners. Have you guys and gals ever seen... a tree?
translation: 给各位忠实听众提个问题。你们这些伙计和姑娘们，可曾见过……一棵树？

original: Thank you, and know that your hard work will pay off soon.
translation: 谢谢。你不会白白受那些苦的。

original: In fact, if you should see him, feel free to offer him directions or an escort.
translation: 要是你见到他的话，给他指明道路或是护送他吧。

original: In fact, if you should see her, feel free to offer her directions or an escort.
translation: 要是你见到她的话，给他指明道路或是护送她吧。

original: I've invited our guest from Vault 101 to my office. Please do not impede his progress in any way.
translation: 我已经邀请来自101号避难所的客人来我的办公室，请大家不要阻拦。

original: I've invited our guest from Vault 101 to my office. Please do not impede her progress in any way.
translation: 我已经邀请来自101号避难所的客人来我的办公室，请大家不要阻拦。

original: Any vault resident seen associating with the so-called "Rebels" will be detained, questioned, and disciplined appropriately.
translation: 任何避难所的居民被看到与所谓的反叛者有牵连的话，都会被拘留、询问并受到适度的惩罚。

original: Order WILL be restored. Discipline WILL be restored. Vault security personnel have been authorized to use deadly force if necessary.
translation: 秩序将会恢复，纪律将会重建。避难所的警卫人员已授权在必要情况下可以使用致命的武力。

original: Don't let it come to that. This vault will be one big, happy family again. One way or another.
translation: 不要走到那一步。避难所应该是一个快乐的大家庭，无论如何实现。

original: Any vault resident seen associating with the so-called "Rebels" will be detained, questioned, and disciplined appropriately.
translation: 任何避难所的居民被看到与所谓的反叛者有牵连的话，都会被拘留、询问并受到适度的惩罚。

original: Order WILL be restored. Discipline WILL be restored. Vault security personnel have been authorized to use deadly force if necessary.
translation: 秩序将会恢复，纪律将会重建。避难所的警卫人员已授权在必要情况下可以使用致命的武力。

original: Don't let it come to that. Haven't you always been happy? Haven't we always been a… a family?
translation: 别让事情变成那样，你们不是一直都快乐吗？我们不是一直都是……一家人吗？

original: Amata... Stop this madness. You're disrupting everyone's life, everyone's happiness. Come home. Just… come home.
translation: 阿玛塔……别疯了。你破坏了每个人的生活，每个人的幸福。回家吧，快……回家吧。

original: And everything can be the way it was.
translation: 一切将回复原貌。

original: {new}
translation: {new}

original: This is the Overseer.
translation: 我是监督者。

original: All residents of Vault 101 are hereby confined to their quarters.
translation: 101号避难所的全体居民，现通知你们留在自己的住处内。

original: The Radroach infestation is under control. Do NOT interfere with vault security personnel.
translation: 蟑螂的侵扰已得到控制。不要干扰避难所的警卫人员。

original: Any resident found outside his or her quarters will be dealt with. Severely.
translation: 任何发现不在自己房间的居民都将受到严惩。

original: That is all.
translation: 完毕。

original: The gang of Wall Street fat cats, and their Washington war-monger puppets, have plunged the world into war to line their own...
translation: 华尔街那群财主，以及他们那帮在华盛顿发动战争的走狗，让世界陷入战争，以满足他们自己的……

original: Do you think your leaders will keep you safe if the bombs fall? You will die while the Wall Street gang and their hangers-on live like kings in...
translation: 当核弹爆炸时，你以为领导人会管你的死活吗？你们会死，而华尔街黑帮和他们的随从却会像国王一样生活在……

original: Why do you continue to send your boys to die for your capitalist masters?
translation: 你们为何要为了资本家主人而将孩子们推向死亡？

original: Your boys are dying on the Alaska front, and all for nothing. Bring them home, before it is too late.
translation: 你们的孩子正在阿拉斯加无谓地丧生。趁为时未晚，快让他们回家吧。

original: I changed the door password to my name. If you're hearing this, and you still care enough to help me, you should remember it.
translation: 我把大门的密码改成了我的名字。如果你能听见，如果你还在意来帮我，你就应该记住。

original: It feels like you left home a long time ago, but I know you're still out there. I just hope you're still alive to hear this.
translation: 感觉你已经离家很久了，但我知道你还在外面。我只是希望你能活着听到这些。

original: Things got worse after you left. My father's gone mad with power. If you can hear this, please stop looking for your dad and help stop mine.
translation: 你走后情况更糟了。我父亲因权力而昏了头脑。如果你能听到，请暂停寻找你的爸爸，帮助阻止我爸。

original: Things got worse after you left. The new Overseer is insane. If you can hear this, please stop looking for your dad and help save us.
translation: 你走后情况更糟了。新的监督者疯了。如果你能听到，请暂停寻找你的爸爸，帮助拯救我们。

original: My boy is very sick and needs medical assistance, please help us if you can!  We are listening for your response on 3,950 kHz.
translation: 我的孩子病得很重，须要医疗的援助，如果你能帮忙请伸出援手！我们在3950赫兹等候回应。

original: My family and I have taken refuge in a drainage chamber not to far from a radio relay tower outside of DC.
translation: 我和家人在特区无线电转播台旁的一个排水通道里避难。

original: If assistance is not possible, please attempt to contact Reilly, who's made for Underworld inside the Museum of History.
translation: 如果援助无法到达，请试着联系莱莉，她在历史博物馆内的冥界。

original: Our supplies are running out and we've already sustained a casualty. We're trapped on the roof level of the Statesman Hotel.
translation: 我们的补给正在逐渐耗尽，人员也遭受了伤亡。我们现在被困在了政要酒店的楼顶。

original: We're trapped on the roof of the Statesman Hotel by a large contingent of Super Mutants. We are low on ammo and running out of time.
translation: 一群超级变种人把我们围困在政要酒店的楼顶。我们的弹药快耗尽，坚持不了多久了。

original: Our time is running out and we are dangerously low on ammunition. Our broadcast point is the roof of the Statesman Hotel.
translation: 我们坚持不了多久了，弹药已经严重不足。我们是在政要酒店的楼顶发送求救信号。

original: Ammunition supply is running out and we've lost a man. We're pinned down on the roof of the Statesman Hotel by Super Mutants.
translation: 我们失去了一个人，弹药补给也快耗尽了。我们正在政要酒店楼顶被超级变种人压制。

original: Quite right, old Chum. Save those questions, Miss Chase. If we survive what happens next, I may even answer them!
translation: 很正确，老伙计。先别急着提问题，蔡斯小姐。如果我们能摆脱即将到来的险境，到时我或许会回答的！

original: Boss, that sounds like a kid screaming! And it's coming from those ruins!
translation: 老板，那听起来像是一个孩子在尖叫！是从那些废墟里传来的！

original: <sound of a child screaming>
translation: <一个孩子的尖叫声>

original: Oh, I don't know, Daring. For example, that name of yours. I happen to like  "Herbert." Why the...
translation: 哦，我不知道，“大胆”。比如，你的名字。我碰巧喜欢“赫伯特”。为什么……

original: Ahh, now, Argyle old chum. Let's not, um, bore the beautiful Miss Chase with those ancient exploits.
translation: 啊，现在，阿盖尔，老伙计。别用那些老掉牙的英雄事迹来，呃，烦美丽的蔡斯小姐了。

original: With all due respect, boss - you didn't. If you remember, it was me who got you out of that little "situation" in...
translation: 恕我直言，老板 — 你没有。如果你还记得，是我帮你摆脱了小“困境”在……

original: Are you kidding, my dear? Argyle has saved my skin more times than I care to remember. I hardly know how I got by before I met him.
translation: 你在开玩笑吗，亲爱的？阿盖尔救我的次数多到我都记不清了。在遇到他之前，我几乎不知道自己是怎么熬过来的。

original: My my, Argyle. You are rather resourceful for a Ghoul, aren't you?
translation: 我我的，阿盖尔。作为一个尸鬼，你非常足智多谋，不是吗？

original: Heh heh. The old "Shady Sands Shuffle." It sure brings me back. You two smoothskins okay?
translation: 嗨 嗨。这首老“沙漠绿洲舞曲”肯定能让我回忆起往日的时光。你们两个光皮肤还好吧？

original: <loud explosions>
translation: <猛烈的爆炸声>

original: It's not what he's taking out my dear, but rather what he's putting in. Duck and Covveerrr!
translation: 亲爱的，关键不是他取出了什么，而是他放进去了什么。卧倒与掩护呼呼呼！

original: Why is your Ghoul friend picking their pockets? This is no time for sticky fingers, Daring!
translation: 为什么你那尸鬼朋友在扒他们的口袋？没时间小偷小摸了，“大胆”！

original: Now see here, you hulking horrors! This young lady has been through quite enough for one day! Holster your weapons or...
translation: 你看看你们这些恐怖的家伙！这位年轻的女士已经受够了！收起你的武器，否则……

original: Out of the frying pan...
translation: 刚出虎穴……

original: Super Mutants!
translation: 超级变种人！

original: Stupid human! Shut up now! <sound of guns cocking> You come with us now!
translation: 愚蠢的人类！现在给我闭嘴！<上膛声>你们现在跟我们走！

original: Ha! Now that's what this Wasteland needs - more women with spunk and explosives! So tell me, Penelope, what's the next stop on...
translation: 哈！现在这就是废土需要的 — 更具有勇气与爆发力的女性！所以告诉我，佩内洛普，下一站去……

original: And by "disrupt" I mean "blow up."
translation: 我说的“打扰”，其实就是“炸毁”。

original: My friends call me Penelope, and let's just say those Slavers don't take too kindly to people disrupting their caravans.
translation: 我的朋友们叫我佩内洛普，这么说吧，奴隶贩子可不喜欢别人打扰他们的商队。

original: So, Ms. Chase... How did you come to be, ahh... "held up" in Paradise Falls?
translation: 那么，蔡斯小姐……你是怎么被……“扣留”在天堂瀑的？

original: <sound of walking over gravel>
translation: <走过沙砾的声音>

original: Ha! That'll teach those Slaver slimebags to follow us. Looks like that's the last of them, boss.
translation: 哈！这下那些混蛋奴隶贩子该知道跟着我们的后果。看来这是最后一批人了，老板。

original: <sounds of gunfire>
translation: <开枪声>

original: Today's episode - Super Mutant Mayhem!
translation: 今天的节目 — 超级变种人大混乱！

original: You're listening to the adventures of me, Herbert "Daring" Dashwood, and my stalwart Ghoul manservant Argyle!
translation: 你正在收听的是我，赫伯特·“大胆”·达什伍德，以及我坚定的尸鬼男仆阿盖尔，的冒险故事！

original: You're listening to the adventures of me, Herbert "Daring" Dashwood, and my stalwart Ghoul manservant Argyle!
translation: 你正在收听的是我，赫伯特·“大胆”·达什伍德，以及我坚定的尸鬼男仆阿盖尔，的冒险故事！

original: You're listening to the adventures of me, Herbert "Daring" Dashwood, and my stalwart Ghoul manservant Argyle!
translation: 你正在收听的是我，赫伯特·“大胆”·达什伍德，以及我坚定的尸鬼男仆阿盖尔，的冒险故事！

original: You're listening to the adventures of me, Herbert "Daring" Dashwood, and my stalwart Ghoul manservant Argyle!
translation: 你正在收听的是我，赫伯特·“大胆”·达什伍德，以及我坚定的尸鬼男仆阿盖尔，的冒险故事！

original: Be sure and tune in next time, for another exciting adventure of me, Herbert "Daring" Dashwood, and my stalwart Ghoul manservant Argyle!
translation: 锁定频道，下次我会讲述另一个奇特经历。我是赫伯特“大胆”达什伍德，还有我勇敢的尸鬼仆人阿盖尔！

original: <closing music>
translation: <结束曲>

original: Argyle, old friend. I think I'm in love...
translation: 阿盖尔，老朋友。我好像坠入爱河了……

original: Penelope Chase, fortune hunter. You can buy me a beer later. Now let's cut this shindig short and get the bloody hell out of here! Come on!
translation: 佩内洛普·蔡斯，财富猎人。你可以待会再请我喝酒。现在闲话少说，先离开这该死的地方！快点！

original: Now, now, Argyle! No need to be hasty. We owe this young lady our thanks. Miss...
translation: 好了，好了，阿盖尔！没必要这么急。我们应该感谢这位年轻的小姐……

original: Wait a minute! We do the rescuing around here, sister.
translation: 等等！我们在这进行营救，姐妹。

original: You boys all right? I busted out of that box and was almost home free when I noticed your predicament.
translation: 你们还好吗？我逃出那盒子，并在快要成功时才注意到你们的困境。

original: Drop the steel, you Slaver scumbag. <sound of a hit>
translation: 放下武器，你这卑鄙的奴隶贩子。<击打声>

original: Hands up, chumps. Nobody escapes from Paradise Falls. Now let's move back to the pen, nice and slow, before...
translation: 举起手来，呆瓜们！没有人能逃出天堂瀑。现在都回到栅栏里去，慢慢的，趁……

original: Child's play, boss. <click> <sound of opening door> Okay lady, you're rescued. Now let's get out of... What? Boss, it's empty!
translation: 小儿科，老板。<咔哒> <开门声>好了，女士，你获救了。现在我们离开……什么？老板，没人！

original: Ha ha! Now, the door.
translation: 哈哈！现在，撬门。

original: Lotus... kick! Yieee!!   Ugh!
translation: 摆莲……踢！咦耶！！  啊！

original: Huh?
translation: 呃？

original: Allow me. <walking> Hey fella, got a light?
translation: 让我来。<步行声>嗨，哥们，有火吗？

original: All right. She's locked in there. They call it... "the box." First, we need to remove that guard...
translation: 好的。她被关在那。他们称之为……“盒子”。首先我们需要引走那守卫。

original: <Sound of movement, huffing and puffing>
translation: <行动声，喘息声>

original: Sigh. Always with the dames.
translation: 唉。又是女人。

original: Not so fast, my flesh-rotten friend! That girl we came in with. We're the only chance she's got. Come on!
translation: 别那么快，我的腐肉朋友！和我们一起进来的那个女孩。我们是她唯一的机会。快点！

original: Don't thank me yet, boss. We still need to get out of here. Let's go! While the guard's away from the front gate!
translation: 先别急着谢我，老板。我们还得离开这。赶快走吧！趁着守卫不在前门！

original: Argyle, you magnificent bastard! You did it!
translation: 阿盖尔，你这了不起的混蛋！你做到了！

original: So little faith, boss. I could disarm this Slaver junk with my eyes closed. One second... <click!> there! Now for yours... stand still! <click!>
translation: 太没信心了，老板。我闭着眼都能把这奴隶贩子的垃圾给解开。稍等……<咔嗒！>好了！到你了……别动！<咔嗒！>

original: Today's episode - escape from Paradise Falls!
translation: 今天的节目 — 逃离天堂瀑！

original: Oh, and Vault kid? I know you were seen in the vicinity. I hope to God you had nothing to do with this carnage.
translation: 对了，避难所那小孩？我知道你在附近出现过，但愿你与这场屠杀无关。

original: Reports are sketchy... but it appears there have been some human casualties. Sorry for your losses, Reilly... assuming you ain't one of 'em.
translation: 报告很简略……但似乎有一些人员伤亡。对你买的损失表示遗憾，莱莉……希望你不是其中之一。

original: Do I suspect some Vault Dweller intervention on this one? I certainly do. Good work, 101.
translation: 我是否怀疑某避难所居民介入了这事？我当然怀疑了。干得好，101。

original: It would seem that a brave soldier named Theo was lost in the line of duty... but some of the others have been rescued.
translation: 看来，一名叫西奥的勇敢士兵在执行任务时牺牲了……但其他一些人已经获救。

original: I've gotten word that a band of mercs called Reilly's Rangers were trapped on a DC rooftop, pinned down by Super Mutants.
translation: 我获得消息，一队名叫“莱莉的游骑兵”的雇佣兵被困在了特区的一处楼顶上，被超级变种人缠住了。

original: Any personnel listening on this frequency, please report at once.
translation: 有谁听到这个频率的，请马上报到。

original: This is a high priority message, back-up is needed at our location.
translation: 这是紧急信息，我们这里需要支援。

original: I have information of great value to anyone willing to help me free my people.
translation: 谁愿意帮助我的人民，我就把这个有重大价值的信息告诉他。

original: Please... help us.
translation: 请……帮助我们。

original: Look Lyons, I love you guys, you know I do, but your tin soldiers better get these Enclave assholes in check, once and for all, or we're all screwed.
translation: 瞧里昂，我爱你们,但你的铁管士兵最好彻底地把这些英克雷混蛋消灭，或者我们一起完蛋。

original: Brothers of Steel, what's the deal? If Prime can go down, what about the rest of us? Are we sitting ducks for some kind of new Enclave terror?
translation: 钢铁兄弟会，怎么回事?我们其他人呢?难道我们是某种英克雷恐怖打击的靶子？

original: The Enclave are supposedly beaten, bruised, and on the run, but they have the firepower capable of destroying a 100-foot tall robot?
translation: 英克雷被打败了,伤残了，在逃跑，除此之外他们有火力可以摧毁100英尺高的机器人吗?

original: No, I'm not really sure how, cause yeah, it would take a hell of weapon to take out that gigantic G.I. And that's what worries me.
translation: 不,我不太清楚原因,那需要巨大的地狱般的武器,那就是我担心的地方。

original: That's right, children, I have received word that Liberty Prime, the Brotherhood of Steel's super duper super robot, has been killed. By the Enclave.
translation: 没错，孩子，我收到消息我们钢铁兄弟会的超级机器人已经被英克雷摧毁。

original: This grunt stands 100 feet tall, is made of some kind of metal alloy, and slings nukes like a quarterback chucks footballs.
translation: 这100英尺高的机器，是由某种合金和核动力系统组成的。

original: Now imagine the tragic and untimely demise of the most amazing American hero the Capital Wasteland has ever seen.
translation: 现在想象首都废土竟然能见到最令人惊讶的美国英雄。

original: It's always a sad day when a soldier falls in the line of battle. And the greater the soldier, the deeper the grief.
translation: 当一名士兵阵亡，总是让人难过。特别是一个伟大的士兵，更让人悲伤。

original: If there's one thing I wish I could find out there in the rubble, it's a working bugle, cause Three Dog wants to play some Taps.
translation: 如果可能我真希望我能在战场的瓦砾堆中找到，它是一个工作的号角,就是三狗所说的那样。

original: Don't you worry children. Three Dog's got his ear to the ground and his mic on standby. As soon as I know more, you'll know more.
translation: 别担心，孩子们。三狗的耳朵贴着地面，他的麦克风整装待命。当我了解更多，你们就会知道更多。

original: And does this have something to do with the shinies from the Brotherhood of Steel, who seem poised to pounce once again?
translation: 这是否与钢铁兄弟会的亮闪闪们有关，他们似乎准备再次出击？

original: Just what is she up to? Is the kid looking for something to use for the Enclave, or against them?
translation: 她到底想干什么？这孩子是在为英克雷寻找可用之物，还是在与他们作对？

original: Just what is he up to? Is the kid looking for something to use for the Enclave, or against them?
translation: 他到底想干什么？这孩子是在为英克雷寻找可用之物，还是在与他们作对？

original: My flies on the wall tell me that 101 was seen dodging Deathclaws and gathering up as much used tech as she could carry.
translation: 我的狗仔告诉我，看到101在躲避死亡爪，并尽可能多地收集她能携带的旧科技。

original: My flies on the wall tell me that 101 was seen dodging Deathclaws and gathering up as much used tech as he could carry.
translation: 我的狗仔告诉我，看到101在躲避死亡爪，并尽可能多地收集他能携带的旧科技。

original: But wouldn't you know it, that kid from Vault 101 has once again proven the exception to the rule.
translation: 但你们不知道的是，来自101号避难所的那个孩子再次证明了凡事有例外。

original: Lucky he made it out alive. Most people don't. At least not in one piece.
translation: 幸好他活着出来了。大多数人都没有。至少不会完好无损。

original: I met a guy once, name was Johnny 12 Fingers, had one arm. Turns out the other one was ripped off while he was scavving in Deathclaw central.
translation: 我曾遇到过一个人，他叫12指约翰尼，只有一只胳膊。结果发现另一只手是他在死亡爪中心拾荒时被扯下来的。

original: Ah, but you locals, you know the place. Am I right? It's become a veritable Wasteland legend. Why? Cause it's filled with goddamned Deathclaws!
translation: 啊，但你们当地人，你们知道这个地方。我没说错吧？这里已经成为名副其实的废土传奇了。为啥？因为那里到处都是该死的死亡爪！

original: There's one place you find on a tourist map of D.C. and it's lovely suburbs, and that's the cozy little villa known as Old Olney.
translation: 在特区及其可爱郊区的旅游地图上，你会发现一个地方，那就是被称为老奥尔尼的舒适小庄园。

original: And if you see that kid from Vault 101, pass along your thanks, cause the Brotherhood did NOT act alone. Thank you 101!
translation: 如果你看到101号避难所的那个孩子，请转达你的谢意，因为兄弟会并不是单独行动的。谢谢你101！

original: So if you see some Enclave rejects wandering around, have pity! They're homeless, after all.
translation: 所以，如果你看到一些四处游荡的英克雷弃儿，请同情他们！毕竟他们无家可归了。

original: Children, I am pleased to announce that the beautiful Brotherhood has mangled the last base those Enclave bastards had left!
translation: 孩子们，我很高兴地宣布，美丽的兄弟会已经捣毁了那些英克雷杂种留下的最后一个基地！

original: Now, the Brotherhood of Steel may have taken care of those losers back at that new-fangled faucet called Project Purity. But they weren't done!
translation: 现在，钢铁兄弟会可能已经在名为“净水工程”的新奇水龙头上照顾了那些失败者。但他们还没成功！

original: Man, I thought that blow-hard Eden was just a pre-recorded pain-in-my-ass. That was before devil-headed stormtroopers moved into the neighborhood.
translation: 天啊，我本以为那个“吹牛大王”伊登只是个预先录制好的讨厌鬼。那是在恶魔头暴风兵搬进这个街区之前。

original: We've had our share o' problems here in beautiful Washington D.C., but did any of us really see those Enclave idiots coming?
translation: 在美丽的华盛顿特区，我们也遇到了不少问题，但我们真的预见到了那些英克雷白痴的到来吗？

original: Why, 101? Why has it come to this? Children, pray for the soul of that lone wanderer, and pray for the rest of us too, while you're at it.
translation: 为什么，101？为什么会变成这样呢？孩子们，为那个独行客的灵魂祈祷，同时也为我们其余人祈祷。

original: It's a dark day for us all, when someone sees fit to destroy the only guys standing between us and complete obliteration.
translation: 对我们所有人来说，这都是黑暗的一天，因为有人认为应该摧毁隔挡在我们与彻底毁灭之间的唯一力量。

original: And, my sources tell me, this is the same hail of hellfire that destroyed Liberty Prime himself. Looks like an Enclave super weapon at work.
translation: 我的线人告诉我。这就是摧毁自由先锋的那片地狱之火。看来是英克雷的超级武器在起作用。

original: As reported by loads of people around the Capital Wasteland, missiles rained down from the sky and left the Citadel a big smoking crater.
translation: 据首都废土上的许多人报告，导弹从天而降，把大本营炸成了一个冒烟的大坑。

original: Wrong, my children. So very wrong. I really can't believe I'm saying this, but the concrete casa of those shiny guys with big guns has gone kablooey.
translation: 出问题了，我的孩子们。出大问题了。我真不敢相信我说的话，但是那些拿着大枪的闪亮家伙们的水泥城堡已经坍塌了。

original: But that would be impossible, right? Nobody would have the power, the opportunity, or the giant gorilla-sized balls to destroy the Citadel. Right?
translation: 但那是不可能的，是吧？没有人有能力、有机会，或有大猩猩那般大的胆量去摧毁大本营。是吧？

original: Not too long ago, I saw a big boom from my bedroom, in the direction of that bastion of neo-knightly badassness.
translation: 不久前，我在卧室里看到巨大的爆炸，方向正是那个新骑士式坏蛋的堡垒。

original: So get your glasses ready, children. This round's on me.
translation: 所以把你的杯子准备好了，孩子们。这次我请客。

original: As I speak, the Brotherhood is working with Rivet City security to get that fresh water to the Wasteland. The caravans are coming!
translation: 就在我说话的时候，兄弟会正在与铆钉城保安把那些干净的水送往废土。小篷车就来了!

original: God, ain't that beautiful? But even better, it's finally happened! The water is clean, and hell yes, it's free! Just a little patience, children.
translation: 天啊，是不是很漂亮？但更重要的，最后成真了！水是干净无害的,它是免费的！只要有点耐心，孩子们。

original: See, she was a scientist too, worked on that project. You know what she wanted? "The waters of life. Free and clean, for any and all."
translation: 看，她也是科学家，参与那项目。你知道她想要什么吗？“生命之水。干净的、免费的，给所有的人。”

original: Now you all remember James, right? Father of 101? Well, Three Dog has learned that back in the day, James' wife had a dream.
translation: 现在你们记住了詹姆斯，对吗？101小子的父亲？嗯，三狗在以前已经认识了，詹姆斯妻子的梦想。

original: Two weeks. It's been two weeks since our boys in Power Armor kicked those Enclave bastards out of Project Purity, and started that baby chugging.
translation: 两个星期。两周前，我们的小伙穿着穿动力装甲把英克雷混蛋踢出净水工程，并启动那婴儿咕噜咕噜地咕噜。

original: Three Dog's advice? If you've got one of those Mister Dandy butler bots, have him make you some purified water, and count yourself lucky.
translation: 三狗的建议？如果你有一个丹迪先生管家机器人，让他给你做一些纯化水，算你走运。

original: The water going 'round may be free, but it sure as hell ain't clean. So when you see that caravan comin', tell 'em to keep on going.
translation: 水可能是免费的，但肯定不干净的。所以，当你看到大篷车来的时候，告诉他们继续走。

original: Coincidence? Three Dog thinks not. For all their good intentions, it looks like those eggheads at the Jefferson Memorial screwed up royally.
translation: 巧合吗？三狗认为不是。杰斐逊纪念馆的那些书呆子虽然用心良苦，但似乎还是把事情搞砸了。

original: It also happens that this new illness ONLY started showin' up AFTER the Brotherhood started distributing so-called "clean" water from that purifier.
translation: 而且，这种新的疾病也是在兄弟会开始从净化器中分发所谓的“干净的”水之后，才开始出现的。

original: Experience would tell ya this is your garden variety radiation sickness, but nuh uh. This is something else, children. Something worse. Much worse.
translation: 经验告诉你，这只是普通的辐射病，但不是。这不是一般的病，孩子们。更糟的东西。严重得多。

original: People are gettin' sick. Sicker than usual, I mean. Weakness, nausea, you name it. Even a couple of deaths reported.
translation: 人们生病了。我是说比平时更难受，虚弱、恶心，应有尽有。甚至有了几例死亡报告。

original: All righty, children, time to let you know about yet another problem plaguing our tranquil little post-apocalyptic neighborhood.
translation: 好了，孩子们，是时候让你们知道，又有一个问题困扰着我们这个宁静的小后启示录社区了。

original: The Enclave's been responsible for enough death and destruction. We need to get back to normal. You know, like fighting Raiders and Super Mutants.
translation: 英克雷造成了太多的死亡和破坏。我们需要回到正常的生活。你知道，如同抵抗掠夺者和超级变种人。

original: You know, some laser beams here, a few exploded corpses there. Let's just hope this mop up operation ends ASAP.
translation: 你知道，一些激光光束闪过，一些尸体被分解。我们希望尽快完成操作。

original: But the fight, dear children, did not end there. The Brotherhood has been pursuing "President" Eden's little minions throughout the Wasteland.
translation: 但是这场战斗，亲爱的孩子们，并没有到此为止。兄弟会还在废土追缴伊甸“总统”的一些走狗。

original: It's been some time since those plucky paladins in Power Armor first stormed the Jefferson Memorial and gave the Enclave their walking papers.
translation: 自从那些穿着动力装甲的勇敢圣骑士第一次冲进杰斐逊纪念馆，并给了英克雷他们的解聘书，已经有一段时间了。

original: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}
translation: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}

original: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}
translation: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}

original: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}
translation: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}

original: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}
translation: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}

original: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}
translation: {CG04EmergencybroadcastZ}

original: ...This is Defender Morrill... Any Outcasts listening on this frequency, report to Sector 7-B, Bailey's Crossroads.
translation: ……这是莫里尔捍卫者……听到这个频率的放逐者，请到贝利十字路口的7-B区报到。

original: Outside of the Pitt, the world lies in ruins and survivors scratch in the dirt without dreams. But in the Pitt, we can live and rebuild with purpose.
translation: 匹兹堡外边，世界一片废墟，幸存者们在尘土中苟延残喘，没有梦想。但在匹兹堡，我们可以活着，有目的地重建家园。

original: Nothing is impossible, through the sweat of our brow.
translation: 通过我们辛勤的汗水，没有什么是不可能的。

original: You build the weapons to arm the soldiers. Soldiers use weapons to keep you safe and bring back food. We depend on each other.
translation: 你们制造武器武装士兵，士兵使用武器保卫你们的安全，带回来食物。我们彼此依赖。

original: From nothing, I have brought you this settlement. From chaos, The Pitt thrives. We all work to make it thrive further.
translation: 我带着一无所有的你们来到这片移民区，匹兹堡从混乱中茁壮成长。我们一起工作，带领它走向进一步的繁荣。

original: A reminder: work is rewarded. Sloth is punished. Such is the way we thrive in this hellish place.
translation: 一条忠告：工作得报酬，偷懒吃鞭子。这就是我们从这片地狱之所兴盛起来的办法。

original: To work for the good of one's fellow man is a blessing. Through labor, we shall all thrive.
translation: 为所有人的福利工作，是上帝的恩赐。我们通过劳动必将全面崛起。

original: "What is genuine is proved in the fire, what is false we shall not miss in our ranks." Remember it well, my friends.
translation: 在我们的社会中，真金不怕火来炼，谎言不必挂心间。牢记这一点，我的朋友们。

original: Let the ruling classes of the Wasteland tremble at our new industrial revolution!
translation: 让废土的那些好吃懒做者在我们的新兴工业革命面前颤抖吧！

original: Let no man call you slaves, nor any man call themselves your owners. We are all workers, whether it be in the mills, the alleys, or the war zones.
translation: 不要让任何人称你们奴隶，不要让任何人称他是你们的主人。我们都是工人，无论是在轧钢厂、大街小巷，还是战区。

original: Great deeds require great work. We are rebuilding a glorious city, and restoring the world. We must all work for this greatness.
translation: 伟大的功绩有赖于伟大的工作。我们正在重建一座无上光荣的城市，重建整个世界。我们每个人必须为了这种伟大而工作。

original: You are not collared beasts of burden. You are proud workers, building a home in the world. Work shall set us all free.
translation: 你们不是被套上了项圈的驮畜。你们是骄傲的工人，要在这世上建造一个家。工作必将解放我们所有人的自由。

original: Work is what separates man from beast. It is how we change our world. It raises us above the Trogs. Work is what makes us human.
translation: 工作是人与禽兽的区别，工作让我们改变世界，工作让我们把兽化人踩在脚下，工作使我们成为人。

original: The world turned against Man because we were lazy and wasteful. Now we must earn our home once again, through work.
translation: 因为我们的疯狂和穷奢极欲，这个世界让人类自相残杀。现在，我们必须通过工作，再次赢回我们的家园。

original: We all work. Some in the mill, making weapons. Some in the alleys, defending the city. Some in the wasteland, raiding for our food. But we all work.
translation: 我们都在工作。有的在轧钢厂制造武器，有的在大街小巷保护城市，有的在人在废土上为我们掠夺食物。但我们都在工作。

original: Repeating message. This is Butcher of Reilly's Rangers sending out an S.O.S. on all known friendly frequencies.
translation: 重复一次，我是“莱莉的游骑兵”的布彻，从所有已知的友好波段里发出的求救信息。

original: This is Butcher of Reilly's Rangers. If anyone can hear this signal we're in danger and we need your help.
translation: 我是“莱莉的游骑兵”的布彻。如果有人听到这条信号：我们遇险了，急需你的救援。

original: To anyone receiving this message. This is Butcher of the merc company Reilly's Rangers. We're in danger and need help.
translation: 致接收到此信息的任何人：我是“莱莉的游骑兵”的布彻。我们有危险，急需救援。

original: To anyone that can receive this. We are in danger and need your help. This is Butcher of Reilly's Rangers.
translation: 致接收到此信息的任何人：我们有危险，急需救援。我是“莱莉的游骑兵”的布彻。

original: Finding Reilly in Underworld, the ghoul city situated in the Museum of History in D.C. (near the Washington Monument). She is lying unconscious.
translation: 在冥界找到莱莉，尸鬼之城就位于特区历史博物馆内。（华盛顿纪念碑附近）。她正昏迷不醒。
